title.english: Joyful, Joyful, We Adore Thee

verses.english:
Joyful, joyful, we adore thee,
God of glory, Lord of love,
Hearts unfold like flow'rs before thee
Hail thee as the sun above,
Melt the sin of sadness
Drive the dark of doubt away,
Giver of immortal gladness
Fill us with the light of day.
verses.yoruba:
Pẹlu ayọ l'ajuba Rẹ,
Wọ Ọlọrun ifẹ wa,
Ọkan wa kun f'orin iyin
B'orun ti nfi isẹ Rẹ han,
Pa gbogbo ipa ẹsẹ rẹ
Mu 'yemeji wa kuro,
Ọlọrun olufẹ gba 'yin,
Ati ọpẹ ta mu wa.

verses.english:
All thy works rejoice surround thee
Earth and heav'n reflect thy rays,
Stars and angels sing around thee
Centre of unbroken praise,
Field and forest vale and mountain
Bloss'ming meadow, flashing sea,
Chanting birds and flowing fountain
Call us to rejoice in Him.
verses.yoruba:
Gbogbo'sẹ ọwọ Ọlọrun
F'agbara Ọlọrun han,
Irawọ pẹlu Angẹli
Yin Ọlọrun titi lae,
Gbogbo oke ni wọn nyin Ọ,
Pe wa ka jọ juba Rẹ.

verses.english:
Thou art giving and forgiving
Ever blessing ever blessed,
Well spring of the joy of living
Ocean dept of happy rest!
Thou our father, Christ our father
All who lives in love are thine,
Teach us how to love each other
Lift us to the joy divine.
verses.yoruba:
Ọlọrun ti gbogbo 'go yẹ
Gba iyin ti a mu wa,
Olufunni l'ohun gbogbo
Ẹunrẹrẹ ayọ wa,
Krist' iwọ ni Oluwa wa
Wọ ni Ọlọrun ifẹ,
Kọ wa lati fẹ ara wa
Ka si ma gbe ni 'rẹpọ.

verses.english:
Mortals join the mighty chorus
Which the morning stars began,
Father love is reigning o'er us
Brother love bind man to man,
Ever singing, march we onward
Victors in the midst of strife;
Joy music lifts us sunward
In the triumph song of life.
verses.yoruba:
Gbogbo aye ẹ bawa yin
Ọlọrun to ngbe l'ọrun,
Ọlọrun ifẹ d'eniyan
Funwa n'ifẹ aisẹtan,
Ka ba le ma tẹsiwaju
Lọna irin ajo wa,
Titi a o de ọrun.

title.english: Glory Be To God The Father

verses.english:
Glory be to God The Father,
Glory be to God The Son,
Glory be to God The Spirit,
Great Jehovah, Three in One
Glory, Glory,
While the ages run.
verses.yoruba:
Ogo fun Ọlọrun Baba,
Ogo f'Ọlọrun Ọmọ,
Ogo fu Ọlọrun Ẹmi,
Jehofa, Mẹtalọkan;
Ogo, Ogo,
B'ayeraye ti nkoja.

verses.english:
Glory, blessing, praise eternal
Thus the choir of angels sings,
Honour, riches, power, dominion,
Thus it's praise creation brings
Glory, Glory
Glory to the King of kings!
verses.yoruba:
Ogo, 'bunkun, iyin laelae!
L'awọn ogun ọrun nkọ;
Ọla, ọrọ, ipa, 'jọba!
L'awọn ẹda fi nyin,
Ogo, Ogo
Fun Ọba awọn ọba.

title.english: Great Is Thy Faithfulness
title.yoruba: Titobi Ni Ore Baba Si Mi

verses.english:
Great is Thy Fathfulness, O God my Father
There is no shadow of turning with thee
Thou changest not, Thy compassion they fail not
As Thou has been, Thou forever wilt be.
verses.yoruba:
Titobi ni ore Baba si mi,
Ko si aisotitọ 'nu Rẹ Baba,
'Wọ kuna, bẹ 'lore Rẹ wa titi
Anu Rẹ wa titi ayeraye.

verses.english:
Summer and winter and spring time and harvest,
Sun, moon and stars in their courses above,
Join with all nature in manifold witness,
To Thy great faithfulness, mercy and love.
verses.yoruba:
N'gbagbogbo, Ọlọrun wa bakan na,
Nigba ojo tabi nigba ẹrun,
Orun, Osupa, ẹ jumọ ba mi yin,
Ọlọrun to da gbogbo agbaye.

verses.english:
Pardon for sin and paece that endureth,
Thy own dear presence to cheer and to guide,
Strength for today and bright hope for tomorrow,
Blessings all mine, with ten thousand beside.
verses.yoruba:
Fun anu to daju lori ẹsẹ,
Ti a nri gba ta ba pe Ọ,
Fun okun lati rin ọna ẹmi yi,
Ati 'bunkun ti ko ni odiwọn.

chorus.english:
Great is Thy Fathfulness,
Great is Thy Fathfulness,
Morning by morning new mercies I see,
All I have needed, Thy hand has provided,
Great is Thy Fathfulness, Lord unto me.
chorus.yoruba:
Titobi n'ifẹ Rẹ,
Titobi n'ifẹ Rẹ,
Lojojumọ ore Rẹ ko lẹgbẹ,
O si npese fun gbogb'aini mi laye,
Titobi n'ifẹ Rẹ, Oluwa mi.

title.english: O Lord My God, When I'm In Awesome Wonder

verses.english:
O Lord my God, when I'm in awesome wonder,
Consider all the worlds, Thy hands have made,
I see the stars, I hear the rolling thunder,
Thy pow'r throughout the universe display.
verses.yoruba:
Ọlọrun mi 'Gbati mo f'yanu wo,
Gbogbo aye t'o f'ọwọ Rẹ da,
Mo ri 'rawọ, Mo gbohun ara ti nsan,
Agbara Rẹ han ni gbogbo aye.

verses.english:
When through the woods and forest glades i wander,
And hear the birds sing sweetly in the trees,
When I look down from lofty mountain grandeur,
And hear the brook and feel the gentle breeze.
verses.yoruba:
Pẹlu 'yanu, mo wo 'sẹ Rẹ, l'aginju,
Ẹyẹ nkọrin didun lori igi,
Mo wo ilẹ lat'ori oke giga,
Mo r'agbara odo at'afẹfẹ.

verses.english:
And when I think that God, His son not sparing,
Sent Him to die, I scarce can take it in,
That on the cross, my burden gladly bearing,
He bled and died to take away my sins.
verses.yoruba:
Gbati mo ro b'Iwọ ti fi ọmọ Rẹ,
Silẹ lati ku, ko tilẹ ye mi,
L'ori agbelebu l'oru ẹsẹ mi,
Ẹjẹ Rẹ lo ti ko ẹsẹ mi lọ.

verses.english:
When Christ shall come with shout of acclamation,
And take me home, what joy shall fill my heart,
Then I shall bow in humble adoration,
And there proclaim, my God, how great Thou art.
verses.yoruba:
Gbati Jesu ba de n'nu Ọla Rẹ,
Ayọ mi yo pọ, Gba Jesu ba de,
Gbana ni 'rẹlẹ nu o wolẹ lati sin,
Un o wipe Ọlọrun ti tobi to.

chorus.english:
Then sings my soul, my Saviour God, to Thee,
How great Thou art, how great Thou art.
Then sings my soul, my Saviour God, to Thee,
How great Thou art, how great Thou art!
chorus.yoruba:
Ọkan mi, nkọrin s'Olugbala mi,
Agbara rẹ ti tobi to?
Ọkan mi, nkọrin s'Olugbala mi,
Agbara rẹ ti tobi to?

title.english: Come Ye That Love The Lord

verses.english:
Come, ye that love the Lord,
And let your joys be known,
Join in a song with sweet accord,
Join in a song with sweet accord,
And thus surround the throne,
And thus surround the throne.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹyin tẹ fẹ Oluwa,
Ẹ fi ayọ yin han,
Ẹ jumọ kọ orin didun,
Ẹ jumọ kọ orin didun
K'ẹ si y'itẹ na ka,
K'ẹ si y'itẹ na ka.

verses.english:
Let those refuse to sing,
Who never knew our God;
But children of the heavenly King,
But children of the heavenly King,
Must speak their joys abroad,
Must speak their joys abroad.
verses.yoruba:
Jẹ k'awọn ni ma kọrin,
Ti ko m'Ọlọrun wa,
Sugbon awọn ọmọ Ọba,
Sugbon awọn ọmọ Ọba,
Y'o royin ayọ wọn,
Y'o royin ayọ wọn.

verses.english:
The hill of Zion yields,
A thousand sacred sweets,
Before we reach the heav'nly fields,
Before we reach the heav'nly fields,
Or walk the golden streets,
Or walk the golden streets.
verses.yoruba:
Oke Sion'l'o nmu
Ẹgbẹrun adun wa,
ki a to de gbangba ọrun,
ki a to de gbangba ọrun,
Pẹlu 'ta wura rẹ,
Pẹlu 'ta wura rẹ.

verses.english:
Then let our songs abound,
And every tear be dry,
We're marching through Immanuel's ground,
We're marching through Immanuel's ground,
To the fairer worlds on high,
To the fairer worlds on high.
verses.yoruba:
Njẹ ka ma kọrin lọ,
K'omije gbogbo gbẹ,
A nyan n'ilẹ Immanuẹl',
A nyan n'ilẹ Immanuẹl',
S'aye didan loke,
S'aye didan loke.

chorus.english:
We're marching to Zion,
Beautiful, beautiful Zion,
We're marching upward to Zion,
The beautiful city of God.
chorus.yoruba:
A nyan lọ si Sion',
Sion' to l'ẹwa julọ,
A nyan goke lọ si Sion',
Ilu Ọlọrun t'o l'ẹwa.

title.english: We Are Never, Never Weary
title.yoruba: Ko Su Wa Lati Ma Kọ Orin Igbani

verses.yoruba:
Ko su wa lati ma kọ orin igbani,
Ogo f'Ọlọrun Aleluya!
A le fi igbagbo korin na s'oke kikan,
Ogo f'Ọlọrun, Aleluya.

verses.english:
We are lost amid the rapture of redeeming love,
Glory to God, Hallelujah!
We are rising on it's pinions to the hills above;
Glory to God, Hallelujah!
verses.yoruba:
Awa mbẹ n'nu ibu ife t'o ra wa pada,
Ogo f'Ọlọrun Aleluya!
Awa y'o fi iyẹ goke lo s'oke ọrun;
Ogo f'Ọlọrun, Aleluya!

verses.english:
We are going to a palace that is built of gold,
Glory to God, Hallelujah!
Where the King in all His splendour we shall soon behold;
Glory to God, Hallelujah!
verses.yoruba:
Awa nlọ si afin kan ti a fi wura kọ,
Ogo f'Ọlọrun, Aleluya!
Nibiti ao ri Ọba Ogo n'nu ẹwa Rẹ,
Ogo f'Ọlọrun, Aleluya!

verses.english:
There we'll shout redeeming mercy in a glad new song,
Glory to God, Hallelujah!
There we'll sing the praise of Jesus with the blood-wash'd throng,
Glory to God, Hallelujah!
verses.yoruba:
Nibẹ a o kọrin titun t'anu t'o da wa nde,
Ogo f'Ọlọrun, Aleluya!
Nibẹ awọn ayanfẹ yo kọrin 'yin ti Krist;
Ogo f'Ọlọrun, Aleluya!

chorus.english:
O the children of the Lord have a right to shout and sing,
For the way is growing bright and our souls are on the wing;
We are going by and by to the palace of the King,
Glory to God, Hallelujah.
chorus.yoruba:
Ọmọ Ọlọrun ni eto lati bu s'ayọ,
Pe ọna yi nye wa si, Ọkan wa ns'afẹri Rẹ;
Nigb'o se a o de afin Ọba wa Ologo,
Ogo f‘Ọlọrun, Aleluya!

title.english: O Day Of Rest And Gladness

verses.english:
O day of rest and gladness,
O day of joy and light,
O balm of care and sadness, most beautiful, most bright,
On Thee, the high and lowly,
Through the ages join'd in tune,
Sing holy, holy, holy,
To God the great Triune.
verses.yoruba:
Ọjọ 'simi at'ayọ,
Ọjọ inu didun,
Itunu fun 'banujẹ,
Ọjọ dida julọ,
Ti awọn ẹni giga
Niwaju itẹ Rẹ,
Nkọ Mimọ, Mimọ, Mimọ,
S'Ẹni mẹtalọkan.

verses.english:
On Thee, at the creation,
The light first had it's birth,
On Thee, for our salvation,
Christ rose from depths of earth;
On Thee our Lord victorious,
The Spirit sent the from heav'n;
And thus on Thee the most glorious
A triple light was giv'n.
verses.yoruba:
L'ọjọ yi n n'imọlẹ la,
Nigba dida aye,
Ati fun igbala wa,
Krist' jinde n'nu oku,
L'ọjọ yi li Oluwa,
Ran Ẹmi t'ọrun wa,
Ọjọ Ologo julọ,
T'a tan 'molẹ pipe.

Ebute abo ni Ọ,
Larin iji aye;
Ọgba didara ni Ọ,
Nib'omi iye nsan,
Orisun 'tura ni Ọ,
Laye aginju yi;
L'ori rẹ, bi ni pisga,
L'a nwo 'lẹ ileri

verses.english:
May we, new graces gaining,
From this our day of rest,
Attain the rest remaining
To spirits of the blest,
And there, our voice uprising,
To Father, and to Son,
And Holy Ghost, be praising,
The blessed Three in One.
verses.yoruba:
K'a r'ọre-fẹ titun,
L'ọjọ 'simi wa yi,
K'a si de 'simi t'o ku,
F'awọn alabunkun,
Nib k'a gbohun soke,
Si Baba at'Ọmọ;
Ati si Ẹmi Mimọ,
N'iyin Mẹtalọkan.

title.english: Jesus We Love To Meet

verses.english:
Jesus we love to meet
On this Thy holy day,
We gather round Thy throne
On this Thy holy day,
Thou art our heav'nly Friend
Our pray'rs ascend to Thee.
Look on our spirits, Lord,
On this Thy holy day.
verses.yoruba:
Jesu a fẹ pade
L'ọjọ Rẹ Mimọ yi,
A si y'Itẹ Rẹ ka
L'ọjọ Rẹ Mimọ yi,
Wọ ọrẹ wa ọrun,
Adura wa mbọ wa,
Bojuwo ẹmi wa,
L'ọjọ Rẹ Mimọ yi.

verses.english:
Let us shake off dull sloth
On this Thy holy day,
We kneel in reverence, Lord
On this Thy holy day,
Our sins may Thou forgive
And may Thou teach us, Lord
To worship as we ought,
On this Thy holy day.
verses.yoruba:
A ko gbọdọ lọra
L'ọjọ Rẹ Mimọ yi,
Li ẹru a kunlẹ
L'ọjọ Rẹ Mimọ yi,
Ma tọ gbogb' ero wa,
K'Iwọ k'o si kọ wa
K'a sin Ọ b'o ti yẹ,
L'ọjọ Rẹ Mimọ yi.

verses.english:
We listen to Thy word
On this Thy holy day,
Bless all the words we hear
On this Thy holy day,
As we part, be with us
Thy salvation impart,
To every heart, dear Lord
On this Thy holy day.
verses.yoruba:
A tẹti s'ọrọ Rẹ,
L'ọjọ Rẹ Mimọ yi,
Bukun ọrọ t'a gbọ
L'ọjọ Rẹ Mimọ yi,
Ba wa lọ 'gba t'a lọ,
F'ore igbala Rẹ
Si aya wa gbogbo,
L'ọjọ Rẹ Mimọ yi.

title.english: Praise Him, Praise Him, Jesus Our
title.yoruba: Fi Iyin Fun Jesu, Olurapada Wa

verses.english:
Praise him, praise him, Jesus our blessed Redeemer,
Sing, O earth, His wonderful love proclaim,
Hail Him! Hail Him! highest archangels in glory,
Strength and honour give to His holy name,
Like a shepherd, Jesus will guard His children,
In His arms He carries them all day long,
O ye saints that dwell on the mountain of Zion,
Praise Him! praise Him! ever in joyful song.
verses.yoruba:
Fi iyin fun Jesu, Olurapada wa,
Ki aye k'okiki ifẹ Rẹ nla,
Fi iyin fún Ẹyin Angẹli ologo,
F'ọla at'ogo fún Orúkọ Rẹ
B'olu'agutan, Jesu y'o to ọmọ Rẹ,
L'apa Rẹ l'o ngbe wọn lè l'ọjọjọ;
Ẹyin eniyan mimọ ti ngb'oke Sion;
Fi iyin fún pẹlu orin ayọ̀.

verses.english:
Praise Him, praise Him, Jesus our blessed Redeemer,
For our sins He suffered and bled and died;
He, our rock, our hope of eternal salvation,
Hail Him! hail Him! Jesus the crucified,
Loving saviour, meekly enduring sorrow,
Crowned with thorns that cruelly pierced His brow;
Once for us rejected, despised and forsaken,
Prince of glory, ever triumphant now.
verses.yoruba:
Fiyin fún Jesu Olurapada wa,
Fún wa, O t'ẹjẹ Rẹ silẹ, O ku,
On ni àpáta, ati reti 'gbala wa,
Yin Jesu ti a kan m'agbelebu;
Olugbala t'O f'ara da Irora nla,
Tia fi ade ẹgún dé lori,
Ẹnití a pa nitori awa ẹda,
Ọba ogo njọba titi laelae.

verses.english:
Praise Him, praise Him, Jesus our blessed Redeemer,
Heavenly portals loud with hosannas ring
Jesus, Saviour, reigneth forever and ever,
Crown Him, crown Him, Prophet and Priest and King!
Death is vanquished! tell it with joy, ye faithful,
Where is now Thy victory, boasting grave?
Jesus lives, the mighty and strong to save.
verses.yoruba:
Fiyin fún, Jesu Olurapada wa,
Ki ariwo iyin gba ọrùn kan,
Jesu Oluwa njọba lae ati laelae,
Ṣe l'ọba gbogb'ẹyin alagbara;
A ṣẹgun ikú: fi ayọ royin na ka,
Ìṣẹgun rẹ ha da, isa oku?
Jesu ye ko tun sí wahala fún wa mọ
'Tori O l'agbara lati gbala.

title.english: Stand Up And Bless The Lord

verses.english:
Stand up and bless the Lord,
Ye people of His choice,
Stand up and bless the Lord your God,
With heart, and soul and voice.
verses.yoruba:
Dide, yin Oluwa,
Ẹyin ayanfẹ Rẹ,
F'ọkan, ẹmi at'ohun rẹ
F'ibukun f'Ọlọrun.

verses.english:
Though high above all praise,
Above all blessing high,
We would not fear His holy name,
And laud and magnify?
verses.yoruba:
B'O tilẹ ga yin
Ati ibukun lọ,
Tani k'yo bẹru okọ Rẹ,
Ti ki yo si gbega.

verses.english:
O for the Living flame,
From His own altar brought,
To touch our lips our minds inspire,
And wing to heav'n thought.
verses.yoruba:
Ina 'mọl aye
Lat'ọdọ Ọlọrun
Tọ ete wa, m'ọkan sọji,
M'ero wa lọ s'ọrun.

verses.english:
God is our strength and song,
And His salvation sure,
Then be His love in Christ proclaim'd
With all our ransom pow'rs.
verses.yoruba:
Ọlọrun, l'agbara,
Orin, igbala wa,
Ki gbogbo'agbara wa kede,
Ifẹ Rẹ n'nu Kristi.

verses.english:
Stand up and bless the Lord,
The Lord your God adore,
Stand up and bless His glorious Name
Henceforth forevermore.
verses.yoruba:
Dide, yin Oluwa,
Juba Ọlọrun Rẹ;
Yin Orukọ Rẹ t'ologo
Lati isiyi lọ.

title.english: Holy, Holy, Holy!

verses.english:
Holy, Holy, Holy, Lord God Almighty!
Early in the morning our song shall rise to Thee;
Holy, Holy, Holy, merciful and mighty,
God in three persons, blessed Trinity!
verses.yoruba:
Mimọ, mimọ, mimọ, Olodumare!
Ni kutukutu'Iwọ O gbọ orin wa;
Mimọ, Mimọ, Mimọ, Oniyọnu julọ,
Ologo mẹta lae Olubukun!

verses.english:
Holy, Holy, Holy! All the saints adore Thee,
Casting down their golden crowns around the glassy sea;
Cherubim and Seraphim falling down before Thee,
Which wert, and art, and evermore shalt be.
verses.yoruba:
Mimọ, Mimọ, Mimọ, Awọn t'ọrun nyìn,
Wọn nfi ade wura wọn lè lẹ yí 'tẹ ka;
Kerubim, Serafim nwolẹ níwájú Rẹ,
Wọ t'o ti wa, t'O sí wa titi láé.

verses.english:
Holy, Holy, Holy! Though the darkness hide Thee,
Though the eye of sinful man thy glory may not see,
Only Thou art holy; there is none beside Thee,
Perfect in power, in love and purity.
verses.yoruba:
Mimọ, Mimọ, Mimọ, B,okunkun pa ọ mọ́,
Bi oju ẹlẹsẹ ko leri ogo Rẹ,
Iwọ nikan l'O mọ, Ko tun s'ẹlomiran,
Pipe'nu agbara àti n'ifẹ.

verses.english:
Holy, Holy, Holy, Lord God Almighty!
All thy works shall praise Thy name, in earth and sky and sea,
Holy, Holy, Holy, merciful and mighty,
God in three persons, blessed Trinity!
verses.yoruba:
Mimọ, Mimọ, Mimọ! Olodumare!
Gbogbo iṣẹ Rẹ n'ilẹ l'oke l'onyin Ọ,
Mimọ, Mimọ, Mimọ! Oniyọnu julọ,
Ologo mẹta lae Olubukun!.

title.english: Praise The King Of Glory, He Is God

verses.english:
Praise the King of glory, He is God alone
Praise Him for the wonders, He to us hath shown;
For His promised presence, all the pilgrim way,
For the flaming pillar, and the cloud by day.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹyin Ọba Ogo, On ni Ọlọrun
Yin I fún'ṣẹ 'yanu ti O fi hàn,
O wá pẹl'awọn ero mimọ l'ọna,
Osi jẹ imọlẹ wọn l'ọsan l'oru.

Ẹ yin fún 'rapada, ti gbogbo ọkan,
Ẹ yin fún orisun imularada,
Fún inú rere ati ìtọjú Rẹ
Fún 'daniloju pe O ngbọ adura.

verses.english:
Praise Him for the trials sent as cords of love,
Blinding us closely to the things above;
For the faith that conquers, hope that naught can dim,
For the land where loved ones gather unto Him.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹ yin fún idanwo, bi okun ìfẹ,
T'o nso wa pọ mọ awọn ohun ọrun,
Fún 'gbogbo ti nṣẹgun 'reti ti ki sa,
Fún ilé Ògo t'O ti pese fún wa.

chorus.english:
Praise ...Him, shining angels
Strike ...Your harps of gold,
All ...His hosts adore Him,
Who ...His face behold;
Through ...His great dominion
While ...the ages roll,
All His works shall praise Him,
All His works shall praise Him,
Bless the Lord, my soul!
chorus.yoruba:
Ẹyín angẹli didan lu dùru wura,
Ki gbogbo nyin juba t'ẹ nwo oju Rẹ,
Ni gbogbo'jọba Rẹ, b'aye ti nyi lo,
Iṣẹ Rẹ y'o ma yin
Iṣẹ Rẹ y'o ma yin,
Fi ibukun fún Oluwa ọkan mi.

title.english: Oh My Soul Bless Thou Jehovah

verses.english:
Oh my soul bless Thou Jehovah
All within me, bless His name;
Bless Jehovah and forget not
All His mercies to proclaim.
verses.yoruba:
Yin Jehofah 'wọ ọkan mi
Gbogbo ohun inu mi,
Yin Jehofah, mase gbagbe,
Lati fi ore Rẹ han.

verses.english:
Who forgives all thy transgressions,
Thy diseases all who heals,
Who redeems thee from destruction
Who with thee so kindly deals.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹnit'O f'ẹsẹ rẹ ji ọ,
T'O si tan gbogb' arun rẹ
T'O gba ọ lọwọ iparun,
T'O f'ifẹ de ọ lade.

verses.english:
Far as east from west is distant,
He hath put away our sin;
Like the pity of a father,
Hath the Lords compassion been.
verses.yoruba:
B'ila orun s'iwọ orun,
Bẹ l'O m'ẹsẹ wa kuro,
Bi baba ti 'yọnu s'ọmọ,
Bẹni anu Rẹ si wa.

verses.english:
Bless Jehovah, all His creatures
Ever under His control,
All throughout His vast dominion,
Bless Jehovah,O my soul.
verses.yoruba:
Yin Jehofah gbogbo ẹda,
Laye ati li ọrun,
Nibi gbogbo ijọba Rẹ,
Yin Jehofah, ọkan mi.

chorus.english:
For as high as is the heaven
Far above the earth below,
Ever great to them that fear Him
Is the mercy He will show.
chorus.yoruba:
Nitoripe b'oke ọrun
Ti ga si ile aye,
Bẹni anu Rẹ tobi si
Awọn ti o bẹru Rẹ.

title.english: Come And Let Us Praise The Lord

verses.english:
Come and let us praise the Lord, Hallelujah,
He who knows goodness of Jesus should praise Him,
Come and let us praise the Lord, Hallelujah,
He who knows goodness of Jesus should praise Him.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹba wa yin Oluwa, Aleluya!
Ẹni ba more Jesu k'o ba wa gbega,
Ẹba wa yin Oluwa, Aleluya!
Ẹni ba more Jesu k'o ba wa gbega.

verses.english:
He who left heav'n and came into the world,
And to die for the sins of all the people,
Sing Hallelujah unto the Holy King
He who knows goodness of Jesus should praise Him.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹni t'o f'orun silẹ t'o wa s'aye,
Lati ku fun ẹsẹ araye gbogbo;
Ẹ kọrin Aleluya s'Ọba mimọ
Ẹni ba more Jesu k'o ba wa gbega.

verses.english:
He who is caring for our souls everyday,
He who is saving us from every danger,
He that keepeth Isreal shall never slumber,
He who knows goodness of Jesus should praise Him.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹni t'o pa wa mọ o, lojojumo,
Ẹni t'o nyọ wa ninu ewu gbogbo,
Ẹni t'o pa Israẹli mo k'itogbe;
Ẹni ba more Jesu k'o ba wa gbega.

verses.english:
He that provides for our daily needs on earth
He that shows goodness unto us everyday,
His goodness unto us are unnumbered,
He who knows goodness of Jesus should praise Him.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹni t'o npese fun aini wa l'aye,
Ẹni t'o nsore fun wa l'ojo gbogbo,
Ọre t'o nse fun wa ko l'onka rara;
Ẹni ba more Jesu k'o ba wa gbega.

chorus.english:
He who knows goodness of Jesus should praise Him,
He who knows goodness of Jesus should praise Him,
Come and let us praise the Lord, Hallelujah,
He who knows goodness of Jesus should praise Him.
chorus.yoruba:
Ẹni ba more Rẹ k'o ba wa gbega,
Ẹni ba more Rẹ k'o ba wa gbega,
Ẹba wa yin Oluwa, Aleluya!
Ẹni ba more Jesu k'o ba wa gbega.

title.english: The God Of Abraham Praise

verses.english:
The God of Abraham praise,
Who reigns enthroned above,
Ancient of everlasting days,
And God of love,
Jehovah Great I AM!
By earth and heaven confess'd;
I bow and bless the sacred name,
Forever bless'd.
verses.yoruba:
Yin Ọlọrun Abra'am,
Ti O njọba l'oke
Ẹni t'O ti wa titi lae Ọlọrun 'fẹ
'Jehofah nla l'Ẹmi' Gbogbo ẹda jẹwọ
Mo fi 'bukun f'orukọ Rẹ,
Titi laelae.

verses.english:
The God of Abraham praise,
At whose supreme command
From earth I rise, and seek the joys
At His right hand,
I all on earth forsake Its wisdom, fame, and power
And Him my only portion make,
My shield and tower.

He by Himself hath sworn,
I on His oath depend;
I shall, on eagle' wings up borne,
To heaven ascend;
I shall behold His face
I shall His power adore,
And sing the wonders of His grace,
For evermore.
verses.yoruba:
On na ti se 'leri;
Mo gbẹkẹlẹ eyi,
Uno fi iyẹ idi goke
Lọ si ọrun,
Uno ma wo oju Rẹ,
Uno si yin ipa Rẹ,
Uno kọrin 'yanu t'or'ofe
Titi laelae.

verses.english:
Though nature's strength decay,
And earth and hell withstand,
To Canaan's bound I urge my way
At His command
The watery deep I pass,
With Jesus in my view
And through the howling wilderness
My way pursue.
verses.yoruba:
B'agbara ẹda pin,T'aye at'esu nde,
Uno d'ojukọ ọna kenan'
Nipa 'sẹ Rẹ,
Uno re odo kọja,
Bi Jesu wa lọkan,
Uno kọja n'nu igbo didi,
Lọ s'ọna mi.

verses.english:
The God who reigns on high
The great archangels sing;
And Holy, Holy, Holy, cry,
Almighty King,
Who was and is the same,
And evermore shall be;
Jehovah, Father, Great I AM,
We worship Thee.
verses.yoruba:
Ọba oke ọrun
Olor' Angeli nke
Wipe 'Mimọ, Mimọ, Mimọ'
Ọba titi,
Ẹn'ti ki yi pada,
Ti y'o si wa laelae,
Jehofah Baba, 'Emi ni'
Awa yin Ọ.

title.english: Let Us With A Gladsome Mind

verses.english:
Let us with a gladsome mind
Praise the Lord, for He is kind;
For His mercies still endure,
Ever faithful, ever sure.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹjẹ ka f'inu didun
Yin Oluwa Olore,
Anu Rẹ, O wa titi,
Lododo dajudaju.

verses.english:
He, with all-commanding might,
Filled the new-made world with light;
For His mercies still endure,
Ever faithful, ever sure.
verses.yoruba:
On nipa agbara Rẹ,
F' imọlẹ s'aye titun,
Anu Rẹ, O wa titi,
Lododo dajudaju.

verses.english:
All things living he doth feed,
His full hand supplies their need
For His mercies still endure,
Ever faithful, ever sure.
verses.yoruba:
O mbọ gbogb' ẹda 'laye,
O npese fun aini wọn,
Anu Rẹ, O wa titi,
Lododo dajudaju.

verses.english:
He His chosen race did bless
In the wasteful wilderness:
For His mercies still endure,
Ever faithful, ever sure.
verses.yoruba:
O bukun ayanfẹ Rẹ,
Li aginju iparun
Anu Rẹ, O wa titi,
Lododo dajudaju.

verses.english:
Let us with a gladsome mind
Praise the Lord, for He is kind;
For His mercies still endure,
Ever faithful, ever sure.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹjẹ ka f'inu didun
Yin Oluwa Olore,
Anu Rẹ, O wa titi,
Lododo dajudaju.

title.english: Oh For A Thousand Tongues To Sing

verses.english:
Oh for a thousand tongues to sing,
My dear Redeemer's praise,
The glories of my God and King,
The triumphs of His grace!
verses.yoruba:
Emi 'ba n'ẹgbẹrun ahọn,
Fún ìyìn Olugbala,
Ogo Ọlọrun Ọba mi,
Ìṣẹgun ore Rẹ.

Jesu tó sẹru wa d'ayọ,
T'o mu banujẹ tan,
Orin ni l'eti ẹlẹsẹ,
Iye at' ilera.

O ṣẹgun agbára ẹsẹ
O da ondè silẹ,
Ẹjẹ Rẹ le w'ẹleri mọ,
Ẹjẹ rẹ ṣeun fún mi.

verses.english:
He speaks and, listening to His voice,
New life the dead receive;
The mournful broken hearts rejoice
The humble poor believe.
verses.yoruba:
O sọrọ, oku gb'ohun Rẹ,
O gba ẹmi títún,
Onirobinujẹ y'ayọ,
Òtòṣì sí gbagbọ.

verses.english:
Hear Him, ye deaf; His praise, ye dumb
Your loosen'd tongues employ;
Ye blind, behold your Saviour come
And leap, ye lame, for joy!
verses.yoruba:
Odi, ẹ kọrin iyin rẹ,
Adití, gbohùn Rẹ;
Afọju, Olugbala dé,
Ayarọ, fo f'ayọ.

verses.english:
My gracious Master and my God,
Assist me to proclaim,
And spread through all the earth abroad,
The honours of Thy name.
verses.yoruba:
Bàbá mi at'Ọlọrun mi,
Fún mi ni 'ranwọ Rẹ;
Ki nle ro ka gbogbo ayé,
Ọla orukọ Rẹ.

title.english: Thou Who Love Us We Shall Serve
title.yoruba: Iwọ To Fẹ Wa La O Ma Sin Titi

verses.english:
Thou who love us we shall serve for ever,
Thou Lord and our goodness King,
O Thou who save us from trials of the world,
Holy's Thy glorious honour.
verses.yoruba:
Iwọ to fẹ wa la o ma sin titi
Oluwa Olore wa;
Iwọ to nsọ wa n'nu idanwo aye,
Mimọ, logo Ọla Rẹ.

verses.english:
Thou who bless'd all our planted crops in the world,
The world has sufficient food,
And all those who are prepared to be truthful,
They all rejoice in Thy works.
verses.yoruba:
Iwọ to nsure s'ohun t'a gbin s'aye
T'aye fi nrohun jẹ o;
Awọn to mura lati ma s'otọ,
Wọn tun nyọ n'nu isẹ Rẹ.

verses.english:
Thou who gave children to barrens for message,
In Thy high glorious honour,
And all the barrens turn back to give Thee Thanks,
For Thy honour, glorious work.
verses.yoruba:
Iwọ to nf'agan l'ọmọ to npe ransẹ
Ninu ọla Rẹ to ga;
Ẹni t'o ti s'alaileso si dupẹ
Fun 'sẹ ogo Ọla Rẹ.

verses.english:
All that were hungry now have joy within them,
In Thy great and mighty pow'r,
And all those who look upon Thee for mercy,
And they rejoice in Thy work.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹni t'ebi npa le ri ayọ ninu
Agbara nla Rẹ to ga,
Awon to ti nwọju Rẹ fun anu,
Wọn tun nyọ n'nu isẹ Rẹ.

verses.english:
O Lord give peace to Thy Churches in the world,
And let Thy grace be abound,
And let Thy people be joyful for ever,
O Lord, In Thy glorious work.
verses.yoruba:
F'alafia Rẹ fun ijọ Rẹ l'aye,
K'ore-ofẹ ma ga,
K'awọn ẹni Tirẹ ko ma yọ titi,
Ninu ogo isẹ Rẹ.

chorus.english:
Father only Thee we shall serve
Father we shall adore Thee,
O Thou who love us we shall serve for ever,
Holy's Thy glorious honour.
chorus.yoruba:
Baba, Iwọ l'a o ma sin,
Baba, Iwọ l'a o ma bọ,
Iwọ to fẹ wa la o ma sin titi,
Mimọ, logo Ọla Rẹ.

title.english: O Worship The King

verses.yoruba:
Ẹ wolẹ f'Ọba, Ologo julọ,
Ẹ kọrin ipa ati ifẹ Rẹ;
Alabo wa ni at' Ẹni igbani,
O ngbe 'nu ogo, Ẹlẹru ni iyin.

verses.english:
O tell of His might, O sing of His grace,
Whose robe is the light, whose canopy space;
His chariots of wrath, the deep thunder-clouds form,
And dark is His path, on the wings of the storm.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹsọ t'ipa Rẹ, Ẹsọ t'ore Rẹ,
'Mọlẹ l'asọ Rẹ, gọbi Rẹ ọrun,
Ara ti nsan ni kẹkẹ 'binu Rẹ jẹ,
Ipa ọna Rẹ ni a ko si lẹ mọ.

verses.english:
The earth with its store of wonders untold,
Almighty! Thy pow'r hath founded of old,
Hath stablish'd it fast, by a changeless decree,
And round  it hath cast, like a mantle, the sea.
verses.yoruba:
Aye yi pẹlu ẹkun 'yanu Rẹ,
Ọlọrun! Agbara Rẹ l'o da wọn,
O fi idi rẹ mulẹ, ko si le yi;
O si f'okun se asọ igunwa Rẹ.

verses.english:
Thy bountiful care, what tongue can recite?
It breathes in the air, it shines in the light,
It streams from the hills, it descends to the plain,
And sweetly distils, in the dew and the rain.
verses.yoruba:
Aye yi pẹlu ẹkun 'yanu Rẹ,
Ọlọrun! Agbara Rẹ l'o da wọn,
O fi idi rẹ mulẹ, ko si le yi;
O si f'okun se asọ igunwa Rẹ.

verses.english:
Frail children of dust, and feeble as frail,
In Thee do we trust, nor find Thee to fail;
Thy mercies how tender, how firm to the end,
Our Maker, Defender, Redeemer, and Friend!
verses.yoruba:
Awa erupẹ aw'alailera,
'Wọ l'a gbẹkẹlẹ, O ki o da ni,
Anu Rẹ rọrun o si le de opin,
Ẹlẹda, Alabo, Olugbala wa.

verses.english:
O measureless Might! Ineffable Love!
While angels delight, to hymn Thee above,
The humbler creation, though feeble their lays,
With true adoration, shall sing to Thy praise.
verses.yoruba:
'Wọ Alagbara Onifẹ julọ,
B'awọn angẹli ti nyin Ọ loke,
Bẹ, l'awa ẹda Rẹ, niw t'a le se,
A o ma juba R, a o ma yin Ọ.

title.english: Let Us Together Give Thanks
title.yoruba: Ẹ Jẹ Ka Jumọ F'ọpẹ F'Ọlọrun

verses.english:
Let us together give thanks to our God,
Songs of praise and thanks we should give,
Wonderful in His love unto us all,
Sing praises to our benevolent God.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹ jẹ ka jumọ f'ọpẹ f'Ọlọrun
Orin iyin at'ọpẹ lo yẹ wa,
Ìyanu n'ifẹ rẹ sí gbogbo wa,
Ẹ kọrin 'yin s'Ọba Olore wa.

verses.english:
How are we better than those who are dead,
You have shown us kindness up till today,
You protect us and save us from dangers,
Sing praises to Him who's caring for us.
verses.yoruba:
Ki l'a fi san j'awọn t'iku ti pa?
Iwọ lo f'ọwọ wọ wa di oni;
'Wọ lo k'wa yọ to gba wa lọw'ewu,
Ẹ kọrin yin s'olutoju wa.

verses.english:
All the living You give their daily bread,
It is You who provide for every one,
It is You who bless all Your creatures
Sing praises to Him who's caring for us.
verses.yoruba:
Gbogbo alaye t'O nfun l'onjẹ wọn,
Iwọ lo npèsè f'onikaluku;
Iwọ lo nsekẹ Ẹda Rẹ gbogbo,
Ẹ kọrin 'yin sí Onibu-ọrẹ.

verses.english:
Our voices are not sweet enough to sing,
Our mouths are not wide enough for thanks,
Though we have thousand tongues each everyone,
They're too small to appreciate Your good deeds.
verses.yoruba:
Ohun wa ko dun to lati kọrin,
Ẹnu wa ko gbórò to fún ọpẹ,
B'awa n'ẹgbẹrun ahọn nikọkan
Nwọn kereju lati gb'ọla Rẹ ga.

verses.english:
Let us be above danger every day,
Let us have joy and have Your peaceful mind,
Let us all have mercy on our way home,
So we can come give glory to Your name.
verses.yoruba:
Gbe wa leke soro l'ọjọ gbogbo,
Fun wa l'ayọ at'alafia Rẹ,
Jẹ k'a ri 'bunkun gba lọ 'le wa,
K'a ba le wa f'ogo f'Orukọ Rẹ.

verses.english:
Oh you angels from Heaven be with us,
Song of praise and thanks we should give,
To our Father immortal and blissful,
Our King Jehovah who is reigning.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹnyin Angẹli l'Ọrun wa ba wa gbe,
Orin iyin at'ọpẹ l'oyẹ wa,
Ọba wa aiku Ọlọla-julọ;
S'Ọba wa Jèhófà t'o jọba.

chorus.english:
Hallelujah, glory be to our God
We'll with drumming and dancing praise our Lord,
The living should praise Thee as it should be,
Hallelujah, glory be to our God.
chorus.yoruba:
Halleluya! Ogo ni fun Baba,
A f'ijo ilu yin Ọlọrun wa,
Alaye ni o yin Ọ, bo ti yẹ,
Halleluya! Ogo ni fun Baba.

title.english: Alleluia! Song Of Sweetness

verses.english:
Alleluia, Church victorious,
Thou may'st lift the joyful strain,
Alleluia, songs of triumph,
Well befit the ransom'd train,
Faint and feeble are our praises,
While in exile we remain.
verses.yoruba:
Aleluya! Ijọ t'ọrun,
Ẹ le kọrin ayọ na,
Aleluya! Orin 'sẹgun,
Ye awọn ta rapada,
Awa ero at'alejo,
Iyin wa ko nilari.

Aleluya! Orin ayọ,
Ko ye wa nigba gbogbo,
Aleluya! Ohun aro,
Da mọ orin ayọ wa;
Gba t'awa laye osi yi,
A ni gbawẹ f'ẹsẹ wa.

verses.english:
Therefore in our hymns we pray Thee,G
rant us, Blessed Trinity,
At the last to keep Thine Easter,
In our Home beyond the sky,
There to Thee for ever singing,
Alleluia joyfully.
verses.yoruba:
Iyin dapọ m'adura wa,
Gbọ tiwa, Mẹtalọkan
Mu wa de 'waju Rẹ layọ
K'ar Ọd'aguntan t'a pa,
K'a le ma kọ Aleluya,
Nibẹ lae ati laelae.

title.english: Praise My Soul The King of Heaven

verses.english:
Praise my soul the King of Heaven,
To His feet thy tribute bring,
Ransomed, healed, restored, forgiven,
Who like Thee His praise should sing,
Praise Him! Praise Him!
Praise the everlasting King!
verses.yoruba:
Ọkan mi yin Ọba ọrun,
Mu ọrẹ wa si ọdọ Rẹ,
'Wọ ta wọsan t'a dariji
Tal'aba ha yin bi Rẹ?
Yin Oluwa, Yin Oluwa,
Yin Ọba Ainipẹkun.

verses.english:
Praise Him for His grace and favour,
To Our father in distress;
Praise Him still the same for ever,
Slow to chide and swift to bless:
Praise Him! Praise Him!
Glorious in His faithfulness.
verses.yoruba:
Yin fun anu t'o ti fi han
F'awọn Baba 'nu pọnju;
Yin I Ọkan na ni titi
O lọra lati binu,
Yin Oluwa, Yin Oluwa,
Ologo n'nu ọtitọ.

Bi Baba ni O ntọju wa
O si mọ ailera wa;
Jẹjẹ l'o ngbe wa lapa Rẹ,
O gba wa lọwọ ọta,
Yin Oluwa, Yin Oluwa,
Anu Rẹ, yi aye ka.

verses.english:
Angels, help us to adore Him,
Ye behold Him face to face!
Sun and Moon bow down before Him!
Dwellers all in time and space,
Praise Him! Praise Him!
Praise with us the God of grace!
verses.yoruba:
Angẹl, ẹ jumọ ba wa bọ,
Ẹyin nri lojukoju,
Orun, Osupa, ẹ wọlẹ,
Ati gbogbo agbaye,
Ẹ ba wa yin, Ẹ ba wa yin,
Ọlọrun Olotitọ.

title.english: Hark! Hark! The Song

verses.english:
Hark! Hark! The song the ransomed sing,
A new made song of praise,T
he Lord, the Lamb they glorify,
And these the strains they raise.
verses.yoruba:
Gbọ! Orin ẹni irapada
Orin iyin titun,
Nwọn yin Ọd'aguntan l'ogo,
Nwọn nkọrin na bayi.

verses.english:
Made white by His redeeming blood
Our heavenly garments shine,
Our minds' by enlightened prove,
The power of truth Divine.
verses.yoruba:
A f'ọsọ n'nu ẹje Rẹ,
O si funfun laulau;
Mọlẹ, t'o tan si ọkan wa,
Ni'pa otọ Rẹ han.

verses.english:
By Jesus blood we overcome
When Satan's host assailed
Was by the power of truth Divine
Our feeble arms prevailed.
verses.yoruba:
Nipa agbara ẹjẹ Jesu,
La fọ 'tẹgun Esu;
Nipa agbara otọ Rẹ,
La se bori ọta.

verses.english:
Then be the Lamb of God adored;
The Lord of life and light,
To Him be glory, honour and power,
And majesty and might.
verses.yoruba:
Jẹ ka juba Ọd'agbuntan,
T'o fun wa ni 'mọlẹ;
Tirẹ l'ogo at'agbara
Ọlanla at'ipa.

chorus.english:
Glory to Him who loved us,
And washed us in His blood,
Who cleansed our soul from guilty and sin,
By that pure, living blood!
chorus.yoruba:
Ogo f'Ẹni to fẹ wa,
Ti'o f'ẹjẹ Rẹ wẹ wa,
Ti o si sọ wa di mimọ,
N'nu ibi iye ni.

title.english: Praise The Lord Ye Heaven Bow Down

verses.english:
Praise the Lord foe He has spoken;
All the earth all hear him speak
To them all He gave commandment
Law that cannot be destroyed.

title.english: Head Of Church Triumphant

verses.english:
Head of church triumphant,
We joyfully adore Thee;
Till Thou appear, Thy members here
Shall sing like those in glory;
We lift our hearts and voice,With bless'd anticipation,
And cry aloud, and give to God
The praise of our salvation.
verses.yoruba:
Olori ijọ t'ọrun,
L'ayọ l'a wọlẹ fun Ọ,
Ki O to de ijọ t'aye;
Y'o ma kọrin bi t'ọrun'
A gbe ọkan wa s'oke
Ni 'reti t'o ni 'bukun,
Awa kigbe, awa f'iyin
F'Ọlọrun igbala wa.

verses.english:
While in affliction's furnace,
And passing through the fire,
Thy love we praise in grateful lays,
Which ever brings us higher;
We clap our hands, exalting
In Thine Almighty favour,
The love divine, that made us Thine
Shall keep us Thine for ever.
verses.yoruba:
'Gbat' awa ninu 'pọnju,
T'a nkọja ninu ina,
Orin ifẹ l'awa o kọ
Ti o mu wa sun mọ Ọ;
Awa sa pẹ, a si yọ
Ninu ojurere Rẹ;
Ifẹ t'o sọ wa di Tirẹ,
Y'o se wa ni Tirẹ lae.

verses.english:
Thou dost conduct Thy people
Through torrents of temptation;
Nor will we fear, while Thou art near
The fire of tribulation;
The world, with sin and satan,
In vain our march opposes,
By Thee we shall break through them all,
And sing the song of Moses.
verses.yoruba:
Iwọ mu awọn eniyan Rẹ;
Kọja isan idanwo,
A ki o bẹru wahala,
Tori O wa nitosi
Aye, ẹsẹ, at'esu
Kọjuja si wa lasan,
L'agbara Rẹ a o sẹgun
A o si kọrin Mose.

verses.english:
By faith we see the glory
To which Thou shalt restore us,
The world despise, for that high prize
Which Thou hast set before us;
And, if Thou count us worthy,
We each, with dying Stephen.
Shall see Thee stand at God's Right Hands,
To call us up to heaven.
verses.yoruba:
Awa f'igbagbọ r'ogo,
Ti o tun nfẹ fi wa si;
A kẹgan aye nitori
Ere nla iwaju wa,
Bi O ba si ka wa yẹ
Awa pẹlu Stefan t'o sun
Y'o ri Ọ bi O ti duro
Lati pe wa lọ s'ọrun.

title.english: We Give Immortal Praise

verses.english:
We give immortal praise,
To God the Father's love,
For all our comforts here,
And better hopes above,
He sent His own eternal Son;
To die for sins that man had done.
verses.yoruba:
A f'iyin ailopin
Fun Ọlọrun Baba,
Fun ore aye wa
At' ireti t'ọrun,
O ran Ọmọ Rẹ ayanfẹ
Lati ku fun ẹsẹ aye.

verses.english:
To God the Son belongs
Immortal glory too
Who bought us with His blood
From everlasting Woe;
And now He lives, and now He reigns
And sees the fruit of all His pains.
verses.yoruba:
A f'iyin ailopin
Fun Ọlọrun Ọmọ,
T'o f'ẹjẹ Rẹ wa,
Kuro ninu egbe,
Nisiyi, O wa, O njọba
O nri eso irora Rẹ.

verses.english:
To God the Spirit's name,
Immortal worship give,
Whose new- creating pow'r
Makes the dead sinner live
His work completes the great design,
And fills the soul with joy divine.
verses.yoruba:
A f'iyin ailopin
Fun Ọlọrun Ẹmi,
Eni f'agbara Rẹ,
Sọ ẹlẹsẹ d'aye;
O pari isẹ igbala,
O si fayọ ọrun k'ọkan.

verses.english:
Almighty God to Thee
Be endless honours done,
The undivided Three,
And the mysterious One,
Where reason fails, with all her pow'r
There faith prevails and love adores.
verses.yoruba:
A f'ola ailopin
Fun Olodumare,
'Wọ Ologo mẹta
Sugbọn ọokan soso,
B'O ti ju imọ wa lọ ni,
A o ma f'igbagbọ yin Ọ.

title.english: Now Thank We All Our God

verses.english:
Now thank we all our God,
With heart and hands and voices,
Who wondrous things hath done,
In whom His world rejoices,
Who from our mother's arms,
Hath bless'd us on our way,
With countless gifts of love,
And still is ours today.
verses.yoruba:
A f'ọ́pẹ f'Ọlọrun,
L'ọkan ati l'ohun wa
Ẹni s'ohun 'yanu,
N'nu ẹni t'araye nyọ;
Gbat'a wa l'ọm'ọ́wọ
On na l'o ntọju wa
O sí nf'ẹbun ìfẹ,
Ṣe 'tọju wa sibẹ.

verses.english:
Oh may this bounteous God
Through all our life be near us,
With ever joyful hearts
And blessed peace to cheer us,
And keep us in His grace,
And guide us when perplex'd
And free us from all ills
In this world and the next.
verses.yoruba:
Ọba Onibu-ọrẹ
Ma fi wa sílẹ laelae,
Ayọ tí kò l'opin
On 'bukun y'o jẹti wa,
Pa wa, mọ n'nu ọrẹ
Tọ wa, gb'a ba damu;
Yọ wa, ninu ibi,
Láyé ati l'ọrun.

verses.english:
All praise and thanks to God
The Father now be given,
The Son, and the Holy Ghost,
Supreme in highest heaven,
The One eternal God,
Whom earth and heav'n adore,
For thus it was, is now
And shall be evermore.
verses.yoruba:
K'a f'iyin on ọpẹ,
F'Ọlọrun, Baba, Ọmọ,
Ati Ẹmi Mimọ;
Ti Ọ ga jùlọ lọrùn,
Ọlọrun kan laelae,
T'aye at'ọrun nbọ
Bẹ lo wa d'isiyi,
Bẹni yo wa laelae.

title.english: O Magnify The Lord With Me

verses.english:
O magnify the Lord with me,
Ye people of His choice!
Let all to whom He lendeth breath
Now in His name rejoice,
For love's blest revelation,
For rest from condemnation,
For uttermost salvation,
To Him give thanks.
verses.yoruba:
Gbe Oluwa ga pẹlu mi,
Ẹyin eniyan Rẹ,
Ki gbogbo ẹda alaye,
Ma yọ l'ọruko Rẹ,
Fun ifẹ ti O nfihan,
Fun isinmi l'ọkan wa,
Fun igbala kikun Rẹ,
Tirẹ l'ọpẹ.

verses.english:
O praise Him for His holiness,
His wisdom and His grace,
Sing praises for the precious blood
Which ransom'd all our race;
In tenderness He sought us,
From depths of sin He bought us,
The way of life then taught us,
To Him give thanks.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹyin fun iwa mimọ Rẹ,
Fun ore-ọfẹ Rẹ,
Kọrin iyin fun ẹjẹ Rẹ
To fi ra wa pada,
Ifẹ lo fi wa wa ri
Ninu ira ẹsẹ wa,
O f'ọna iye han wa
Ẹ fọpẹ fun.

verses.english:
Had I a thousand tongues to sing,
The half could ne'er be told
Of love so rich, so full and free,
Of blessings manifold;
Of grace that faileth never,
Peace flowing as a river,
From God the glorious Giver,
To Him give thanks.
verses.yoruba:
Emi 'ba l'ẹgbẹrun ahọn,
Nko le royin na tan;
Ifẹ Rẹ si mi pọ jọjọ,
Ago 'bukun mi nkun,
Ore-ọfẹ ti ki yẹ,
Alafia bi odo
Lat' ọdọ Olubukun;
Ẹ fọpẹ fun.

chorus.english:
Let all ...the people praise Thee
Let all ...the people praise Thee
Let all ...the people praise Thy name
For ever and for evermore,
(For ever more O Lord!)
Let all ...the people praise Thee
Let all ...the people praise Thy name
For ever and for ever more.
chorus.yoruba:
Ki gbogbo wa f'ọpẹ fun,
Ki gbogbo wa f'ọpẹ fun,
Ki gbogbo wa yin orukọ
Oluwa wa titi laelae,
Ani titi laelae!
Ki gbogbo wa f'ọpẹ fun,
Ki gbogbo wa f'ọpẹ fun,
Ki gbogbo wa yin orukọ
Oluwa wa titi laelae.

title.english: To God Be The Glory
title.yoruba: Ogo Ni F'Oluwa To Se Ohun Nla

verses.english:
To God be the glory, great things He hath done,
So loved He the world that He gave us His Son,
Who yielded His life an atonement for sin,
And open'd the Life Gate that all may go in.
verses.yoruba:
Ogo ni f'Oluwa to se ohun nla,
Ìfẹ lo mu k'O fun wa ni Ọmọ Rẹ,
Enit'O f'ẹmi re lelẹ f'ẹsẹ wa,
To si silẹkùn iye silẹ fun wa.

verses.english:
O perfect redemption, the purchase of blood
To every believer the promise of God;
The vilest offender who truly believes,
That moment from Jesus a pardon receives.
verses.yoruba:
Irapada kikun ti ẹjẹ Rẹ ra,
F'ẹnikẹni t'o gba ileri Rẹ gbọ,
Ẹnit'o buruju b'oba le gbagbọ́,
Lojukanna y'o ri idariji gba.

verses.english:
Great things He hath taught us,
Great things He hath done,
And great our rejoicing through Jesus the Son;
But purer, and higher, and greater will be,
Our wonder, our transport when Jesus we see.
verses.yoruba:
O s'ohun nla fun wa, O da wa l'ọla,
Ayọ wa di kikun ninu Ọmọ Rẹ,
Ogo ati ẹwà irapada yi,
Y'o ya wa lẹnu 'gbat'a ba ri Jesu.

chorus.english:
Praise the Lord! Praise the Lord!
Let the earth hear His voice!
Praise the Lord! Praise the Lord!
Let the people rejoice!
O come to the Father, through Jesus the Son;
And give Him the glory!
Great things, He hath done!
chorus.yoruba:
Yin Oluwa, Yin Oluwa,
F'iyin fun Oluwa,
Yin Oluwa, Yin Oluwa,
Ẹ yọ niwaju Rẹ,
Ka tọ Baba wa lọ l'Oruko Jesu,
Jẹ k'a jọ f'ogo fun Òníṣẹ-yanu.

title.english: Praise To The Lord, The Almighty

verses.english:
Praise to the Lord, the Almighty, the King of creation,
O my soul, praise Him for He is thy health and salvation;
All ye who hear,
Brothers and sisters draw near,
Praise Him in glad adoration.
verses.yoruba:
Yin Oluwa Olodumare, Ọba Ẹlẹda,
Yin ọkan mi to r'On ni 'lera ati 'gbala rẹ,
Arakunrin,
Arabinrin sunmọ 'hin,
F'ayọ at'orin juba Rẹ.

Yin Oluwa, Ẹni t'O jọba lor'ohun gbogbo,
To dabobo, to si gbe ọ ro labẹ iyẹ Rẹ
O ha ri pe?
Gbogb' ohun totọ lo se,
B'O ti lana n'ipilẹsẹ.

verses.english:
Praise to the Lord, who doth prosper thy work and defend thee
Surely His goodness and mercy here daily attend thee;
Ponder a new
What the Almighty can do,
If with His love he befriend thee.
verses.yoruba:
Yin Oluwa to mbukun 'sẹ rẹ to si ngbeja rẹ;
L'otitọ ire ati anu Rẹ ntọ ọ lẹyin,
'Gbana ronu
Ohun t'Oluwa le se,
Ohun t'Oluwa le se,
Ẹni to fẹ ọ, t'O yan ọ.

verses.english:
Praise to the Lord! O let all that is in me adore Him!
All that hath life and breath, come now with praises before Him!
Let the Amen
Sound from His people again,
Gladly for aye we adore Him.
verses.yoruba:
Yin Oluwa! Ki gbogb' ẹya ara mi juba Rẹ,
Ki gbogbo ohun t'o l'ẹmi wa pẹlu iyin Rẹ,
Jẹki iro
Amin dun jakejado,
Layọ lao juba Rẹ titi.

title.english: To Thee O Comforter Divine

verses.english:
To Thee, O Comforter divine,
For all Thy grace and pow'r benign,
Sing we Alleluia!
verses.yoruba:
Si Ọ, Olutunu Ọrun,
Fún ore at'agbara Rẹ
A nkọ, Aleluya!

verses.english:
To Thee, whose faithful love had place,
In God's great covenant of grace,
Sing we Alleluia!
verses.yoruba:
Si Ọ, ìfẹ ẹni t'O wa
Ninu Majẹmu Ọlọrun
A nkọ, Aleluya!

verses.english:
To Thee, whose faithful pow'r doth heal,
Enlighten, sanctify and seal,
Sing we Alleluia!
verses.yoruba:
Si Ọ, agbara Ẹni ti
O nwẹ ni mọ, t'o nwo ni san
A nkọ, Aleluya!

verses.english:
To Thee, our teacher and our friend
Our faithful leader to the end,
Sing we Alleluia!
verses.yoruba:
Si Ọ, Olukọ at'ọrẹ,
Amọna wa totọ d'opin,
A nkọ, Aleluya!

verses.english:
To Thee, by Jesus Christ sent down
Of all his gifts the sun and crown,
Sing we Alleluia!
verses.yoruba:
Si Ọ, Ẹnití Kristi ran,
Ade on gbogbo ẹbun Rẹ,
A nkọ, Aleluya!

title.english: Father Of Heaven Above

verses.english:
Father of heav'n above,
Dwelling in light and love,
Ancient of days,
Light unapproachable,
Love inexpressible,
Thee, the invisible,
Laud we and praise.
verses.yoruba:
Baba oke ọrun
T'imọlẹ at'ifẹ,
Ẹni 'gbani,
'Mọlẹ t'a ko le wo,
Ifẹ t'a ko le sọ,
Iwọ Ọba airi,
Awa yin Ọ.

verses.english:
Christ the eternal Word,
Christ the incarnate Lord,
Saviour of all,
High throned above all height
God of God, Light of Light,
Increate, infinite
On Thee we call.
verses.yoruba:
Kristi Ọmọ laelae,
'Wọ l'o di eniyan,
Olugbala,
Ẹni giga julọ,
Ọlọrun Imọlẹ,
Aida at'ailopin,
A ke pe Ọ.

verses.english:
O God, the Holy Ghost
Whose fires of Pentecost
Burn evermore,
In this far wilderness
Leave us not comfortless;
Thee we love, Thee we bless
Thee we adore.
verses.yoruba:
Iwọ Ẹmi Mimọ,
T'ina Pẹntikọsi Rẹ,
Ntan titi lae,
Ma sai tu wa ninu
L'aye aginju yi,
'Wọ l'a fẹ, 'Wọ la nyin,
A juba Rẹ.

verses.english:
Strike your harps, heav'nly pow'rs
With your glad chants shall ours
Trembling ascend,
All praise, O God, to Thee,
Three in One, One in Three,
Praise everlastingly,
World without end.
verses.yoruba:
Angẹl ẹ lu duru,
K'ọrin t'awa, ti nyin
Jumọ dalu;
Ogo fun Ọlọrun
Mẹtalọkan soso;
A yin Ọ tit' aye
Ainipẹkun.

title.english: Praise, O Praise Our God And King

verses.english:
Praise, O praise our God and King!
Hymns of adoration sing;
For His mercies still endure,
Ever faithful, ever sure.
verses.yoruba:
Yin Ọlọrun Ọba wa,
Ẹ gbe ohun iyin ga,
Anu Rẹ, o wa titi;
L'ododo dajudaju.

verses.english:
Praise Him that He made the Sun,
Day by day his course to run
For His mercies still endure,
Ever faithful, ever sure.
verses.yoruba:
Yin Ẹnit'o da ọrun,
Ti o nran lojojumọ,
Anu Rẹ, o wa titi;
L'ododo dajudaju.

verses.english:
And the silver moon by night,
Shining with her gentle light;
For His mercies still endure,
Ever faithful, ever sure.
verses.yoruba:
Ati osupa l'oru,
Ti o tan 'mọlẹ jẹjẹ,
Anu Rẹ, o wa titi;
L'ododo dajudaju.

verses.english:
Praise Him that He gave the rain,
To mature the swelling grain;
For His mercies still endure,
Ever faithful, ever sure.
verses.yoruba:
Yin Ẹnit'o m'ojo rọ,
T'o mu irugbin dagba,
Anu Rẹ, o wa titi;
L'ododo dajudaju.

verses.english:
And hath bid the fruitful field,
Crops of precious increase yield;
For His mercies still endure,
Ever faithful, ever sure.

Praise Him for our harvest store,
He hath filled the garner floor,
For His mercies still endure,
Ever faithful, ever sure.
verses.yoruba:
Yin fun ikore oko,
O mu ki aka wa kun,
Anu Rẹ, o wa titi;
L'ododo dajudaju.

verses.english:
And for richer food than this,
Pledge of everlasting bliss;
For His mercies still endure,
Ever faithful, ever sure.
verses.yoruba:
Yin f'onjẹ t'o ju yi lọ,
Ẹri 'bukun ailopin
Anu Rẹ, o wa titi;
L'ododo dajudaju.

verses.english:
Glory to our bounteous king,
Glory let creation sing!
For His mercies still endure,
Ever faithful, ever sure.
verses.yoruba:
Ogo f'Ọba olore
Ki gbogbo ẹda gberin,
Anu Rẹ, o wa titi;
L'ododo dajudaju.

title.english: Lord, Enthroned In Heav'nly

verses.english:
Lord, enthroned in heav'nly splendour,
First begotten from the dead,
Thou alone, our strong Defender,
Liftest up Thy people's head
Alleluia, Alleluia!
Jesus, True and Living Bread!.
verses.yoruba:
Oluwa gunwa lori 'tẹ
Akọbi awon t'o sun,
On nikan I'Onigbeja wa
To ngbe wa leke ọta,
Aleluya, Aleluya,
Jesu li Onjẹ Iye.

verses.english:
Here in loving reverence bow;
Here, for faith's discernment pray we,
Lest we fail to know Thee now,
Alleluia, Alleluia,
Thou art here we ask not now.
verses.yoruba:
Awa juba, awa nsapẹ;
Kabiyesi Ọba wa,
Busi igbagbọ wa loni
K'a le tubọ mọ Ọ si,
Aleluya, Aleluya,
Iwọ njọba larin wa.

verses.english:
Though the lowliest form doth veil Thee
As of old in Bethlehem,
Here as there Thine angels hail Thee,
Branch and Flower of Jesse's stem,
Alleluia, Alleluia,
We in worship join with them.
verses.yoruba:
Bi a ko tilẹ le ri Ọ
Bi t'awọn ti igbani,
Awa at'awon Angẹli
Nyin iru-ọmọ Jese.
Aleluya, Aleluya,
Tẹwọ gba ijosin wa.

verses.english:
Paschal Lamb, Thine Off'ring finished,
Once for all when Thou wast slain,
In its fullness undiminished
Shall for evermore remain,
Alleluia, Alleluia,
Cleansing souls from every stain.
verses.yoruba:
Ọd'agutan t'a fi rubọ
Ti s'etutu f'ẹsẹ wa,
Ko tun si ẹbọ miran mọ
Ẹjẹ Rẹ ti to fun wa,
Aleluya, Aleluya,
Ẹjẹ na lo nwẹ wa mọ.

verses.english:
Life-imparting Heav'nly Manna
Stricken Rock with streaming side
Heav'n and earth with loud Hosanna,
Worship Thee, the Lamb who died,
Alleluia, Alleluia,
Ris'n, ascended, glorified!
verses.yoruba:
O nfi onjẹ iye bọ wa
Manna didun lat'ọrun
K'ọrun at'aye kọrin na
 Orin 'yin s'Ọd'agutan.
Aleluya, Aleluya,
O jinde, O si goke.

title.english: Awake, My Soul, To Joyful Lays

verses.english:
Awake, my soul, to joyful lays
And sing thy great Redeemer's praise,
He justly claims a song from me,
His loving kindness, Oh, how free!
verses.yoruba:
Ji, ọkan mi, dide l'ayọ,
Korin yin Olugbala,
Ola Re bere orin mi;
'Seun ifẹ Rẹ ti pọ to!

verses.english:
He saw me ruined by the fall,
Yet lov'd me not withstanding all;
He sav'd me from my lost estate,
His loving kindness, Oh how great!
verses.yoruba:
Ori, mo segbe n'isubu,
Sibẹ O fe mi l'afẹtan,
O yo mi ninu osi mi;
'Seun 'fẹ Rẹ ti tobi to!

verses.english:
Tho' num'rous hosts of mighty foes
Tho' earth and hell my way oppose;
He safely leads my soul along,
His loving kindness, Oh, how strong!
verses.yoruba:
Ogun ọta dide simi,
Aye at'esu ndena mi,
On mu mi la qboqbo Rẹ ja,
Seun 'fẹ Rẹ ti n'ipa to!

verses.english:
When trouble, like a gloomy cloud,
Has gather'd thick and thunder loud
He near my soul has always stood,
His loving kindness, Oh how good!
verses.yoruba:
'Gba 'yọnu de b'awọsanma
T'o su dudu t'o nsan ara
O duro ti mi larin rẹ;
'Seun 'fẹ Rẹ ti dara to!

verses.english:
Often I feel my sinful heart,
Prone from my Jesus to depart,
And though I oft have Him forgot,
His loving kindness changes not.
verses.yoruba:
'Gba gbogbo l'ọkan ẹsẹ mi,
Nfẹ ya l'ẹyin Oluwa mi
Sugbon bi mo ti ngbagbe Rẹ,
Iseun Ifẹ Rẹ ki yẹ.

title.english: What Shall I Render To My God

verses.english:
What shall I render to my God
For all His mercy's store?
I'll take the fits He hath bestowed,
And humbly ask for more.
verses.yoruba:
Kini uno fun Ọlọrun mi
Fun gbogbo anu Rẹ?
Uno gba ẹbun Rẹ,
Uno si fi irẹlẹ bere si.

verses.english:
The sacred cup of saving grace
I will with thanks receive,
And all His promises embrace,
And to His glory live.
verses.yoruba:
Ago or'-ọfẹ igbala
L'emi o f'ọpẹ gba,
Uno fẹyin ti ileri Rẹ,
Uno si wa f'ogo Rẹ.

verses.english:
My vows I will to His great name,
Before His people pay,
And all I have, and all I am,
Upon his altar lay.
verses.yoruba:
Loju awọn eniyan Rẹ
Ni uno san ẹjẹ mi,
Uno f'ara mi on ini mi
Fi jọsin f'Ọlọrun.

verses.english:
Thy lawful servant, Lord I owe,
To Thee whate'er is mine,
Born in Thy family below;
And by redemption Thine.
verses.yoruba:
Baba, gbogb' ohun ti mo ni
'Wọ l'o fi jinki mi;
Mo jẹ ọmọ Rẹ laye yi,
'Wọ si ra mi pada.

verses.english:
Thy hands created me,
Thy hands from sin have set me free,
The mercy that hath loosed my bands,
Hath bound me fast to thee.
verses.yoruba:
Ọwọ Rẹ l'o da mi,
Lo si da mi n'de n'nu ẹsẹ,
Anu Rẹ t'o tu ide mi
Si ti de mi mọ Ọ.

verses.english:
The God of all-redeeming grace
My God I will proclaim,
Offer the sacrifice of praise,
And call upon His name.
verses.yoruba:
Ọlọrun Olodumare mi,
Uno ma kokiki Rẹ,
Emi y'o ru ẹbọ iyin,
Uno kepe okọ Rẹ.

verses.english:
Praise Him ye saints, the God of love,
Who hath my sins forgiven,
Till gathered to the church above,
We sing the songs of heaven.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹ f'iyin f'Ọlọrun ifẹ
T'o f'ẹsẹ mi ji mi,
Titi ao pẹlu 'jọ toke
Kọ orin ti ọrun.

title.english: Father Of All To Thee
title.yoruba: Baba Ẹlẹda Wa A fi Ifẹ Gbadura

verses.english:
Father of all to Thee,
With loving hearts we pray,
Through Him, In mercy giv'n The
Life, the Truth, the Way
From heav'n, Thy throne, in mercy shed,
Thou blessings on each bended head.

Father of all to Thee,
Our contrite hearts we raise,
Unstrung by sin and pain
Long voiceless in Thy praise
Breath Thou the silent chords along
Until they tremble into song.

Father of all to Thee,
We breathe unuttered fears,
Deep hidden in our soul
That have no voice but tears,
Take Thou our hand, and through wild,
Lead gently on each trustful child.
verses.yoruba:
Baba Ẹlẹda wa,
'Wọ ri ibẹru wa
T'o pamọ l'ọkan wa,
T'o nf'omije sọro;
Kọ wa lati gbẹkẹlẹ Ọ
Si mu wa la ewu yi ja.

verses.english:
Father of all may we,
In praise our tongues employ
When gladness the soup
With deep and hallow'd joy,
In storm and calm give us to see
The path of peace which leads to Thee.
verses.yoruba:
Baba Ẹlẹda wa,
Je k'a f'ahọn wa yin,
'Gba t'ayọ t'o jinlẹ
Kun gbogbo ọkan wa;
N'nu gbogbo ayida aye,
Jẹ k'a r'ọna Alafia.

title.english: Through All Changing Scenes Of

verses.english:
Through all the changing scenes of life
In trouble and in joy,
The praises of my God shall still
My heart and tongue employ.
verses.yoruba:
N'nu gbogbo ayida aye
Ayọ on wahala;
Iyin Ọlọrun ni y'o ma
Wa l'ẹnu mi titi.

verses.english:
Oh magnify the Lord with me,
With me exalt His name;
When in distress to Him I call'd,
He to my rescue came.
verses.yoruba:
Gbe Oluwa ga pẹlu mi,
Ba mi gb'okọ Rẹ ga:
N'nu wahala, 'gba mo ke pe
O si yọ mi kuro.

verses.english:
The hosts of God encamp around
The dwellings of the just;
Deliverance He affords to all
Who on His succour trust.
verses.yoruba:
Ogun Ọlọrun wa yika
Ibugbe Olotọ;
Ẹniti o ba gbẹkẹlẹ,
Yio ri igbala.

verses.english:
Oh make but trial of His love,
Experience will decide
How blest they are, and only they,
Who in His truth confide.
verses.yoruba:
Sa dan ifẹ Rẹ wo lekan,
'Gba na 'wọ o mọ pe,
Awọn t'o di ọrọ Rẹ mu
Nikan l'ẹni 'bukun.

verses.english:
Fear Him, ye saints; and you will then,
Have nothing else to fear;
Make you His service your delight,
Your wants shall be His care.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹ beru Rẹ, eyin mimọ,
Ẹru miran ko si;
Sa jẹki 'sin Rẹ j'ayọ yin
On y'o ma toju yin.

title.english: O Come, And Let Us To The Lord

verses.english:
O come, and let us to the Lord
In songs our voices raise,
With joyful noise let us the Rock,
Of our salvation praise.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹ wa k'a kọrin s'Oluwa,
Olukuluku wa;
Ki a ho iho ayọ si
Apata 'gbala wa.

verses.english:
Let us before his presence come
With praise and thankful voice,
Let us sing psalms to him with grace,
And make a joyful noise.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹjẹ k'a wa siwaju Rẹ
Pẹlu 'yin at'ọpẹ;
Ka kọ orin pẹl' or' ọfẹ,
Ka si yọ ayọ nla.

verses.english:
The Lord's a great God and great,
King Above all gods he is,
Depths of the earth are in his hand,
The strength of hills is His.
verses.yoruba:
Ọlọrun yi tobi l'Ọba
J'awọn orisa lọ;
Gboqb' aye wa nikawọ Rẹ
At' awọn oke nla.

verses.english:
To him the spacious sea belongs,
For He the same did make,
The dry land also form his hands,
Its form at first did take.
verses.yoruba:
Tirẹ li awọn okun nla,
On ni O si da wọn;
Ati 'yangbe ile pelu,
Ọwọ Rẹ lo si da.

verses.english:
O come and let us worship Him,
Let us bow down withal,
And on our knees before the Lord,
Our Maker let us fall.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹ wa, ẹjẹ ki a wolẹ
Ki a tẹriba fun,
Ki a si kunlẹ niwaju
Oluwa Ẹlẹda.

title.english: For Mercies, Countless As The Sands
title.yoruba: Fun Anu T'o Pọ Bi Yanrin

verses.english:
For mercies, countless as the sands
Which daily I receive,
From Jesus, my Redeemer's hands
My soul, what canst thou give?

Alas, from such a heart as mine,
What can I bring Him forth?
My best is stain'd and dyed with sin
My all is nothing worth.
verses.yoruba:
Kini un o fi fun Oluwa,
Lat' inu ọkan mi?
Ẹsẹ ti ba gbogbo rẹ jẹ,
Ko tilẹ jamọ nkan.

verses.english:
Yet his acknowledgement I'll make
For all He has bestow'd,
Salvation's sacred cup I'll take,
I'Il call upon my God.
verses.yoruba:
Eyi l'ohun t'emi o se
F'ohun t'O se fun mi:
Em'o mu ago igbala,
Uno kepe Ọlọrun.

verses.english:
The best return for one like me,
So wretched and so poor,
Is from His gifts to draw a plea,
And ask Him still for more.
verses.yoruba:
Eyi l'ọpẹ ti mo le da,
Emi osi, are;
Em'o ma sọrọ ẹbun Rẹ,
Uno si ma bere si.

verses.english:
I cannot serve Him as I ought
No works have I to boast;
Yet would I glory in the thought
That I shall owe Him most.
verses.yoruba:
Emi ko le sin bo ti to,
Nko n'isẹ kan to pe,
Sugbọn em'o sogo yi pe,
Gbese ọpẹ mi pọ.

title.english: All People That On Earth Dwell

verses.english:
All people that on earth do dwell.
Sing to the Lord with cheerful voice;
Him serve with mirth, His praise forth tell:
Come ye before Him and rejoice.
verses.yoruba:
Gbogbo ẹyin ti ngbe aye
Ẹ f'ayọ korin s'Oluwa;
F'ibẹru sin, ẹyin l'ogo
Ẹwa s'ọdọ Rẹ, k'ẹ si yọ.

Njẹ, f'iyin wọ ile Rẹ wa,
F'ayọ sunmọ agbala Rẹ;
Yin, k'ẹ bukun orukọ Rẹ,
'Tori o yẹ bẹ lati se.

Ese? Rere l'Ọlọrun wa,
Anu Rẹ o wa titi lae,
Otọ Rẹ ko fi 'gbakan yẹ,
O duro lat' irandiran.

title.english: Halloed Day And Holy
How Sweet The Name Of Jesus

verses.english:
How sweet the name of Jesus sounds,
Blessed be the name of the Lord;
It soothes my sorrows heals my wounds,
Blessed be the name of the Lord.
verses.yoruba:
B'orukọ Jesu ti dun to,
Ogo ni fun Orukọ Rẹ,
O tan banujẹ at'ogbẹ,
Ogo ni fun Orukọ Rẹ.

verses.english:
It makes the wounded spirit whole,
Blessed be the name of the Lord;
'Tis manna to the hungry soul,
Blessed be the name of the Lord.
verses.yoruba:
O wo ọkan to gb'ọgbẹ san,
Ogo ni fun Orukọ Rẹ
Onjẹ ni f'ọkan t'ebi npa,
Ogo ni fun Orukọ Rẹ.

verses.english:
It soothes the troubled sinner's breast,
Blessed be the name of the Lord;
It gives the weary sweetest rest,
Blessed be the name of the Lord.
verses.yoruba:
O tan aniyan ẹlẹsẹ,
Ogo ni fun Orukọ Rẹ
O fun alarẹ ni simi,
Ogo ni fun Orukọ Rẹ.

Njẹ un o ro'hin na f'ẹlẹsẹ,
Ogo ni fun Orukọ Rẹ
Pe mo ti ri Olugbala,
Ogo ni fun Orukọ Rẹ.

chorus.english:
Blessed be the name, blessed be the name,
Blessed be the name of the Lord,
Blessed be the name, blessed be the name,
Blessed be the name of the Lord.
chorus.yoruba:
Ogo f'okọ Rẹ,
Ogo f'okọ Rẹ,
Ogo f'orukọ Oluwa,
Ogo f'okọ Rẹ,
Ogo f'okọ Rẹ,
Ogo f'orukọ Oluwa.

title.english: Immortal, Invisible God Only

verses.english:
Immortal, invisible, God only wise,
In light inaccessible hid from our eyes,
Most blessed, most glorious, the Ancient of Days,
Almighty, victorious, thy great name we praise.
verses.yoruba:
Ọba aiku, airi, orísun ọgbọn,
To wa n'nu imọlẹ t'oju kole wo,
Olubukun julọ, Ologo julọ,
Alagbara, Olusẹgun, 'Wo la yin.

verses.english:
Unresting unhasting, and silent as light,
Nor wanting, nor wasting, thou rulest in might,
Thy justice like mountains high soaring above,
Thy clouds which are fountains of goodness and love.
verses.yoruba:
Laisimi, laiduro, ni idakẹjẹ,
O njọba lọ, O ko sí ṣe alaini;
Gíga ni idajọ Rẹ bi oke nla,
Ikuku Rẹ b'isun ire at'ifẹ.

verses.english:
To all life thou givest-to both great and small.
In all life Thou livest, the true life of all;
We blossom and flourish as leaves on the tree,
And wither and perish-but nought changeth Thee.
verses.yoruba:
O ntẹ gbogbo ẹda alaye lọrùn,
Nipa ìmísí Rẹ wọn gbé ìgbé wọn;
A ndagba, a ngbilẹ bi ewe igi,
A sì nro; ṣugbọn bakanna l'Ọlọrun.

verses.english:
Great Father of Glory, pure Father of Light,
Thine angels adore Thee, all veiling their sight,
All laud we would render, O help us to see,
'Tis only the splendor of light hideth Thee.
verses.yoruba:
Bàbá nla Ologo imọlẹ pipe,
Awọn angẹli Rẹ wolẹ l'ẹsẹ Rẹ
Iyin wa la mu wa, jọ ran wa lọwọ,
K'a le r'ogo imọlẹ to yi Ọ ka.

title.english: King Of Glory, King Of Peace

verses.english:
King of glory, King of peace,
I will love thee;
And, that love may never cease,
I will move thee,
Thou hast granted my request,
Thou hast heard me;
Thou didst note my working breast,
Thou hast spared me.

Wherefore with my utmost art
I will sing thee,
And the cream of all my heart
I will bring thee,
Though my sins against me cried,
Thou didst clear me,
And alone, when they replied,
Thou didst hear me.
verses.yoruba:
Fun idasilẹ yi ni
Un o kọrin Rẹ;
Gbogbo ayọ ọkan mi ni
Un o mu fun Ọ;
'Gba t'ẹsẹ mi nke kikan,
O da mi lare:
'Gba mo pe Ọ nikọkọ,
O gbẹbẹ mi.

verses.english:
Seven whole days, not one in seven,
I will praise thee;
In my heart, though not in heav'n,
I can praise thee,
Small it is, in this poor sort
To enrol thee;
E'en eternity's too short
To extol thee.
verses.yoruba:
Gbogbo ọjọ aye mi ni
Un o fi yin Ọ;
Mo le gbe Ọ ga ninu
Ọkan mi yi:
Aye wa n'nu ọkan mi
T'Iwọ y'o ma gbe!
Ayeraye kuru ju
Lati yin Ọ.

title.english: We Adore Thee O Lord

verses.english:
We adore Thee O Lord,
Thou head of the Church of Thy People,
The churches here on earth and in heav'n,
Hallelujah.
verses.yoruba:
Awa f'ori balẹ fun Ọ Jesu,
'Wọ ti s'Olori Ijọ awọn eniyan Rẹ,
Ijọ ti mbe laye yi at l'ọrun pẹlu;
Aleluya.

verses.english:
Thou who died and rose for us
Who is with the Father pleading for us,
Glory and honour be to Thee,
Hallelujah.
verses.yoruba:
'Wọ t'oku, t'o si jinde fun wa,
T'o mbẹ lọdọ Baba bi Alagbawi wa,
K'ogo at'ọlanla jẹ Tirẹ,
Aleluya.

verses.english:
And on great day of Pentecost
Thou who sent Paraclete to the World,
His comfort is abiding with us,
Hallelujah.
verses.yoruba:
Ati li ọjọ nla Pẹntikọsti
Ti o ran Parakliti si aye,
Olutunu nla Rẹ ti mba wa gbe;
Aleluya.

verses.english:
From Thy throne above in the sky,
Where He's looking at His servants
He is coming for His martyrs,
Hallelujah.
verses.yoruba:
Lat' ori itẹ Rẹ l'oke ọrun
L'o si nwo gbogbo awọn ojisẹ Rẹ,
T'o si nsikẹ gbogbo awọn Ajẹriku Rẹ,
Aleluya.

verses.english:
Praise, honour and majesty to His name,
For the death of His servants,
Throughout the world at large,
Hallelujah.
verses.yoruba:
A fi iyin at'ọlanla f'orukọ Rẹ,
N'tori iku gbogbo awọn ojisẹ Rẹ,
Nigbogbo ilẹ Yoruba yi,
Aleluya.

title.english: For The Name Of God Most High

verses.english:
For the name of God most high,
Most powerful and honour,
The Lord God of everywhere,
To be prais'd and glorified.
verses.yoruba:
F'oruk' Ọlọrun loke,
T'O lagbara at'ọla,
Ọlọrun ibi gbogbo,
N'iyin ati ogo wa.

verses.english:
For the name of Christ the Lord,
The Son of God that was born,
Christ who created all things,
Worthy of eternal praise.
verses.yoruba:
F'orukọ Krist' Oluwa,
Ọm'Ọlọrun ti a bi,
Krist' t'O da hun gbogbo,
Ni k'a san 'in ailopin.

verses.english:
For the name of Holy Ghost,
Be eternal perfect praise,
With the Father and the Son,
One in name, One in glory.
verses.yoruba:
F'Ọlọrun Ẹmi Mimọ,
Ni k'iyin pipe wa lae,
Pẹlu Baba at'Ọmọ.
Ọkan l'orukọ, logo.

verses.english:
This is our last song to Thee,
And we shall for ever sing,
The generation to come,
Shall join to sing the Sweet song.
verses.yoruba:
Orin t'a ti kọ kọja,
T'ao si ma kọ lae leyi;
Ki awon iran ti mbọ
Dapọ kọrin didun na.

title.english: Blessed Assurance, Jesus Is Mine

verses.english:
Blessed assurance Jesus is mine!
Oh, what a foretaste of glory divine
Heir of salvation, purchase of God;
Born of His Spirit, washed in His blood.
verses.yoruba:
O damiloju, mo ni Jesu,
Itọwo adun ọrun l'eyi jẹ,
Mo di ajogun igbala nla,
Ẹjẹ rẹ wẹ mi, a tun mi bi.

verses.english:
Perfect submission, perfect delight,
Visions of rapture now burst on my sight;
Angels descending, bring from above,
Echoes of mercy, whispers of love.
verses.yoruba:
Un o tẹriba fun tayọtayọ,
Mo le ri iran ogo bibọ Rẹ,
Angẹli nmu ihin didun wa,
Ti ifẹ at'anu Rẹ si mi.

verses.english:
Perfect submission, all is at rest,
I in my Saviour am happy and blest
Watching and waiting, looking above,
Fill'd with His goodness, lost in His love.
verses.yoruba:
Un o tẹriba fun, un o simi le,
Mo di ti Jesu mo d'ẹni 'bukun,
Un o ma sọra, un o si gbadura,
Ki ore Rẹ ma fi mi silẹ.

chorus.english:
This is my story, this is my song
Praising my Saviour all the day long,
This is my story, this is my song
Praising my Saviour all the day long.
chorus.yoruba:
Un o sọ itan na, un o kọrin na,
Un o yin Olugbala mi titi,
Un o sọ itan na, un o kọrin na,
Un o yin Olugbala mi titi.

title.english: Our Father And Our God
title.yoruba: Baba Ẹlẹda Wa Gbọ Ọrin Iyin Wa

verses.english:
Our Father and our God,
Accept our songs of praise
On earth and heav'n above,
The God who reigns in love.
verses.yoruba:
Baba Ẹlẹda wa,
Gbọ ọrin iyin wa
L'aye ati l'ọrun,
Baba Olubukun:

verses.english:
External Son of God,
Who shed His blood for us,
Who rose up from the dead
And up to heav'n ascend.
verses.yoruba:
Wo Ọlọrun Ọmọ,
T'O ku lati gba wa;
Ẹni t'O ji dide,
Ti O si goke lọ:

verses.english:
To Thee the Holy Ghost,
We raise our songs of praise,
Thou who has shed the light
Of life into our hearts.
verses.yoruba:
Si Ọ Ẹmi Mimọ,
Ni a kọrin iyin,
Iwọ t'o f'imọlẹ
Iye si ọkan wa;

verses.english:
Our Holy Triune God
We praise the Three-in-One
On earth and heav'n above,
We raise our songs of praise.
verses.yoruba:
Mimọ, Mimọ, Mimọ,
N'iyin Mẹtalọkan,
L'aye ati l'ọrun,
L'a o ma kọrin pe,

chorus.english:
To Thee is due all praise and thanks,
And majesty for ever more.
chorus.yoruba:
Iwọ l'ogo ati iyin,
Ọpẹ, ati ọla yẹ fun.

title.english: Angel, Voices, Ever Singing

verses.english:
Angel, voices, ever singing
Round Thy throne of light,
Angel harps, for ever ringing,
Rest not day nor night;
Thousands only live to bless Thee,
And confess thee Lord of might.
verses.yoruba:
Gbọ orin awọn Angẹli
Yika ite Rẹ,
Gboqbo wọn nlu duru wura
L'ọsan at'oru
Ẹgbẹgbẹrun awọn mimọ
Njẹwọ pe Jesu l'Ọba.

verses.english:
Thou who art beyond the farthest,
Mortal eys can scan,
Can it be that thou regardest
Songs of sinful man?
Can we know that Thou art near us,
And wilt hear us? Yea, we can.
verses.yoruba:
Iwọ ti ngbe n'nu mọlẹ nla
T'ẹda ko le wo,
Sibẹ iwọ nfẹ lati gbọ
Orin yin wa,
A ba le mọ p'O sunmọ wa
Lati gbọ adura wa.

verses.english:
In Thy house, great God, we offer,
Of Thine own to Thee,
And for Thine acceptance proffer,
All unworthy
Hearts, and minds, and hands and voices
In our choicest Psalmody.
verses.yoruba:
A f'ara wa rubọ fun Ọ
Ninu ile Rẹ,
Gba ọkan wa, ọwọ, ẹsẹ,
Ati ohun wa,
Ya wọn si mimo fun lilo
L'aiye yi ati l'ọrun.

verses.english:
Honour, glory, might and merit
Thine shall ever be,
Father, Son, and Holy Spirit,
Blessed Trinity,
Of the best that Thou has given
Earth and heaven render Thee.
verses.yoruba:
Ogo, ọla ati iyin
L'ao ma fifun Ọ,
Baba, Ọmọ ati Ẹmi
Mẹta n'nu ọkan,
Ọpọ 'bukun t'o nfifun wa
L'awa tun fun Ọ pada.

title.english: O Give Blessing Unto The Lord

verses.english:
O give blessing unto the Lord,
He's the Almighty God,
He who created the world,
And things that are in it,
For His care on all people,
Praise, honour, glory be unto the Lord.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹ fi 'bukun fun Ọlọrun,
Olodumare ni;
Ẹni t'O da aye,
At' hun inu rẹ,
Fun ikẹ ọmọ ẹniyan
Iyin, ọla at'ogo f'Oluwa.

verses.english:
Thou most blessed God, only wise,
Thou most glorious God we praise,
O Thou who spared our lives,
And our works Thou didst bless'd,
And Thou lifted up our heads,
Praise, honour, glory be unto the Lord.
verses.yoruba:
Olubukun at' Ọlọgbon,
'Wọ Ologo l'a nyin;
Ẹni t'O da wa si,
To bukun Isẹ wa,
To si ngbe ori wa ga,
Iyin, ọla at'ogo f'Oluwa.

verses.english:
When our sins are brought before Thee,
When our souls feel sorrow,
When we cry unto Thee,
Thou hearest our prayers,
Thou set us free from satan,
Praise, honour, glory be unto the Lord.
verses.yoruba:
'Gbati ẹsẹ wa fi wa sun,
T'ọkan wa banujẹ,
Igbe wa ke t'ọ lọ;
O si gbọ ẹbẹ na,
O si da wa ni ide,
Iyin, ọla at'ogo f'Oluwa.

verses.english:
Christ the King's worthy to be praised,
Crowned Him with many crowns,
The Lord who gave His love,
 light and His Spirit,
Brought redemption to the world,
Praise, honour, glory be unto our God.

If all my hair are only tongues,
They're not enough to praise,
Even though God is high
Above all praises, but I will sing to thank Him,
Praise, honour, glory be unto the Lord.

title.english: Great And Marvelous Are Thy Works

verses.english:
Great and marvelous are Thy works!
Lord God Almighty King of kings!
Just and true are thy ways;
Thou King of all the saints.
verses.yoruba:
Titobi 'yanu nisẹ Rẹ!
Oluwa Ọlọrun Ọba 'wọn Ọba!
Otitọ ododo lọna Rẹ;
Ọba gbogbo awọn mimọ.

verses.english:
Who shall not fear Thee o Lord
And glorify Thy name?
For Thou only Art Holy;
For all nation shall worship Thee.

chorus.english:
Ha-le-lu-jah-a-a!
Ha-le-lu-jah!
Ha-le-lu-jah-a-a!
Ha-le-lu-jah!
chorus.yoruba:
A-le-lu-ya-a-a!
A-le-lu-ya!
A-le-lu-ya-a-a!
A-le lu-ya!

title.english: All Things Bright And Beautiful
I Will Praise The Lord For His Love
title.yoruba: Em'o Yin Oluwa Fun Ifẹ Rẹ

verses.english:
I will praise the Lord for His love to me,
I am washed in the blood of my Redeemer,
In the fount that flows at the cross so free,
I am washed in the blood of my Redeemer.
verses.yoruba:
Em'o yin Oluwa fun ifẹ Rẹ,
A wẹ mi nin'ẹjẹ Olurapada,
Ẹjẹ na t'o nsan nib'agbelebu,
A wẹ mi nin'ẹjẹ Olurapada.

verses.english:
I am saved by grace and to Him bro't near,
I am washed in the blood of my Redeemer,
I would sing so loud that the world might hear,
I am washed in the blood of my Redeemer.
verses.yoruba:
Ore-ọfẹ mu mi sunm'ọdọ Rẹ,
A wẹ mi nin'ẹjẹ Olurapada,
Em'o kọrin soke, aye y'o gbọ,
A wẹ mi nin'ẹjẹ Olurapada.

verses.english:
What a constant peace in my heart I feel,
I am washed in the blood of my Redeemer,
There's a holy joy I can ne'er reveal,
I am washed in the blood of my Redeemer.
verses.yoruba:
Alafia wo l'o to yi l'ọkan mi?
A wẹ mi nin'ẹjẹ Olurapada;
Ayo mimọ na ko se f'ẹnu sọ,
A wẹ mi nin'ẹjẹ Olurapada.

verses.english:
I will lift my voice while on earth I stay,
I am washed in the blood of my Redeemer,
Then my soul shall sing in the realms of day,
I am washed in the blood of my Redeemer.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹmi o ma gb'ohun yin s'oke,
A wẹ mi nin'ẹjẹ Olurapada,
Ọkan mi y'o ma kọrin lọjọjọ,
A wẹ mi nin'ẹjẹ Olurapada.

chorus.english:
Glory, glory, glory to the Lamb,
I am sav'd from sin and He makes me what I am,
Glory, glory, glory to the Lamb,
I am washed in the blood of my Redeemer.
chorus.yoruba:
0go, Ogo fun Ọd'agutan,
0 gba mi lọwọ ẹsẹ mo si di mimọ,
Ogo, Ogo, Ogo, f'Ọd'agutan,
A wẹ mi nin'ẹjẹ Olurapada.

title.english: God The Lord Is King

verses.english:
God the Lord is King, before Him,
Earth, with all thy nations, wait!
Where the cherubim adore Him,
Sitteth He in royal state!
He is Holy;
Blessed, only potentate!
verses.yoruba:
Ọlọrun Oluwa l'Ọba
Aye mbe niwaju Re!
Nibi t'awọn angel' nsin,
L'O gunwa ni ite Re!
Ẹni Mimọ;
Ọbangiji, On l'Ọba.

Ọba ogo li Ọlọrun,
Sion, royin Rẹ k'aye;
Isra-ẹli ti igbani,
Kede itan otọ Rẹ!
Ẹni Mimọ,
Mimọ li oruko Rẹ.

Li atijọ, ni 'gba ewu
T'awọn ojisẹ Rẹ bẹ,
O gbọ 'gbe awọn en'yan Rẹ,
N'nu ẹru wọn, O dahun,
Ẹni Mimọ;
Wọn ri n'tosi' gba wọn p'E.

verses.english:
But their Father God forgave them,
When they sought His face once more,
Ever ready was to save them,
Tenderly did He restore,
He is Holy;
We too will His grace implore.
verses.yoruba:
Sugbọn Baba won fiji wọn,
'Gba wọn tun safẹri Rẹ
O mura tan lati gba wọn
O f'ifẹ gba wọn pada:
Ẹni Mimọ;
Awa na nw' or'-ọfẹ Rẹ.

Baba wa n'iyọnu n'nu Krist'
Y'o mu ileri Rẹ sẹ,
Wa, k'a gbe ga, gbogb' alaye;
Ẹ wa soke mimọ Rẹ!
Ẹni Mimọ; E sin loke mimọ Rẹ.

title.english: O Prasie My Soul The Lord Of Glory

verses.english:
O praise my  soul the Lor of glory,
The wonderful King who sought me,
I will ring bell to praise
Thee about, I will show the love of His greatness.
verses.yoruba:
Ọkan mi yin Oluwa logo,
Ọba iyanu t'O wa mi ri,
Un o l'agogo yin y'aye ka,
Un o si fifẹ Atobiju han.

verses.english:
I should have perish'd like animal,
If Thou Almighty hath no sav'd me,
The Holy Spirit cam un-aware,
And He fill'd my tongue with new language.
verses.yoruba:
Bi ẹranko l'emi ba segbe,
Bikose ti Oyigiyigi;
Lairotẹlẹ l'Ẹmi Mimọ de,
T'O f'ede titun si mi l'ẹnu.

verses.english:
My heart's joy is beyond expression
In the morning, day and middle night,
And the Spirit now dwells within me,
I sing inspiring songs everyday.
verses.yoruba:
Ayọ ọkan mi ko se rohin,
Loro, lọsan, lọganjọ oru;
Gbat' Ẹmi Mimọ ti de 'nu mi,
Mo nkọrin run lojojumọ.

verses.english:
The Lord hath open'd my inward eyes,
I now listen to deep voice of God,
And the Spirit now dwells within me,
What should I give unto my Saviour?
verses.yoruba:
Jesu ti la mi loju ẹmi,
Mo si f'eti gbohun ijinlẹ,
O nse faji ninu ọkan mi;
Kini mba fi fun Olugbala?

verses.english:
I will glory  in God my Saviour,
So that I may not be ungrateful,
For His call is wonderful to me,
The angels now becomes my belov'd.
verses.yoruba:
Em'o sogo ninu Oluwa,
K'emi ma ba di alaimore;
B'O ti pe mi iyanu l'o jẹ,
Awọn angẹl d'olulufẹ mi.

verses.english:
Now I'm prepared to serve my Jesus
Not caring for satan in this world,
Where ever the Saviour directs me,
Surely, He'll not let me be troubled.
verses.yoruba:
Mo damure lati sin Jesu,
Lai f'ọta pe larin aye yi;
Nibikibi t'O ba ntọ mi si,
O daju ko ni jẹki ndamu.

verses.english:
And when my journey's ended on earth,
O dear Saviour, let me not loose Thee,
In the last hour let me hear Thy voice,
Enter into everlasting joy.
verses.yoruba:
Bi mba pari 're-ije l'aye,
Olugbala, ma jẹ ki npofo;
Ni wakati na jeki ngbọ pe,
Bọ sinu ayọ ayeraye.

chorus.english:
O my Lord, I give thanks to Thee,
Thou hast appointed me with Thy grace,
Uphold me O Lord unto the end,
That I may reign with Thee above.
chorus.yoruba:
Oluwa, ọpẹ ni fun Ọ,
Fun ore-ọfẹ t'O fi yan mi,
Jọwọ dimi mu titi dopin,
Ki nle jọba pẹlu Rẹ loke.

title.english: Day By Day We Magnify Thee

verses.english:
Day by day we magnify Thee,
When, as each new is born,
Our knees at home, we bless Thee,
For the mercies of the morn.
verses.yoruba:
L'ojojumọ l'a ngbe Ọ ga,
Nigbati ilẹ ba mọ,
T'a ba kunlẹ lati yin Ọ,
Fun anu ti owurọ.

verses.english:
Day by day we magnify Thee,
When our hymns in school we raise
Daily work begun and ended,
With the daily voice of praise.
verses.yoruba:
L'ojojumọ l'a ngbe Ọ ga,
Pẹl' orin n'ile-ẹko,
L'ojojumọ, pẹlu iyin,
L'a nse isẹ wa gbogbo.

verses.english:
Day by day we magnify Thee,
In our hymns before we sleep,
Angels hear the, watching by us,
Christ's dear lambs all night to keep.
verses.yoruba:
L'ojojumọ l'a ngbe Ọ ga,
Ninu orin k'a to sun,
Awọn angẹl' gbọ, wọn si nsọ,
Awọn agutan Kristi.

verses.english:
Day by day we magnify Thee,
Not in words of praise alone,
Truthful lips and meek obedience,
Show Thy glory in Thine own.
verses.yoruba:
L'ojojumọ l'a ngbe Ọ ga,
Ki se ni iyin lasan,
Otitọ ati igbọran,
Nf'ogo Rẹ han ninu wa.

verses.english:
Day by day we magnify Thee,
When for Jesus' sake we try,
Every wrong to bear with patience,
Every sin to mortify.
verses.yoruba:
L'ojojumọ l'a ngbe Ọ ga,
Gba t'a ngbiyanju fun Kristi,
Lati ma farada iya,
K'a pa ẹsẹ run n'nu wa.

verses.english:
Day by day we magnify Thee,
Till our days on earth shall cease,
Till we rest from these our labours,
Waiting for Thy day in peace.
verses.yoruba:
L'ojojumọ l'a ngbe Ọ ga,
Tit'ọjọ wa yo fi pin,
T'ao simi n'nu lala gbogbo,
L'alafia d'ọjọ Re.

title.english: There Is Sunshine In The Valley

verses.english:
There is sunshine in the valley,
There is sunshine on the hill,
Jesus brought it to this darken'd world below,
There is sunshine in the flowers,
Blooming by the ripping rill,
There is blessed sunshine everywhere I go.
verses.yoruba:
'Mọlẹ wa l'afonifoji,
'Mọlẹ wa l'ori oke,
Jesu l'O mu wa s'aye okunkun yi
'Mọlẹ wa l'ara itanna
T'o ndagba l'ẹba odo,
Imọlẹ wa ni 'bikibi ti mo nlọ.

verses.english:
There is sunshine on the meadow,
And upon the mossy lane,
Where the birds are warbling note of joy and peace,
There is sunshine on the mountain
There is sunshine on the plain,
Let all nature now the happy chorus praise.
verses.yoruba:
Imọlẹ wa lori papa
Ati l'ori koriko,
Nibiti awọn ẹyẹ nkọrin iyin;
Imọlẹ wa lori oke,
'Mọlẹ wa ni pẹtẹlẹ,
Jẹ ki a fi ọrọ Rẹ ran wọn lọwọ.

verses.english:
Tho' the world is full of sunshine
Brightly beaming everyday,
There are souls who live in darkness at the while,
They have never heard of Jesus,
Nor His tender, loving care,
Let us help and cheer them with a sunny smile.
verses.yoruba:
B'aye tilẹ kun fun 'mọlẹ
T'o si tan l'ojojumọ,
Ọkan pupọ wa n'nu okunkun sibẹ
Ti ko gb'orukọ Jesu ri,
Tabi ifẹ 'yanu Rẹ,
Jẹ ki a fi ọrọ Rẹ ran wọn lọwọ.

chorus.english:
Sunshine, sunshine of His love divine,
Sunshine, sunshine beams so brightly shine,
Sunshine, sunshine, in this world below,
Sunshine, sunshine everywhere I go.
chorus.yoruba:
'Mọlẹ, 'mọlẹ, t'ifẹ Rẹ ọrun,
'Mọlẹ, 'mọlẹ, itansan ọrun,
'Mọlẹ, 'mọlẹ, li aye wa yi,
'Mọlẹ, 'mọlẹ, l'ọna mi gbogbo.

title.english: The Morning Bright With Rosy Light

verses.english:
The morning bright with rosy light,
Has waked me from my sleep;
Father, I own Thy love alone
Thy little one doth keep.
verses.yoruba:
Imọlẹ ọrọ didun yi,
Ji mi nin'ọrun mi.
Baba, ifẹ Tirẹ nikan,
Lo pa ọmọ Rẹ mọ.

verses.english:
All through the day, I humbly pray,
Be Thou my guard and guide;
My sins forgive, and let me live,
Lord Jesus, near Thy side.
verses.yoruba:
Ni gbogbo oni, mo bẹ Ọ
Maa se olusọ mi,
Dariji mi, Jesu mimọ,
Ki' njẹ Tirẹ loni.

verses.english:
Oh make Thy rest within my breast
Great Spirit of all grace;
Make me like Thee, then shall I be,
Prepared to see Thy face.
verses.yoruba:
Wa se bugbe Rẹ ninu mi,
Ẹmi ore ọfẹ
Sọ mi di mimọ l'aye yi
K'emi le roju Rẹ.

title.english: My Soul Is So Happy In Jesus

verses.english:
My soul is so happy in Jesus,
For He is so precious to me,
His voice it is music to hear it,
His face it is heaven to see.
verses.yoruba:
Ọkan mi nyọ ninu Oluwa,
'Tori O jẹ iye fún mi,
Ohun Rẹ dun púpọ̀ láti gbọ,
Adun ni lati r'oju Rẹ.

verses.english:
He sought me so lone ere I knew Him,
When wandering afar from the fold,
Safe home in His arms He hath brought me,
To where there are pleasures untold.
verses.yoruba:
O ti pẹ t'O ti nwa mi kiri,
'Gbati mo rin jina s'agbo,
O gbe mi wa sile l'apa Rẹ,
Níbití papa tutu wa.

verses.english:
His love and His mercy surround me,
His grace like a river doth flow,
His Spirit, to guide and to comfort,
Is with me wherever I go.
verses.yoruba:
Ire at'anu Rẹ yi mi ka,
Ore-ọfẹ Rẹ nṣàn bi odo,
Ẹmi Rẹ ntọ, o sí nse 'tutu,
O mbá lọ sí 'bikibi,

verses.english:
They say I shall some day be like Him,
My cross and my burden lay down;
Till then I will ever be faithful,
In gathering gems for His crown.
verses.yoruba:
Èmí y'o dàbí Rẹ ni 'jọ kan,
Unọ s'ẹru wuwo mi kalẹ,
Titi di 'gbana uno ṣ'olotọ,
Ni ṣiṣẹ ọṣọ f'ade Rẹ.

chorus.english:
I am happy in Him,
I am happy in Him,
My soul with delight,
He fills day and night,
For I am happy in Him.
chorus.yoruba:
Emi nyọ ninu Rẹ,
Emi nyọ ninu Rẹ,
Gba gbogbo lo fi ayọ̀ kun ọkan mi,
'Tori emi nyọ n'nu Rẹ.

title.english: All Hail The Power Of Jesus Name

verses.english:
All hail the power of Jesus' name,
Let angels prostrate fall;
Bring forth the royal diadem,
To crown Him Lord of all.
verses.yoruba:
Gbogbo aye, gbe Jesu ga,
Angẹl', ẹ wolẹ fún;
Ẹ mu ade Ọba Rẹ wa,
Ṣe l'Ọba awọn Ọba.

verses.english:
Crown Him, ye martyrs of our God,
Who from His altar call;
Extol Him in whose path ye trod,
And crown Him Lord of all.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹse l'Ọba ẹyin Martyr,
Ti npe ni pẹpẹ Rẹ;
Gbe gbongbo igi Jesu ga,
Ṣe l'Ọba awọn Ọba.

verses.english:
Ye seed of Israel's chosen race,
Ye ransomed from the fall;
Hail Him who saves you by His grace,
And crown Him Lord of all.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹyin iru ọmọ Israẹli',
Ti a ti rapada;
Ẹ ki Ẹni t'o gba yín la,
Ṣe l'Ọba awọn Ọba.

verses.english:
Sinners! whose love can ne'er forget
The wormwood and the gall;
Go spread your trophies at His feet,
And crown Him Lord of all.
verses.yoruba:
Gbogbo eniyan ẹlẹsẹ
Rántí 'banujẹ yin;
Ẹ tẹ 'kogun yín s'ẹsẹ Rẹ,
Ṣe l'Ọba awọn Ọba.

verses.english:
Let every kindred, every tribe,
On this terrestrial ball,
To Him all majesty ascribe,
And crown Him Lord of all.
verses.yoruba:
Ki gbogbo orilẹ èdè,
Nigbogbo agbaye:
Ki wọn ki, 'Kabiyesile'
Ṣe l'Ọba awọn Ọba.

verses.english:
O that with yonder sacred throng,
We at His feet may fall,
Join in the everlasting song,
And crown Him Lord of all.
verses.yoruba:
A ba le pel' awon t'ọrun
Lati ma juba Rẹ;
K'a bale jọ jumọ kọrin,
Ṣe l'Ọba awọn Ọba.

title.english: Yet There Is Room

verses.english:
'Yet there is room' The Lamb's bright hall of song,
With its fair glory, beckons thee along,
Room, room, still room!
Oh, enter, enter now!
verses.yoruba:
'Aye si mbẹ!' N'ile Ọd'aguntan,
Ewa ogo Rẹ npe ọ pe 'Ma bọ',
Wọle, wọle, wọle nisisiyi.

verses.english:
Day is declining, and the sun is low,
The shadows lengthen, light makes haste to go,
Room, room, still room!
Oh, enter, enter now!
verses.yoruba:
Ọjo lọ tan, orun si fẹrẹ wọ,
Okunkun de tan, 'mọlẹ nkọja lọ,
Wọle, wọle, wọle nisisiyi.

verses.english:
The bridal hall is filling for the feast,
Pass in! pass in! And be the Bridegroom's gust,
Room, room, still room!
Oh, enter, enter now!

Yet there is room! Still open stands the gate,
The gate of love, it is not yet too late,
Room, room, still room!
