I cannot get there without Thee,
Lord lead me to the heav'nly
And sing my song from higher ground.
verses.yoruba:
Fa mi lọ si ibi giga
Laisi rẹ nko ni le de 'bẹ,
Fa mi titi d'oke run,
Ki nkọrin lat' ibi giga.

chorus.english:
Lord, lift me up and let me stand,
By faith on heaven's table land,
A higher plane than I have found,
Lord, plant my feet on higher ground.
chorus.yoruba:
Oluwa jọ gbe mi soke,
Fa mi lọ si ibi giga,
Apata t'o ga ju mi lọ,
Oluwa jọ Gbe mi soke

title.english: Command Thy Blessing From Above

verses.english:
Command Thy blessing from above
O God, on all assembled here
Behold us with a Father's love,
While we look up with filial fear.
verses.yoruba:
Pasẹ 'bukun Rẹ t'oke wa
Ọlọrun, s'ara Ijọ yi;
Fi ifẹ ti Baba wo wa
'Gbat'a f'ẹru gboju soke.

Pasẹ 'bukun Rẹ, Jesu,
K'a le se ọmọ ẹyin Rẹ;
Sọrọ ipa s'ọkan gbogbo,
Sọ alailera, 'tẹle mi.

verses.english:
Command Thy blessing, in this hour,
Spirit of truth and fill this place,
With humbling and with healing pow'r.
With quick'ning and confirming grace.
verses.yoruba:
Pasẹ 'bukun l'akoko yi
Ẹmi otọ, kun ibi yi,
F'agbara iwọsan Rẹ kun,
At' ore-ọfẹ isọji.

title.english: At Evening Time When Sun Goes Down

verses.english:
Lord we have come to three tonight
We come with our various problems
Through we could not see Thee; Surely;
We believe Thou art nearer us.

verses.yoruba:
O mi mọ pe asan laye,
Bẹni wọn ko faye silẹ,
O mi lọrẹ ti ko se re,
Bẹni wọn ko fi Ọ sọrẹ.

title.english: Father Of Heaven, Whose Love

verses.english:
Father of Heaven, whose love profound,
A ransom for our souls hath found,
Before thy throne we sinners bend,
To us thy pard'ning love extend.
verses.yoruba:
Baba ọrun 'jinlẹ 'fẹ Rẹ,
L'o wa Oludande fun wa;
A wolẹ niwaju 'tẹ Rẹ,
Na 'wọ 'dariji Rẹ si wa.

verses.english:
Almighty Son, Incarnate Word,
Our Prophet, Priest, Redeemer Lord
Before Thy throne we sinners bend
To us thy saving grace extend.
verses.yoruba:
Ọmọ Baba t'O d'eniyan,
Woli, Alufa, Oluwa,
A wolẹ niwaju 'tẹ Rẹ,
Na 'wọ igbala Re si wa.

verses.english:
Eternal spirit, by whose breath
The soul from sin and death released,
Before thy throne we sinners bend
To us thy quick'ning pow'r extend.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹmi at'ayeraye lae,
Ẹmi ti nji oku dide,
A wolẹ niwaju'tẹ Rẹ,
Na 'wọ isọji Rẹ si wa.

verses.english:
Almighty Father, Spirit, Son;
Mysterious Godhead, Three in One,
Before Thy throne we sinners bend
Grace, pardon, life, to us extend.
verses.yoruba:
Jehofa, Baba, Ọmọ, Ẹmi,
'Yanu, 'jinlẹ, Mẹtalọkan;
A wolẹ niwaju 'te Re,
Na 'wọ Imi 'yẹ Re si wa.

title.english: Be Ready To Plead Thy Cause

verses.english:
Be ready to plead thy cause,
Jesus wants to hear thy prayer,
He has said that you should pray,
For that reason, He will hear.
verses.yoruba:
Mura ẹbẹ, ọkan mi,
Jesu nfẹ gb'adura rẹ;
O ti pe k'o gbadura,
Nitorina yio gbọ.

verses.english:
You are coming to the king,
Bring all your supplications,
His grace is most abundant,
No one ever asks too much.
verses.yoruba:
L'ọdọ Ọba n'iwo mbọ,
Wa lọpọlọpọ ẹbẹ;
Be l'ore-ọfẹ Rẹ pọ,
Ko s'ẹni ti bere ju.

verses.english:
I start with my load of sin,
Lift this great burden of sin,
Let the blood that Thou has shed,
Wash away my guilt of sin.

I am seeking peace from thee,
Jesus, saviour, take my heart,
Establish Thy throne within,
Reign thou as king in my heart.
verses.yoruba:
S'ọdọ Rẹ, mo wa 'simi,
Oluwa, gba aya mi;
Nibẹ, ni ki O joko
Ma nikan jọba nibẹ.

verses.english:
In my pilgrimage on earth,
May Thy love my comfort be,
My loving Shepherd and Friend,
Lead me to my journey's end.
verses.yoruba:
N'irin ajo mi l'aye,
K'ifẹ Rẹ ma tu mi n'nu,
Bi Ọrẹ at' Olusọ,
Mu mi d'opin irin mi.

verses.english:
Show what you want me to do,
Bestow on me renewed health,
Establish me in the faith,
Let me die a righteous death.
verses.yoruba:
F'ohun mo nise han mi,
Fun mi l'ọtun nilera,
Mu mi wa ninu 'gbagbọ,
Mu mi ku b'enia Rẹ.

title.english: Come, Thou Fount

verses.english:
Come, Thou Fount of every blessing
Tune my heart to sing Thy grace;
Streams of mercy never ceasing
Call for songs of loudest praise,
Teach me some celestial measure
Sung by ransomed hosts above;
O the vast, the boundless treasure
Of my Lord's unchanging love!
verses.yoruba:
Wa iwọ isun ibukun,
Mu mi kọrin orẹ Rẹ;
Odo anu ti nsan titi
Bere orin 'yin kikan;
Oluwa, kọ mi l'orin na
T'ogun ọrun nkọ l'oke
Jẹ ki nroyin isura na
Ti ifẹ Ọlọrun mi.

Nihin l'a ran mi lọwọ de
Mo gbe Ebenezer ro;
Mo nreti nipa anu Rẹ
Kindele l'alafia;
L'alejo ni Jesu wa mi
'Gba mo sako lọ l'agbo
Lati yọ mi ninu egbe,
O f'ẹjẹ Rẹ s'etutu.

verses.english:
O to grace how great a debtor
Daily I'm constrained to be!
Let that grace, Lord, like a fetter,
Bind my wandering heart to Thee;
Prone to wander, Lord, I feel it,
Prone to leave the God I love;
Take my heart, O take and seal it,
Seal it from Thy courts above!
verses.yoruba:
Nit' or'-ọfẹ lojojumọ
Ni 'gbese mi si npo si
K'ore-ọfẹ yi ja ẹwọn,
Tinse 'dena okan mi
Ki nsako sa l'okan mi nfẹ,
Ki nkọ Jesu ti mo fẹ,
Olugbala gba aya mi,
Mu ye f'agbara orun.

title.english: Lord, Dismiss Us With Thy Blessing
title.yoruba: Fi Ibukun Rẹ Tu Wa Ka

verses.yoruba:
Fi ibukun Rẹ tu wa ka,
Fi ayọ kun ọkan wa;
K'olukuluku mọ 'fẹ Re,
K'a l'ayọ n'nu ore Rẹ: 
Tu wa lara, tu wa lara 
La aginju aiye ja.

verses.english:
Thanks we give, and adoration,
For Thy Gospel's joyful sound;
May the fruits of Thy salvation
In our hearts and lives abound
May Thy presence, may Thy presence,
With us evermore be found.
verses.yoruba:
Ọpẹ at'iyin l'a nfun Ọ,
Fun ihinrere ayọ;
Jẹ ki eso igbala Rẹ,
Pọ lọkàn at'iwa wa:
Ki oju Rẹ, ki oju Rẹ
Ma ba wa gbe titi lọ.

verses.english:
So, whene'er the signal's given,
Us from earth to call away,
Borne on angels' wings to heaven,
Glad the summons to obey,
May we ever, may we ever
Reign with Christ in endless day.
verses.yoruba:
Njẹ, nigbat'a ba si pe wa
Lati f'aiye yi silẹ,
K' Angeli gbe wa lọ s'ọrun,
Layọ ni k'a jipe na;
K'a si joba, k'a si jọba 
Pẹlu Krsiti titi lae.

title.english: Abide Among Us With Thy Grace

verses.english:
Abide among us with Thy grace,
Lord, Jesus, evermore;
Nor let us e'er to sin give place,
Nor grieve Him we adore.
verses.yoruba:
F'ore-ọfẹ Rẹ ba wa gbe,
Jesu Olugbala,
Ki ẹni arekereke,
K'o male kọlu wa.

verses.english:
Abide among us with Thy word
Redeemer whom we love;
Thy help and mercy here afford,
And life with Thee above.
verses.yoruba:
F'ọrọ mimọ Rẹ ba wa gbe,
Olurapada wa,
K'a ri igbala on iye,
L'ọhun bi nihin yi.

verses.english:
Abide among us with Thy ray,
O Light that lighten'st all,
And let Thy truth preserve our way,
Nor suffer us to fall.
verses.yoruba:
Fi imọlẹ ba wa gbe
'Wọ imọlẹ aye,
Jẹk' ọrọ Rẹ s'amọna wa
Ma si jẹ k'a subu.

verses.english:
Abide with us to bless us still,
O bounteous Lord of peace;
With grace and pow'r our spirits fill,
Our faith and love increase.
verses.yoruba:
Fi 'bukun Tirẹ ba wa gbe
Oluwa, Olọrọ;
Fi ẹbun ọrun rere Rẹ
Bu si igbagbo wa.

verses.english:
Abide among us as our shield,
O Captain of Thy host,
That to the world we may not yield,
Nor e'er forsake our post.
verses.yoruba:
Fi 'pamọ Tirẹ ba wa gbe,
Iwọ Alagbara;
K'a ma gbe ara le aye,
K'a ma yẹ n'ipo wa.

verses.english:
Abide with us in faithful love,
Our God and Saviour be;
Thy help in need, O let us prove,
And keep us true to Thee.
verses.yoruba:
Fi 'fẹ mimọ Rẹ ba wa gbe,
Ọlọrun Olore;
Ran wa lọwọ ninu pọnju,
Mu wa duro ti Ọ.

title.english: Divine Father Of All Creatures

verses.english:
Divine Father of all creatures,
Hearken Thou unto our pray'rs,
With Thy grace and mercy fill us,
Thy disciple we may be.
verses.yoruba:
Baba wa, Ẹlẹda ọrun,
Gbọ ti wa l'akoko yi;
Fi ore ọfẹ Rẹ kun wa,
K'a le j'ọmọ ẹyin Rẹ.

verses.english:
All those that sought Thee in thy day,
No one empty handed went,
As their necessity so great,
They receiv'd blessing from Thee.
verses.yoruba:
Awọn t'o wa Ọ n'gb'aye Rẹ,
Ẹnikan, ko lọ lofo,
B'aini gbogbo wọn ti pọ to,
L'O si bukun fun wọn to.

verses.english:
Our kneeling are one before  Thee,
But with different request came,
The infirmities want reliefs,
And the needy wants blessings.
verses.yoruba:
Ikunlẹ wa j'ọkan soso
Sugbọn ẹbẹ wa yatọ;
Alailera nfẹ iwosan,
Alaini ntọrọ 'bukun.

verses.english:
Give unto us, our request now,
Lord, as we look unto Thee,
That all who are here with joy say,
Our request are now fulfilled.
verses.yoruba:
Fi'dahun 'bere wa fun wa,
B'a ti nw'oju Rẹ loni;
Ki gbogbo wa f'ayọ wipe,
A ti ri idahun gba.

chorus.english:
Bless us Father we beseech Thee,
Answer our supplications,
Let us not go empty handed,
Bless us with Thy goodness Lord.
chorus.yoruba:
Bukun wa, Baba, a mbẹ Ọ,
Dahun ẹbẹ wa loni,
Mase jẹ k'awa lọ lofo,
F'ire kari wa, Baba.

title.english: Lord, I Hear Of Showers Of Blessing

verses.yoruba:
Oluwa, mo gbọ pe,
Iwọ Nrọ ojo 'bukun kiri;
Itunu fun ọkan arẹ,
Rọ ojo na s'ori mi.

verses.english:
Pass me not, O gracious Father,
Sinful though my hear may be;
Thou might'st leave me, but the rather,
Let Thy mercy light on me.
verses.yoruba:
Ma kọja, Baba Olore,
Bi ẹsẹ mi tilẹ pọ,
'Wọ le fi mi silẹ, sugbọn,
Jẹ k'anu Rẹ ba le mi.

Ma kọja mi, Olugbala,
Jẹ k'emi le rọ mọ Ọ,
Emi nwa oju rere Rẹ,
Pe mi mọ awọn t'o npe.

verses.english:
Pass me not, O mighty Spirit,
Thou canst make the blind to see;
Witness of the Saviour's merit,
Speak the word of power to me.
verses.yoruba:
Ma kọja mi, Ẹmi mimọ,
'Wọ le la ju afoju,
Ẹlẹri itoye Jesu,
Sọrọ asẹ na simi.

verses.english:
Have I long in sin been sleeping,
Long been slighting, grieving Thee?
Has the world my hear been keeping?
Oh! Forgive and rescue me.
verses.yoruba:
Mo ti sun fọnfọn nin'ẹsẹ,
Mo bi Ọ ninu kọja,
Aye ti de ọkan mi, jọ,
Tu mi, k'O dariji mi.

verses.english:
Love of God so pure and changeless,
Blood of Christ so rich, so free,
Grace of God so strong and boundless,
Magnify it all in me.
verses.yoruba:
Ifẹ Ọlọrun, ti ki yẹ,
Ẹjẹ Krist' iyebiye,
Ore-ọfẹ alainiwọn,
Gbe gbogbo rẹ ga n'nu mi.

verses.english:
Pass me not but pardon bringing,
Blind my heart, O Lord, to Thee,
All my heart to Thee is springing
Blessing others, oh! Bless me.
verses.yoruba:
Ma kọja mi, dariji mi,
Fa mi mọra, Oluwa,
'Gba O nfi bukun f'ẹlomi,
Ma sai f'ibukun fun mi.

chorus.english:
Even me, even me,
Let some drops now fall on me.
chorus.yoruba:
An' emi an' emi
Rọ ojo na s'ori mi.

title.english: I Must Tell Jesus All Of My Trials
title.yoruba: N'sọ Fun Jesu! N'o Sọ Fun Jesu!

verses.yoruba:
N'sọ fun Jesu! N'o sọ fun Jesu!
Ẹru yi wuwo jagbara mi,
Ninu idamu, yo ran mi lọwọ;
O fẹ wa pupọ, yo tọju wa.

verses.english:
I must tell Jesus all of my troubles
He is a kind compassionate friend,
If I but ask Him, He will deliver,
Make of my troubles quickly an end

Tempted and tried I need a great Saviour,
One who can help my burdens to bear;
I must tell Jesus; I must tell Jesus,
He all my cares and sorrows will share.
verses.yoruba:
'Nu 'danwo Olugbala yo gba mi
Oun nikan lo le gbẹru mi ru;
N'sọ fun Jesu! N'o sọ fun Jesu,
Jesu nikan lo le ba mi gbe.

verses.english:
O how the world to evil allures me!
O how my heart is tempted to sin!
I must tell Jesus and He will help me,
Over the world the victory to win.

chorus.english:
I must tell Jesus! I must tell Jesus!
I cannot bear my burden alone;
I must tell Jesus! I must tell Jesus,
Jesus can help me, Jesus alone
chorus.yoruba:
N'sọ fun Jesu! N'o sọ fun Jesu!
Ẹru yi wuwo jagbara mi;
N'sọ fun Jesu! N'o sọ fun Jesu!
Jesu nikan lo le ba mi gbe.

title.english: From Every Stormy Wind That Blows

verses.english:
From every stormy wind that blows,
From every swelling tide of woes,
There is a calm, a sure retreat;
Tis found beneath the mercy- seat.
verses.yoruba:
Ninu gbogbo iji ti nja,
Ninu gbogbo igbi 'pọnju,
Abo kan mbẹ, ti o daju,
O wa l'abẹ itẹ anu.

verses.english:
There is a place where Jesus sheds
The oil of gladness on our heads,
A place than all beside more sweet
It is the blood-stain'd mercy seat.
verses.yoruba:
Ibi kan wa ti Jesu nda
Ororo ayọ s'ori wa;
O dun ju ibi gbogbo lọ,
Itẹ-anu t'a f'ẹjẹ wọn.

verses.english:
There is a spot where spirits blend,
And friend holds fellowship with friend;
Though sunder'd far, by faith they meet
Around one common mercy-seat.

Ah, whither could we flee for aid,
When tempted, desolate, dismay'd?
Or how the hosts of hell defeat,
Had suffering saints no mercy-seat!
verses.yoruba:
A! Nibo ni a ba sa si
Nigba 'danwo at'ipọnju?
A ba se le bori esu,
Bo sepe ko si'tẹ anu.

verses.english:
There, there on eagle wing we soar
And time and sense seem all no more,
And heaven comes down our souls to greet,
And glory crowns the mercy- seat.
verses.yoruba:
A! Bi idi l'a fo sibẹ,
B'ẹnipe aye ko si mọ,
Ọrun wa pade ọkan wa,
Ogo si bo itẹ-anu.

title.english: Give Me A Gently Heart

verses.english:
Give me a gently heart
Fill'd with meekness,
Diligent heart like Thine Jesus,my Lord,
Humbleness and patience
A heart of compassion,
In every small detail
To be like Him.
verses.yoruba:
Fun mi n'iwa pẹlẹ,
Ọkan tutu;
Ifarabalẹ bi
T'Oluwa mi:
Irẹlẹ on suru
At'ọpọ iyọnu,
Ninu ohun gbogbo
Ki njọ Jesu.

verses.english:
Give me contentment in
All conditions,
Be it e'en humbler than His lowly birth,
Give me Thou Thy comfort,
Give me also Thy help,
In every small detail
To be like Him.
verses.yoruba:
Fun mi n'
N'ipo k'ipo;
Ko le rẹ 'lẹ ju yi
T'a bi Jesu,
Fun mi n'itunu Rẹ,
At' iranlọwọ Rẹ,
Ninu ohun gbogbo
Ki njọ Jesu.

verses.english:
Give me enthusiasm
In things of Thine,
Earnestness and more love
For things of heav'n,
Give me a holy heart,
Give me hatred for sin,
In every small detail
To be like Him.
verses.yoruba:
Fun mi ni itara
S'ipa Tirẹ;
Aniyan at'ifẹ
S'ohun t'ọrun;
Fun mi n'iwa mimọ,
Ikorira ẹsẹ
Ninu ohun gbogbo
Ki njọ Jesu.

verses.english:
Give me a heart of faith
A hope in Thee,
Give joy of salvation
In Jesus Christ,
Give me a living soul,
Give a crown of glory,
And when I shall awake
To be like Him.

title.english: In The Blood Of Jesus
Father, Again In Jesus
title.yoruba: Baba, A Tun Pade L'okọ Jesu

verses.english:
Father, again in Jesus' name we meet,
And bow in penitence beneath thy feet,
Again to thee our feeble voice raise,
To sue for mercy and to sing thy praise.
verses.yoruba:
Baba, a tun pade l'okọ Jesu,
A si wa tẹriba lab'ẹsẹ Rẹ,
A tun fẹ gb'ohun wa s'oke si Ọ,
Lati wa anu, lati korin 'yin.

verses.english:
Oh we would bless thee for thy ceaseless care,
And all Thy work from day to day declare;
Is not our life with hourly mercies crown'd?
Does not Thine arm encircled us around?
verses.yoruba:
A yin Ọ fun itọju 'gba gbogbo,
Ojojumọ l'a ma rohin 'sẹ Rẹ,
Wiwa laye wa, anu Rẹ ha kọ?
Apa Rẹ ki O fi ngba 'ni mọra?

verses.english:
Alas! Unworthy of thy boundless love,
Too oft with careless feet from Thee we rove,
But now, encouraged by thy voice we come,
Returning sinners to a Father's home.
verses.yoruba:
O se! A ko yẹ fun ifẹ nla Rẹ,
Asako kuro lọdọ Rẹ pọju,
Sugbọn kikankikan ni osi npe,
Njẹ a de a pada wa'le Baba.

verses.english:
Oh by that name in whom all fullness dwells,
Oh by that love with every love excels,
Oh by that blood so freely shed for sin,
Open blest mercy's gate, and take us in.
verses.yoruba:
Nipa ookọ t'o b'or'ohun gbogbo,
Nipa ifẹ t'o ta fẹ gbogbo yọ,
Nipa ẹjẹ ti a ta fun ẹsẹ,
Silẹkun anu, si gba 'ni s'ile.

title.english: Hear Thou My Pray'r, O Lord

verses.english:
Hear Thou my pray'r, O Lord,
And listen to my cry,
Remember now Thy faithful word,
And graciously reply.
verses.yoruba:
Jesu, gb'adura mi,
Feti si igbe mi;
Jọ ranti ọrọ otọ Rẹ,
Si for'-ọfẹ dahun.

verses.english:
Do not in judgment rise
Thy servant's life to scan;
For righteous in Thy spotless eyes
Is found no living man.
verses.yoruba:
Mase se idajọ
Emi iransẹ Rẹ;
N'tori ko si alaye kan
T'o pe li oju Rẹ.

verses.english:
I stretch my longing hands
Toward Thy holy place,
With soul athirst, like weary lands
For Thy refreshing grace.
verses.yoruba:
Mo tẹwọ mi soke
Siha 'bi mimọ Rẹ;
Ọkan mi pongbẹ, b'asalẹ,
Fun 'tura ore Rẹ.

verses.english:
Haste Thee, O Lord, I pray
My failing heart to save!
Hide not, Thy face, I droop as they
That sink into the grave.
verses.yoruba:
Oluwa, jọ yara,
Gb'ọkan arẹ mi la!
Ma m'oju kuro lara mi;
Emi dabi oku.

verses.english:
Thy mercy's early light
My faith desires to see;
O let me walk before Thy sight!
I lift my soul to Thee.
verses.yoruba:
Igbagbọ mi nfẹ ri
Imọle anu Rẹ;
Jọ jẹki nrin niwaju Rẹ
Mo gb'ọkan mi si Ọ.

verses.english:
Let Thy good Spirit lead
My feet in righteous ways;
And for Thy name's sake, Lord, my head,
Above my troubles raise.
verses.yoruba:
Jẹk'Ẹmi Rẹ to mi
Si ọna ododo;
Oluwa, n'tori okọ Rẹ,
Gbe mi leke ibi.

title.english: Almighty Jah Jehovah

verses.english:
Almighty Jah Jehovah,
The freely giver of old,
My thanks present I before Thee,
Proclaim Thy, wonderful work.
verses.yoruba:
Edumare, Jah Jehovah
Ọba Onibu-ọrẹ;
Mo mu ọpẹ mi wa fun Ọ,
Mo wa jẹwọ ore Rẹ.

verses.english:
Almighty Jah Jehovah,
Stop my weeping in this world,
Save me from enemy mockery,
Raise me o'er tribulations.
verses.yoruba:
Edumare, Jah Jehovah
Rẹ mi lẹkun laiye mi,
Mase jẹ ki ọta yọ mi,
Gba mi loke isoro.

verses.english:
Almighty Jah Jehovah,
No good adviser for me,
Here I am with all my trouble,
Save thou my prestige O God.
verses.yoruba:
Edumare, Jah Jehovah
Ko s'alabaro fun mi;
Mo ko aniyan mi tọ Ọ wa,
Majẹ k'aiye r'idi mi.

verses.english:
Almighty Jah Jehovah,
Give me a peaceful spirit,
Save me from all tribulations,
Save thou me from all evil.
verses.yoruba:
Edumare, Jah Jehovah
Fun mi n'ibalẹ ọkan,
Mase jẹ ki ile le mi,
Mase jẹ k'ọna na mi.

verses.english:
Almighty Jah Jehovah,
Be fruitful and multiply,
The Barren look forth unto thee,
Provide them with good children.
verses.yoruba:
Edumare, Jah Jehovah
Jẹ k'awọn 'mọ wa tunla;
Awọn agan nwo Ọ loju,
F'ọmọ rere, jinki wọn.

verses.english:
Almighty Jah Jehovah,
Bless thou my life for me,
Save me from witches and wizards
Save me from all evil works.
verses.yoruba:
Edumare, Jah Jehovah
Se aiye mi ni rere,
Gba mi lọwọ oso, ajẹ,
Ma fi mi tọrẹ f'esu.

verses.english:
Almighty Jah Jehovah,
Bless us at home and abroad,
Shield and buckler of our Band,
Pour blessing on all of us.
verses.yoruba:
Edumare, Jah Jehovah
Bukun wa tile tọna,
S'opo at'asa ijọ wa,
Bukun wa kari-kari.

chorus.english:
Hark, Holy Echo,
Carry my devotion forth,
Father Thy 'rod cling I unto,
Honey thou my life for me.
chorus.yoruba:
Wa Olugbohun,
Yara gbohun ẹbẹ mi,
Baba mo wa d'opo Rẹ mu,
F'oyin s'aiye mi fun mi.

title.english: Jesus, Where'er Thy People Meet

verses.english:
Jesus, where'er Thy people meet,
There they behold Thy mercy-seat;
Where'er they seek Thee Thou art found,
And every place is hallowed ground.
verses.yoruba:
Jesu, ni b'ẹni Rẹ pade,
Nibẹ, wọn r'itẹ anu Rẹ,
Nibẹ, wọn wa Ọ, wọn ri Ọ,
Ibikibi ni'lẹ ọwọ.

verses.english:
For Thou, within no wall confined,
Inhabitest the humble mind;
Such ever bring Thee where they come,
And going take Thee to their home.
verses.yoruba:
Ko s'ogiri t'o se ọ mọ,
O ngbe inu onirẹlẹ;
Wọn mu Ọ wa, bi won ba wa,
'Gba wọn nlọ 'le, wọn mu Ọ lọ.

verses.english:
Dear Shepherd of Thy chosen few
Thy former mercies here renew;
Here to our waiting hearts proclaim
The sweetness of Thy saving name.
verses.yoruba:
Olus'agutan eni Rẹ,
Sọ anu Rẹ 'gbani d'ọtun,
Sọ adun orukọ la Rẹ
Fun ọkan ti nwa oju Re.

verses.english:
Here may we prove the pow'r of pray'r,
To strengthen faith and sweeten care,
To teach our faint desires to rise,
And bring all heav'n before our eyes.
verses.yoruba:
Jẹ k'a ripa adua nihin,
Lati sọ 'gbagbọ di lile,
Lati be ifẹ wa soke,
Lati gb'ọrun ka 'waju wa.

verses.english:
Lord, we are few, but Thou art short
Thine arm, nor deaf Thine ear;
O rend the heav'ns, come quickly down,
And make a thousand hearts Thine own.

title.english: My God Is Any Hour So Sweet

verses.english:
My God, is any hour so sweet,
From blush of morn to evening star,
As that which calls me to Thy feet,
The hour of prayer?
verses.yoruba:
Ọlọrun lat' orọ d'alẹ,
Wakati wo l'o dun pupọ,
B'eyi t'o pe mi wa 'dọ Rẹ,
Fun adura?

verses.english:
Blest be that tranquil hour of morn
And blest that hour of solemn eve,
When, on the wings of pray'r up borne,
The world I leave.
verses.yoruba:
Ibukun n'itura orọ
Ibukun si l'oju alẹ;
'Gbati mo f'adura goke
Kuro l'aye!

verses.english:
For then a day-spring shines on me
Brighter than morn's ethereal glow
And richer dews descend from Thee
Than earth can know.
verses.yoruba:
'Gba na 'mọlẹ kan mo si mi
O dan ju 'mọlẹ ọrun lọ
Iri 'bukun l'aye ko mọ
T'odo Rẹ wa.

verses.english:
Then is my strength by Thee renew'd;
Then are my sins by Thee forgiven,
Then dost Thou and cheer my solitude,
With hopes of heaven.
verses.yoruba:
'Gbana l'agbara mi d'ọtun,
'Gbana l'a f'ẹsẹ mi ji mi,
'Gbana l'o f'ireti ọrun
M'ara mi ya.

Ẹnu ko le sọ ibukun
Ti mo nri f'aini mi gbogbo
Agbara, itunu, ati
Alafia.

verses.english:
Hush'd is each doubt; gone every fear,
My spirit seems in heaven to stay;
And ev'n the penitential tear
Is wiped away.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹru at' Iyemeji tan,
Ọkan mi f'ọrun se ile
Omije 'ronupiwada
L'a nu kuro.

verses.english:
Lord, till I reach your blissful shore,
No privilege so dear shall be,
As thus my inmost soul to pour
In pray'r to Thee.
verses.yoruba:
Titi uno de 'lẹ 'bukun na,
Ko s'anfani t'o le dun bi
Ki nma tu ọkan mi fun Ọ
Nin' adura!

title.english: May The Grace Of Christ Our Saviour

verses.english:
May the grace of Christ our Saviour
And the Father's boundless love,
With the Holy Spirit's favour,
Rest upon us from above.
Thus may we abide in union
With each other and the Lord,
And possess, in sweet communion,
Joys which earth cannot afford.
verses.yoruba:
K'ore ọfẹ Krist' Oluwa,
Ifẹ Baba ail'opin,
Oju rere Ẹmi mimọ,
K'o t'oke ba s'ori wa;
Bayi l'a le wa n'irẹpọ
Awa ati Oluwa;
K'a si le ni 'dapọ didun,
At'ayọ t'aye ko ni.

title.english: Love Divine, All Love Excelling

verses.english:
Love divine, all loves excelling,
Joy of heav'n, to earth come down;
Fix in us thy humble dwelling,
All thy faithful mercies crown.
verses.yoruba:
Ifẹ ọrun, alail'ẹgbẹ,
Ayọ ọrun sọkalẹ,
Fi ọkan wa se 'bugbe Rẹ,
Se asetan anu Rẹ.

verses.english:
Jesus, Thou art all compassion,
Pure, unbounded love Thou art,
Visit us with Thy salvation,
Enter every trembling heart.
verses.yoruba:
Jesu Iwọ ni alanu,
Iwọ l'onibu ifẹ,
Fi igbala Rẹ bẹ wa wo,
M'ọkan ẹru wa duro.

verses.english:
Come, Almighty to deliver,
Let us all Thy grace receive
Suddenly return, and never,
Never more Thy temples leaves.
verses.yoruba:
Wa, Olodumare, gba wa,
Fun wa l'ore-ọfẹ Rẹ,
L'ojiji ni k'o pada wa,
Ma si fi wa silẹ mọ.

verses.english:
Thee we would be always blessing,
Serve Thee as thy hosts above,
Pray, and praise Thee, without ceasing,
Glory in Thy perfect love.
verses.yoruba:
Iwọ l'a o ma yin titi,
Bi wọn ti nse ni ọrun,
Iyin wa ki yoo lopin,
A o s'ogo n'nu 'fẹ Rẹ.

verses.english:
Finish then Thy new creation,
Pure and spotless let us be,
Let us see Thy great salvation,
Perfectly restor'd in Thee.
verses.yoruba:
S'asepe awa ẹda Rẹ,
Jẹ k'a wa lailabawọn,
K'ari titobi 'gbala Rẹ
Li aritan ninu Rẹ.

verses.english:
Chang'd from glory into glory,
Till in heav'n we take our place,
Till we cast our crowns before
Thee,Lost in wonder, love, and praise.
verses.yoruba:
Mu wa lat'ogo de ogo
Titi de ibugbe wa,
T'ao fi ade wa juba Rẹ,
N'iyanu ifẹ iyin

title.english: Pray, Always Pray, The Holy Spirit Pleads

verses.english:
Pray, always pray; the Holy Spirit pleads,
Within thee all thy daily hourly needs.

Pray, always pray; beneath sin's heaviest load
Prayer sees the blood from Jesus' side that flow'd.

Pray, always pray; though weary, faint, and lone,
Prayer nestles by the Father's shelt'ring throne.

Pray, always pray; amid the world's tur-moi,
I Prayer keeps the heart at rest,and nerves for toil.

Pray, always pray; if joys thy pathway throng,
Prayer strikes the harp and sings the angels' song.

Pray, always pray; if loved one pass the veil,
Prayer drinks with them of springs that cannot fail.

All earthly things with earth shall fade away,
Prayer grasps eternity, pray, always pray.
verses.yoruba:
Gbogb' ohun aye y'o b'aye kọja,
Adura wa titi:
Ma gbadura.

title.english: Bless Thou Our Homes And Family

verses.english:
Bless Thou our homes and family and our brethren /2ce
The heavenly blessings and thy present help,
Thy heavenly blessings, O give unto us all.
Now give unto us, in this world and heav'n,
Father of heav'n.
verses.yoruba:
Bukun 'le wa at'ẹbi wa, at'ara wa /2ce
Ibukun ọrun, iranwọ Rẹ,
Ibukun ọrun ko fi kari awa,
K'O fi fun wa o, l'aye lọrun o,
Baba ọrun.

verses.english:
Now refresh us powerful Lord, and care for us /2ce
With Thy comfort Lord, and Thy perfect peace,
With Thy preserv'd care, O Lord take care of us,
We beseech Thee Lord, to answer our pray'rs,
Glorious King.
verses.yoruba:
Tuwalara, Alagbara se 'tọju wa /2ce
Itunu Rẹ, Alafia Rẹ,
Ikẹ Rẹ, k'o fi tọju wa ye,
Awa mbẹ Ọ o, gbọ adura wa,
Ọba ogo.

verses.english:
Father give us Holy Spirit and Thy power /2ce
Thou servant of heav'n, and the Gift from heav'n,
The comfort of Father come into our hearts,
Let Him dwell in us, and give us Thy joy,
King of heaven.
verses.yoruba:
Baba fun wa l'Ẹmi Mimọ at'agbara /2ce
Iransẹ ọrun, ẹbun lat'ọrun
Itunu Baba, k'o wọnu ọkan wa,
k'o gbe 'nu wa o, k'o fun wa l'ayọ,
Ọba ọrun.

verses.english:
We give praise and thanks unto heav'nly Father /2ce
Praise for present help, and for Thy mercies,
And the joy for sparing our lives day by day,
We give thanks to Thee, and we honour Thee,
Thou our Father.
verses.yoruba:
Awa f'iyin at'ore fun Baba l'ọrun /2ce
Iyin fun 'ranwọ, ọpẹ fun anu,
Ayọ fun 'dasi ti a nri lọjọjọ,
Ọpẹ fun Ọ ọ, a tun juba Re,
Baba awa.

title.english: O Jesus Thou Lamb Of God

verses.english:
O Jesus Thou Lamb of God
Thou who endured agony,
Thou hast done Thy Father's will
By Thy forgiveness of sins,
We now seek for Thy mercy
And from the guilt of our sins,
Take us to Thy place of joy,
And at last, to live with Thee.
verses.yoruba:
Jesu, 'wọ Ọd'agutan,
Ti O fara da 'rora,
'Wọ t'O se 'fẹ Baba Rẹ
Ni fifi ẹsẹ wa ji;
Awa ntọrọ anu Rẹ
Ninu ẹbi ẹsẹ wa;
Mu wa de ile ayọ,
Ni 'kẹhin, k'a ba Ọ gbe.

verses.english:
In the trouble of this world
Be Thou our helper O Lord,
Save us from all temptations
And from all our enemies,
Let us know Thy death's value
That Thou died upon the cross,
Every time let our souls be
Thy sufferings to remember.
verses.yoruba:
Ni 'gba idamu aye,
Ma j'Oluranlọwọ wa,
Yo wa ninu idanwo
Ati l'ọwọ ọta wa;
Jẹ k'a mọ riri 'ku Rẹ
Lori 'gi agbelebu,
'Gba qbogbo, jẹ k'ọkan wa
Ma ranti iya t'O jẹ.

verses.english:
Let Thy love abide in us
And all souls which have now stray'd,
Teach them to know Thy sweetness
Thy life and resurrection,
Which Thy death hath brought for them
And at last, that they may be,
Participants of Thy grace
And for ever reign with Thee.
verses.yoruba:
Mu ki ifẹ Rẹ wa n'nu
Gbogbo ọkan ti nsako,
Mu wọn mọ adun ati
Iye ati ajinde,
T'iku Rẹ mu wa fun wọn,
Tobe, nikẹhin ki wọn
Ba le jẹ alajọpin
Ijọba ayeraye.

title.english: We Love The Place, O God

verses.english:
We love the place, O God,
Wherein Thine honour dwells,
The joy of Thine abode,
All earthly joy excels.
verses.yoruba:
Ọlọrun awa fẹ
Ile t'ọla Rẹ wa;
Ayọ ibugbe Rẹ,
Ju gbogbo ayọ lọ.

verses.english:
It is the house of prayer,
Wherein Thy servants meet;
And Thou, O Lord, art there,
Thy chosen flock to greet.
verses.yoruba:
Ile adura ni,
Fun awọn ọmọ Rẹ;
Jesu o wa nibẹ,
Lati gbo ebe wa.

verses.english:
We love the sacred font,
For there the Holy Dove
Pours out, as He is wont,
The effluence from above.
verses.yoruba:
Awa fẹ isun Rẹ
Nibẹ l'Ẹmi Mimọ
'Tu or'-ọfẹ jade
Gegebi t'igba ni.

verses.english:
We love our Father's board,
Oh what on earth so dear!
Where faithful hearts, O Lord,
Still find Thy presence near.
verses.yoruba:
Awa fẹ ase Rẹ
Kil'o dun to laye?
Nib' awọn olotọ
Nri Ọ ni 'tosi wọn.

verses.english:
We love the word of life,
The word that tells of peace,
Of comfort in the strife,
And joys that never cease.
verses.yoruba:
A fẹ Ọrọ iye,
Ti nso t'alafia,
T'itunu n'nu ija
Atayọ tiki tan.

verses.english:
We love to sing below,
For mercies freely given;
But oh! we long to know
The triumph-song of heaven.
verses.yoruba:
A fẹ kọrin anu,
T'a nri gba l'aye yi:
Sugbon awa fẹ mọ
Orin ayọ t'ọrun.

verses.english:
Lord Jesus, give us grace,
On earth to love Thee more,
In heaven to see Thy face,
And with Thy saints adore.
verses.yoruba:
Jesu Oluwa wa,
Bu si 'fẹ wa n'ihin;
K'a r'oju Rẹ l'ọrun
K'a ba 'wọn mimọ sin.

title.english: There Is An Eye That Never Sleeps
title.yoruba: Oju Kan Mbẹ Ti Ki Togbe

verses.english:
There is an eye that never sleeps
Beneath the wing of night;
There is an ear that never shuts,
When sink the beams of light.
verses.yoruba:
Oju kan mbẹ ti ki togbe
Nigbat' ilẹ ba su,
Eti kan si mbẹ ti k'ise
'Gbati orun ba wọ.

verses.english:
There is an arm that never tires,
When human strength gives way;
There is a love that never fails,
When earthly loves decay.
verses.yoruba:
Apa kan mbẹ ti ko le rẹ
'Gba 'pa eniyan pin;
Ifẹ kan mbẹ ti ko le ku
'Gba 'fẹ aye ba ku.

Oju na nwo awọn Seraf!
Apa na d'orun mu;
Eti na kun f'orin angẹl'
Ifẹ na ga l'oke.

verses.english:
But there's a pow'r, which man can wield,
When mortal aid is vain
That eye, that arm, that love to reach,
That list'ning ear to gain.
verses.yoruba:
Ipa kan l'eniyan le lo,
'Gbat' ipa gbogbo pin,
Lati ri oju at'apa
Ati ifẹ la na.

verses.english:
That pow'r is pray'r, which soars on high,
Through Jesus to the throne,
And moves the hand, which moves the world,
To bring salvation down.
verses.yoruba:
Ipa na ni adura wa
Ti nlọ 'waju itẹ;
T'o nmi ọwọ t'o s'aye ro
Lati mu 'gbala wa.

title.english: Pass Me Not, O Gentle Saviour

verses.english:
Pass me not, O gentle Saviour,
Hear my humble cry;
While on others Thou art calling,
Do not pass me by.
verses.yoruba:
Ma kọja mi, Olugbala,
Gbo adura mi;
'Gbat' Iwọ ba np'ẹlomiran,
Mase kọja mi.

verses.english:
Let me at a throne of mercy
Find a sweet relief;
Kneeling there in deep contrition,
Help my unbelief.
verses.yoruba:
N'itẹ anu, jẹ k'emi ri
Itunu didun,
T'ẹdun t'ẹdun ni mo wọlẹ
Jọ, ran mi lọwọ.

verses.english:
Trusting only in Thy merit
Would I seek Thy face;
Heal my wounded, broken spirit,
Save me by Thy grace.
verses.yoruba:
N'igbẹkẹle itoye Rẹ
L'em' o w'oju Rẹ;
Wo 'banujẹ ọkan mi san,
F'ifẹ Rẹ gba mi.

verses.english:
Thou the spring of all my comfort,
More than life to me,
Whom have I on earth beside Thee?
Whom in heaven but Thee.
verses.yoruba:
'Wọ orisun itunu mi,
Ju 'ye fun mi lọ,
Tani mo ni l'aye lọrun?
Bikose Iwọ.

chorus.english:
Saviour! Saviour! Hear my humble cry,
And while others Thou art calling,
Do not pass me by.
chorus.yoruba:
Jesu, Jesu, gbọ adura mi,
'Gbat' Iwọ ba np'ẹlomiran,
Mase kọja mi.

title.english: Saviour, Like A Shepherd Lead Us

verses.english:
Saviour, like a shepherd lead us,
Much we need Thy tender care
In Thy pleasant pastures feed us,
For our use Thy folds prepare;
Blessed Jesus, Blessed Jesus,
Thou hast bought us, Thine we are;
Blessed Jesus, Blessed Jesus,
Thou hast bought us, Thine we are.
verses.yoruba:
Olusọ-agutan, tọ wa
Awa fẹ itọju Rẹ,
Fun wa ni ibukun t'a nfẹ,
Si pese aye fun wa,
Jesu Mimọ, Jesu Mimọ,
O ra wa, Tirẹ ni wa,
Jesu Mimọ, Jesu Mimọ,
O ra wa, Tirẹ ni wa.

verses.english:
We are Thine; do Thou befriend us
Be the Guardian of our way;
Keep Thy flock, from sin defend us
Seek us when we go astray;
Blessed Jesus, Blessed Jesus,
Hear Thy children when they pray
Blessed Jesus, Blessed Jesus,
Hear Thy children when they pray.
verses.yoruba:
Tirẹ ni wa; fi wa s'ọrẹ,
Ma se amọna fun wa,
Gba agbo Rẹ lọwọ ẹsẹ
Wa wa gba t'a ba sina,
Jesu Mimọ, Jesu Mimọ
Gbọ tiwa, gba t'a mbẹbẹ
Jesu Mimọ, Jesu Mimọ,
Gbọ tiwa, gba t'a mbẹbẹ.

verses.english:
Thou hast promised to receive us,
Poor and sinful though we be;
Thou hast mercy to relieve us,
Grace to cleanse, and make you free;
Blessed Jesus, Blessed Jesus,
Early let us turn to Thee,
Blessed Jesus, Blessed Jesus,
Early let us turn to Thee.
verses.yoruba:
'Wọ ti leri lati gba wa
B'a tilẹ jẹ ẹlẹsẹ;
Anu, ore, agbara Rẹ
To fun 'dande ẹlẹsẹ
Jesu Mimọ, Jesu Mimọ,
Jẹ ka tete rọ mọ Ọ
Jesu Mimọ, Jesu Mimọ,
Jẹ ka tete rọ mọ Ọ.

Jẹ k'a tete wa oju Rẹ,
Jẹ k'a tete se 'fẹ Rẹ,
Oluwa at' Olugbala,
Fi 'fẹ Rẹ kun ọkan wa,
Jesu Mimọ, Jesu Mimọ,
Olufẹ, ma fẹ wa si,
Jesu Mimọ, Jesu Mimọ
Olufẹ, ma fẹ wa si.

title.english: Shepherd Divine, Our Wants Relieve

verses.english:
Shepherd divine, our wants relieve
In this our evil day,
To all Thy tempted follow'rs give,
The pow'r to watch and pray.
verses.yoruba:
Olus'agutan, tọju wa,
Li ọjọ ibi yi,
Fun gbogbo ọmọ-ẹyin Rẹ,
N'ipa lati sọna.

verses.english:
Long as our fiery trials last,
Long as the cross we bear,
O let our souls on Thee be cast
In never-ceasing prayer!
verses.yoruba:
B'igba idanwo wa ba pẹ,
T'ipọnju pọ fun wa,
Jẹk' ẹmi wa simi le Ọ,
L'adura aisimi.

verses.english:
Spirit of interceding grace,
Give us in faith to claim;
To wrestle till we see Thy face,
And know Thy hidden name.
verses.yoruba:
F'ore-ọfẹ ẹmi ẹbẹ,
Fun wa nipa 'gbagbọ,
K'a du titi a o r'oju Rẹ,
T' ao si mọ okọ Rẹ.

verses.english:
Till Thou Thy perfect love impart,
Till Thou Thyself bestow,
Be this the cry of every heart,
I will not let Thee go.
verses.yoruba:
Titi O fun wa l'ara Rẹ,
Ati ifẹ pipe,
K'eyi jẹ igbe gbogbo wa,
Nki o jẹ ki O lọ.

verses.english:
I will not let Thee go, unless
Thou tell Thy name to me,
With all Thy great salvation bless,
And make me all like Thee!
verses.yoruba:
O ki O lọ bikosepe
O s'okọ Rẹ fun mi,
K'o f'igbala Rẹ bukun mi,
Si jẹ ndabi Rẹ.

verses.english:
Then let me on the mountain-top
Behold Thy open face,
Where faith in sight is swallowed up,
And pray'r in endless praise.
verses.yoruba:
Jẹ ki nroju Rẹ kedere
'Gba m'ba d'ori-oke;
Nibi t'a r'ohun t'a gbagbọ,
T'adura di iyin.

title.english: Sweet Hour Of Prayer, Sweet Hour

verses.english:
Sweet hour of prayer!
Sweet hour of prayer!
That calls me from a world of care,
And bids me at my Father's throne
Make all my wants and wishes known;
In seasons of distress and grief,
My soul has often found relief
And oft escaped the tempter's snare
By thy return, sweet hour of prayer.

Sweet hour of prayer!
Sweet hour of prayer!
Thy wings shall my petition bear
To Him whose truth and faithfulness
Engage the waiting soul to bless;
And since He bids me seek His face
Believe His word and trust His grace,
I'll cast on Him my every care
And wait for thee, sweet hour of prayer.
verses.yoruba:
Wakati adura didun,
Iyẹ Rẹ y'o gbe ẹbẹ mi
Lọ sọd' Ẹni t'O se 'leri
Lati bukun ọkan adura,
B'O ti kọ mi ki nw' oju Rẹ,
Ki ngbẹkẹle, ki nsi gbagbọ;
Un o ko gbogb' aniyan mi le
Ni akoko adua didun.

verses.english:
Sweet hour of prayer!
Sweet hour of prayer!
May I thy consolation share,
Till, from Mount Pisgah's loft height
I view my home, and take my flight:
This robe of flesh I'll drop, and rise
To seize the everlasting prize;
And shout, while passing through the air,
Farewell, farewell, sweet hour of prayer.
verses.yoruba:
Wakati adura didun,
Jẹ ki nma r'itunu Rẹ gba
Titi un o fi d'oke Pisga
Ti un o r'ile mi l'okere;
Uno bọ agọ ara silẹ,
Un o gba ere ainipekun,
Un o kọrin bi mo ti nfo lọ!
O digbose adua didun.

title.english: Tell It To Jesus, All Of Thy Sorrow

verses.english:
Tell it to Jesus, all of thy sorrow,
All of thy cares whate'er the be;
Surely and sweetly, He will deliver,
He will sustain and comfort thee.
verses.yoruba:
Sọ gbogbo 'banujẹ rẹ fun Jesu,
Ati gbogbo aniyan rẹ;
Dajudaju yio da O n'ide,
On yio si tu ọ ninu.

verses.english:
Tell it to Jesus, He is thy Saviour,
Tell it, and His salvation see;
Do not deny Him, do not defy Him
He will sustain and comfort thee.
verses.yoruba:
So wọn fun Jesu Olugbala rẹ
Sọ wọn k'o si ri 'gbala Rẹ;
Mase sẹ Jesu, mase d'oju ti,
On yio si tu ọ ninu.

verses.english:
Tell it to Jesus, He is a refuge,
Into His arms for mercy flee;
Tell it believing, tell it receiving
Grace to sustain and comfort thee.
verses.yoruba:
Sọ wọn fun Jesu, On ni abo rẹ,
Lọ si ọdọ Rẹ fun anu;
Sọ fun Jesu, gbagbọ 'wọ o si ri
Ore-ọfẹ ati 'tunu.

chorus.english:
Tell it to Jesus,
Tell it to Jesus,
Tell it to Jesus, He will hear,
Only believe Him trust and receive Him,
He will sustain and comfort thee.

title.english: To Thee O Lord When Moring Breaks

verses.english:
To Thee O Lord when morning breaks into light,
When birds awoke and the clouds disappear,
Above the sun and in the shinning of light,
With assurance that Thou Lord art with me.
verses.yoruba:
L'ọdọ Rẹ sibẹ nigba t'ojumọ,
Ti awọn ẹyẹ ji, ti kuku lọ;
Rekoja t'orun ni didan imọlẹ,
Idaloju pe, 'O wa lọdọ mi'.

verses.english:
And when weariness makes my soul slumbering,
Then my request I will bring unto Thee,
O how sweet is the sleep under Thy shadow,
But to wake and to see TheeThou sweetest.
verses.yoruba:
Nigbati arẹ mu ọkan mi togbe,
O kọ 'ju si Ọ ninu adura;
Orun na, ti dun to labe iji Rẹ,
Sugbọn k'a ji k'a ri Ọ dun julọ.

verses.english:
And so it shall be on the morn of the end,
When soul shall rise and the clouds disappear,
And then in beauty that exceed the sunshine,
Thoughts that 'I am with thee' shall now revive.
verses.yoruba:
Bẹni, yoo ri l'owurọ ikẹyin ni,
Ti ọkan ji, ti kuku aye lọ;
Gbana ninu ewa t'o ta t'orun yọ
Ero, 'mo wa pẹlu rẹ' yoo sọji.

title.english: What A Friend We Have In Jesus
title.yoruba: Ọrẹ Wo L'a Ni Bi Jesu

verses.english:
What a Friend we have in Jesus
All our sins and griefs' to bear,
What a privilege to carry
Everything to God in prayer!
O what peace we often forfeit
O what needless pain we bear,
All because we do not carry
Everything to God in prayer!
verses.yoruba:
Ọrẹ wo l'a ni bi Jesu,
Ti o ru 'banuje wa;
Anfani wo l'o pọ bayi
Lati ma gbadura si,
Alafia púpọ̀ l'a nsọnu,
A si ti jẹ 'rora pọ,
N'tori a ko nfi gbogbo nkan
S'adura niwaju Rẹ.

verses.english:
Have we trials and temptations!
Is there trouble anywhere?
We should never be discouraged,
Take it to the Lord in prayer,
Can we find a friend so faithful,
Who will all our sorrows share?
Jesus knows our every weakness,
Take it to the Lord in prayer.

Are we weak and heavy-laden,
Cumbered with a load of care?
Precious Saviour, still our refuge,
Take it to the Lord in prayer
Do thy friends despise, forsake thee?
Take it to the Lord in prayer;
In His arms He'll take and shield thee,
Thou wilt find a solace there.
verses.yoruba:
Eru ha nwọ wa l'ọrun bi?
Aniyan ha pọ fun wa?
Olugbala jẹ abo wa,
Sa gbadura s'Oluwa;
Awọn ọrẹ ha ṣa o ti,
Sa gbadura s'Oluwa,
Y'o gbe ọ s'oke l'apa Rẹ,
Iwọ y'o si ni ìtùnú.

title.english: There Shall Be Showers Of Blessing

verses.english:
'There shall be showers of blessing',
This is the promise of love;
There shall be seasons refreshing,
Sent from the Saviour above.
verses.yoruba:
'Ojo ibukun y'o sì rọ',
Ìlérí ìfẹ l'eyi,
A o ni itura didun,
Lat'ọdọ Olugbala.

verses.english:
'There shall be showers of blessing',
Precious reviving again;
Over the hills and the valleys,
Sound of abundance of rain.
verses.yoruba:
'Ojo ibukun y'o sì rọ',
Isọji iyebiye;
L'ori oke on pẹtẹlẹ
Iro ọpọ ojo mbọ.

verses.english:
'There shall be showers of blessing',
Sent them upon us, O Lord!
Grant to us now a refreshing;
Come, and now honour Thy word.
verses.yoruba:
'Ojo ibukun y'o sì rọ',
Rán wọn sí wa, Olúwa;
Fún wa ni itura didun,
Wa f'ọla fún ọrọ Rẹ.

verses.english:
'There shall be showers of blessing',
Oh that today they might fall,
Now as to God we're confessing,
Now as on Jesus we call
verses.yoruba:
'Ojo ibukun y'o sì rọ',
Iba jẹ le rọ loni!
B'a tinjẹwọ f'Ọlọrun wa,
T'a npe orukọ Jesu.

chorus.english:
Showers of blessing,
Showers of blessing we need;
Mercy drops round us are falling,
But for the showers we plead.
chorus.yoruba:
Ojo ibukun,
Ojo ibukun l'a nfẹ,
Iri anu nsẹ yi wa ka,
Ṣugbọn ojo l'a ntọrọ.

title.english: A Few More Years Shall Row

verses.english:
A few more years shall roll,
A few more seasons come,
And we shall be with those that rest,
Asleep within the tomb.
verses.yoruba:
Lẹyin ọdun diẹ,
Lẹyin Igba diẹ,
A o ko wa jọ pẹl' awọn,
Ti o sun ni 'boji.

verses.english:
A few more suns shall set,
O'er these dark hills of time,
And we shall be where suns are not,
A far serener clime.
verses.yoruba:
Lẹyin ọjọ diẹ,
L'aye okunkun yi,
A o de 'bi orun ko si mọ,
Ile daradara.

verses.english:
A few more storms shall beat,
On this wild rocky shore,
And we shall be where tempests cease,
And surges swell no more.
verses.yoruba:
Lẹyin iji diẹ,
L'ebute giga yi,
A o de b 'igbi ko si mọ,
Ti irumi ko si.

verses.english:
A few more struggles here,
A few more partings o'er,
A few more toils, a few more tears
And we shall weep no more.
verses.yoruba:
Lẹyin 'yọnu diẹ,
Lẹyin 'pinya diẹ,
Lẹyin isẹ on omije,
A ki o sọkun mọ.

verses.english:
A few more Sabbaths here,
Shall cheer us on our way,
And we shall reach the endless rest.
The eternal Sabbath day.
verses.yoruba:
Ọjọ 'simi diẹ,
L'a ni tun ri l'aye,
A o de ibi isimi
Tiki o pin laelae.

verses.english:
'Tis but a little while,
And He shall come again,
Who died that we might live, who lives,
That we with Him may reign.
verses.yoruba:
Ọjọ diẹ l'o ku,
On o tun pada wa,
Ẹniti O ku, k'awa le pe
K'a ba le ba jọba.

chorus.english:
Then, O my Lord, prepare
My soul for that great day;
O wash me in Thy precious blood,
And take my sins away.
chorus.yoruba:
Oluwa, mu mi yẹ
Fun ọjọ nlanla na;
Jọ, wẹ mi ninu ẹjẹ Rẹ,
Si ko ẹsẹ mi lọ.

title.english: Almighty, Thou God Of Our Peace

verses.english:
Almighty, Thou God of our peace
Decreed that the year roll by;
The children have come to thank Thee
For the new year just begun,
Praise ye the Lord,
The great king who spared our lives.
verses.yoruba:
Oluwa alafia wa
L'O pasẹ t'ọdun yipo;
Awa ọmọ Rẹ wa dupẹ,
F'ọdun tuntun t'a bẹrẹ
Yin Oluwa!
Ọba la t'O da wa si.

verses.english:
We thank Thee for our protection
In the year that has just passed,
We implore Thee for Thy help, Lord
For us all in this new year,
Let Thy flock here,
Keep growing in Jesus Christ.
verses.yoruba:
A dupẹ fun ipamọ wa
Ni ọdun ti o kọja;
A mbẹbẹ iranlọwọ Rẹ
Fun gbogbo wa l'ọdun yi
Jẹ k'ijọ wa
Ma dagba ninu Kristi.

verses.english:
May the adults prepare themselves
To serve with one heart this year,
May the young ones too be ready
To seek God with all their hearts.
May the Lord's peace,
Be the crown of this new year.
verses.yoruba:
K'agba k'o mura lati sin
L'ọkan kan ni dun yi;
K'awọn ọmọde k'o mura
Lati s'afẹri Jesu,
K'alafia
K'o se ade ọdun yi.

verses.english:
May the Holy Ghost from on high
Come upon us this new year;
May the pastor and the teacher
And all the congregation,
Prepare themselves,
To do service for the Lord.
verses.yoruba:
K'Ẹmi Mimọ lat'oke wa,
Ba le wa ni ọdun yi;
Ki Alufa at'Olukọ,
Pẹlu gbogbo Ijọ wa
Mura giri
Lati jọsin f'Oluwa.

title.english: Another Year Has Rolled By

verses.english:
Another year has rolled by
The time flies so quickly by,
This year which is to pass by
May be the last year for some,
It's Thy mercy kept us through
Have we been benefited?
We should ask, are we prepar'd
If we are call'd home this year?
verses.yoruba:
Ọdun miran ti kọja
Wawa l'akoko na lọ,
Ninu eyi t'a wa yi
Yio s'arimọ opọ;
Anu l'o fi da wa si,
A ha lo anu na bi?
K'a bi 'ra wa ba se tan?
B'a o pe wa l'ọdun-ni.

verses.english:
This world is a battle ground,
Thousands are falling down dead,
The arrows of death that fly
Can be sent to me, to you
When the word is preached, we hear
Help our hearts to meditate,
Eternity's close at hand
We are standing on the brink.
verses.yoruba:
Aye bi ibi ija,
Ẹgbẹgbẹrun l'o nsubu;
Ọfa iku l'o si nfo,
Ale ran s'emi b'iwọ;
Nigb'a nwasu t'a si ngbọ
Oluwa jẹ k'asaro
P'ayeraye sunmọle
A nduro l'eti, bebe.

verses.english:
If we are saved from our sins
By the grace of God divine,
We shall hear Him say, 'Come home',
May we see His face in heav'n,
For Thy people here on earth
Grant us mercy this new year,
The year that's more full of joy
Is the one that sees them homes.
verses.yoruba:
B'a gba wa lọwọ ẹsẹ
Nipa ore-ọfẹ Rẹ,
Njẹ 'ma bo n'ipe o jẹ,
K'ale lọ, k'a r'oju Rẹ,
F'eniyan Rẹ l'aye yi
K'anu wa l'ọdun titun;
Ọdun to l'ayọ ju yi,
L'eyi t'o mu wọn de'le.

title.english: Father, Let Me Dedicate

verses.english:
Father, let me dedicate
All this year to Thee,
In whatever worldly state
Thou wilt have me be;
Not from sorrow, pain or care
Freedom dare I claim;
This alone shall be my pray'r
Glorify thy name.
verses.yoruba:
Baba je nya ọdun yi
Si mimọ fun Ọ,
N'ipokipo t'o wu Ọ
Lati fi mi si,
Nko gbọdọ kọ 'banujẹ
Tabi irora,
Eyi sa l'adura mi,
Ogo f'okọ Rẹ.

verses.english:
Can a child presume to choose
Where or how to live?
Can a father's love refuse
All the best to give?
More Thou givest every day
Than the best can claim,
Nor with holdest aught that may
Glorify thy name.
verses.yoruba:
Ọm' ọwọ ha le pasẹ
'Biti on y'o gbe?
Ifẹ Baba le du ni
L'ẹbun rere bi?
'Jojumọ n'iwọ nfun wa
Ju b'a ti bere,
Laidu wa l'ohun t'o le
Gbe okọ Rẹ ga.

verses.english:
If in mercy thou with spare
Joys that yet are mine;
If on life, serene and fair
Brighter rays may shine;
Let my glad heart, while it sings,
Thee in all proclaim
And whate'er the future brings,
Glorify thy name.
verses.yoruba:
Ninu anu, b'Iwọ ba
Fun mi, li ayọ,
To jẹ k'ẹwa aye mi
Tubọ tan jade,
Jẹ k'ọkan mi ma f'ayọ
Kọrin iyin Rẹ,
Ohun t'ọla ba mu wa,
'Ogo f'okọ Rẹ'.

verses.english:
If thou callest to the cross,
And its shadow come,
Turning all my gain to loss
Shrouding heart and home;
Let me think how Thy dear Son
To His glory came,
And in deepest woe pray on,
Glorify thy name.
verses.yoruba:
B'O mu 'pọnju wa ba mi,
T'ọna mi s'okun
T'ere mi di adanu,
Ti ile mi kan;
Jẹ ki nranti bi Jesu
Se de 'nu ogo,
Ki nabadura n'nu 'pọnju,
'Ogo f'okọ Rẹ'.

title.english: My Times Are In Thy Hand

verses.english:
My times are in Thy hand,
My God, I wish them there;
My life, my friends, my soul I leave
Entirely to Thy care.
verses.yoruba:
Igba mi d'ọwọ Rẹ,
Mo fẹ k'O wa nibẹ;
Mo f'ara, ọrẹ, ẹmi mi,
Si abẹ isọ Rẹ.

verses.english:
My times are in Thy hand,
Whatever they may be,
Pleasing  painful dark or bright,
As best may seem to Thee.
verses.yoruba:
Igba mi d'ọwọ Rẹ,
Eyi to wu k'o jẹ,
Didun ni tabi kikoro
B'O ba ti ri p'o tọ.

verses.english:
My times are in Thy hand,
Why should I doubt or fear?
A Father's hand will never cause
His child a needless tear.
verses.yoruba:
Igba mi d'ọwọ Rẹ,
Emi y'o se bẹru?
Baba ki o jẹk' ọmọ Rẹ
Sọkun li anidi.

verses.english:
My times are in Thy hand,
Jesus the crucified;
The hand my cruel sins had pierced
Is now my guard and guide.
verses.yoruba:
Igba mi d'ọwọ Rẹ,
Jesu t'a kan mọ gi;
Ọwọ na t'ẹsẹ mi dalu
Wadi alabo mi.

verses.english:
My times are in Thy hand,
I'll always trust in Thee,
And after death at Thy right hand
I shall for ever be.
verses.yoruba:
Igba mi d'ọwọ Rẹ,
'Wo ni uno gbẹkẹle,
Lẹyin iku, lọw' ọtun Rẹ
L'em'o wa titi lae.

title.english: O God Of Bethel, By Whose Hand

verses.english:
O God of Bethel, by whose hand
Thy people still are fed;
Who through this weary pilgrimage
Hast all our fathers led.
verses.yoruba:
Ọlọrun Bẹtẹl' ẹni ti
O mbọ awọn Tirẹ,
Ẹnit'o mu baba wa la
Ọjọ aye wọn ja.

verses.english:
Our vows, our pray'rs, we now present
Before Thy throne of grace;
God of our fathers, be the God
Of their succeeding race.
verses.yoruba:
A mu ẹjẹ at' ẹbẹ wa
Wa iwaju 'tẹ Rẹ,
Ọlọrun awọn baba wa
Ma jẹ Ọlọrun wa.

Ninu idamu aye yi
Ma to isisẹ Wa,
Fun wa ni onjẹ ọjọ wa
At'asọ t'o yẹ wa.

verses.english:
O spread Thy cov'ring wings around,
Till all our wand'rings cease,
And at our Father's lov'd abode
Our souls arrive in peace.
verses.yoruba:
Na ojiji' yẹ Rẹ bo wa
Tit'ajo wa opin,
Ati ni 'bugbe Baba wa,
Ọkan wa o simi.

verses.english:
Such blessings from Thy gracious hand
Our humble pray'rs implore;
And Thou shalt be our chosen God,
And portion evermore.
verses.yoruba:
Iru ibukun bi eyi
L'a mbere l'ọwọ Rẹ,
Iwọ o jẹ Ọlọrun wa,
At' ipin wa laelae.

title.english: O God, Our Help In Ages Past

verses.english:
O God, our help in ages past,
Our hope for years to come,
Our shelter from the stormy blast,
And our eternal home.
verses.yoruba:
Ọlọrun t'ọdun to kọja,
Iret' evi ti mbọ,
Ib'isadi wa ni iji,
At'ile wa laelae.

verses.english:
Under the shadow of Thy throne,
Still may we dwell secure;
Sufficient is Thine arm alone,
And our defence is sure.
verses.yoruba:
L'abẹ ojiji ite Rẹ,
L'awọn eniyan Rẹ ngbe,
Tito l'apa Rẹ nikanso,
Abo wa si daju.

verses.english:
Before the hills in order stood,
Or earth received her frame,
From everlasting Thou art God,
To endless years the same.
verses.yoruba:
K'awọn oke k'o to duro,
Tabi k'a to d'aye,
Laelae Iwo ni Ọlọrun,
Bakanna, l'ailopin.

verses.english:
A thousand ages in Thy sight,
Are like an evening gone,
Short as the watch that ends the night,
Before the rising sun.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹgbẹrun dun l'oju'Rẹ,
Bi alẹ kan l'o ri;
B'iso kan l'afẹmọjumọ,
Ki orun k'o to la.

verses.english:
Time, like an ever-rolling stream,
Bears all its sons away,
They fly forgotten, as a dream,
Dies at the opening day.
verses.yoruba:
Ọjọ wa bi odo sisan,
Ọpọ l'o si ngbe lọ;
Wọn nlọ, wọn di eni 'gbagbe,
Bi ala ti a nrọ.

verses.english:
O God, our help in ages past,
Our hope for years to come,
Be Thou our guard while life shall last,
And our perpetual home.
verses.yoruba:
Ọlọrun t'ọdun t'o kọja,
Iret' eyi ti mbọ,
Ma s'abo wa 'gba 'yọnu de,
At' ile wa laelae.

title.english: Standing At The Portal Of The Op'ning

verses.english:
Standing at the portal of the op'ning year,
Lords of comfort meet us hushing ev'ry fear,
Spoken through the silence by our Father's voice,
Tender, strong, and faithful making us rejoice.
verses.yoruba:
N'ibẹrẹ ọdun yi, ọdun titun yi,
Ọrọ itunu de, ti nle ẹru lo,
Ohun kẹjẹ jẹjẹ, ti Baba Ọrun,
Ododo l'ọrọ na, ti nm'ọkan wa yo.

verses.english:
I, the Lord, am with thee be thou not afraid!
I will help and strengthen be thou not dismayed!
Yea, I will uphold thee with My own right hand,
Thou art called and chosen in My sight to stand.
verses.yoruba:
'Ma bẹru? L'ọrọ na,
Mo wa pẹlu yin'
Emi n'iranwo yin at'agbara yin,
Emi y'o di yin mu, li ọwọ 'tun mi,
Mo pe yin, mo yan yin, lati jẹ temi.

verses.english:
For the year before us o what rich supplies!
For the poor and needy Living streams shall rise,
For the sad and sinful shall His grace abound,
For the faint and feeble perfect strength be found.
verses.yoruba:
Fun ọpọ ọdun ti mbẹ niwaju wa,
Ọpọ ni ipese t'o ti seleri,
Ipese f'alaini, f'awọn ẹlẹsẹ,
F'awọn t'a npọn loju, fun alailera.

verses.english:
He will never fail us He will not forsake,
His eternal cov'nant He will never break!
Resting on His promise what have we to fear?
God is all-sufficient for the coming year.
verses.yoruba:
Ko jẹ fi wa silẹ, ko si ni kọ wa,
Majẹmu Rẹ daju ti ko le yẹ lae,
A rọ mọ 'leri yi, ẹru ko bawa,
Ọlọrun wa ti to, fun ọdun ti mbọ.

chorus.english:
Onward, then, amd fear not
Children of the day,
For His Word shall never
Never pass away!
chorus.yoruba:
Ẹ ma tẹsiwaju,
Ọmọ imọlẹ,
Ọrọ Rẹ ko le yẹ,
O nduro titi.

title.english: All Glory, Laud And Honour

verses.english:
Thou art the King of Israel,
Thou David's royal Son,
Who in the Lord's name comest,
The King and blessed One.
verses.yoruba:
'Wọ l'Ọba Israẹli,
Ọm'alade Dafid'
T'O wa l'okọ Oluwa;
Ọba Olubukun.

verses.english:
The company of the angels
Are praising Thee on high,
And mortal men and all things
Created make reply.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹgbẹ awọn Maleka
Nyin Ọ l'oke giga;
Awa at'ẹda gbogbo
Si dapọ gbe 'rin na.

verses.english:
The people of the Hebrews
With palms before Thee went;
Our praise, and prayer, and anthems
Before Thee we present.
verses.yoruba:
Awọn Heberu lọ s'aju
Pẹlu imọ ọpẹ;
Iyin, adua at' orin,
L'a mu wa 'waju rẹ.

verses.english:
To Thee before Thy passion
They sang their hymns of praise,
To Thee now high exalted
Our melody we raise.
verses.yoruba:
Si Ọ s'aju iya Rẹ,
Wọn kọrin yin wọn!
'Wọ t'agbega nisiyi
L'a nkọrin yin si.

verses.english:
Thou didst accept their praises,
Accept the prayers we bring,
Who in all good delightest,
Thou good and gracious King.
verses.yoruba:
'Wọ gba orin yin wọn,
Gb'adura t'a mu wa,
'Wọ ti nyọ s'ohun rere,
Ọba wa Olore.

chorus.english:
All glory laud, and honour
To Thee Redeemer King,
To whom the lips of children,
Made sweet hosannas ring!
chorus.yoruba:
Gbogb' ogo, iyin, ọla
Fun Ọ Oludande,
S'Ẹni t'awọn ọmọde
Nkọ Hosanna didun!

title.english: Hosanna Unto David's Son

verses.english:
Hosanna unto David's Son,
Hosanna, raise the strain,
For blessed is He that will come,
In the name of the Lord.
verses.yoruba:
'Hosana s'Ọmọ Dafidi'
Hosana! Ẹ kọrin!
'Olubukun l'Ẹni ti mbọ
Lorukọ Oluwa'.

verses.english:
Hosanna unto David's Son
The angel host did sing,
All creatures, join the loud refrain:
Hosanna to our King.
verses.yoruba:
'Hosana s'Ọmọ Dafidi'
L'ẹgbẹ Angẹli nke;
Gbogb' ẹda, ẹ jumọ gberin:
Hosana! s'Ọba wa.

verses.english:
Hosanna for the Hebrew throng
Spread palm fronts on the road,
Hosanna we have brought our gifts
For to prepare His way.
verses.yoruba:
Hosana! Awọn Heberu
Ja im'ọpọ s'ọna;
Hosana! A mu ebun wa
Fi tun ọna Re se.

verses.english:
Both young and old sing hosanna 
Before His suffering comes,
Today we all sing hosanna
As Jesus reigns above.
verses.yoruba:
T'agba t'ewe nke, Hosana!
K'ijiya rẹ to de;
L'oni, a si nke Hosana!
B'o ti njọba loke.

verses.english:
As Thou received the children's praise
Accept the prayers we bring,
And join the heavenly host to sing,
Hosanna to our King.
verses.yoruba:
B'o ti gba 'yin wọn nigbana,
Jọ, gba ẹbẹ wa yi,
Lọrun, k'a le b'Angẹl' kọrin,
Hosana s'Ọba wa.

title.english: Redemption! Oh, Wonderful Story

verses.english:
Redemption! Oh, wonderful story
Glad message for you and for me
That Jesus has purchased our pardon
And paid all the debt on the tree.
verses.yoruba:
Irapada! Itan Iyanu,
Ihin ayọ fun gbogbo wa,
Jesu ti ra 'dariji fun wa,
O san 'gbese na lor'igi.

Omu wa t'inu 'ku bo si'ye,
O si sọ wa d'ọm'Ọlọrun;
Orisun kan si fun elese,
Wẹ nin'ẹjẹ na ko si mọ.

verses.english:
No longer shall sin have dominion,
Though present to tempt and annoy;
For Christ, in His blessed redemption,
The power of sin shall destroy.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹsẹ ki y'o le jọba wa mọ,
B'o ti wu ko dan wa wo to,
Nitori Kristi fi 'rapada
Pa 'gbara ese run fun wa.

Gba anu t'Olọrun fi lọ ọ,
Sa wa s'ọdọ Jesu loni,
'Tori y'o gb'ẹni t'o ba t'ọ wa,
Ki yio si da pada lae.

chorus.english:
Believe it, O sinner, believe it,
Receive the glad message-'tis true;
Trust now in the crucified Saviour,
Salvation He offers to you.
chorus.yoruba:
A! Ẹlẹsẹ gba ihin na gbọ,
Jọ gba ihin otọ na gbọ,
Gbeke re le Olugbala rẹ,
T'O mu igbala fun ọ wa.

title.english: Children Of Jerusalem

verses.english:
Children of Jerusalem,
Sang the praise of Jesus' name,
Children, too, of modern days,
Join to sing the Saviour's praise.
verses.yoruba:
Awọn ewe Salẹmu,
Kọrin yin okọ Jesu,
Awa ewe t'isiyi,
Jumọ yin Olugbala.

verses.english:
We are taught to love the Lord,
We are taught to read His word,
We are taught the way to heav'n,
Praise for all to God be giv'n.
verses.yoruba:
A kọwa k'a f'Oluwa,
K'a si ma ka ọrọ Rẹ,
A f'ọna ọrun han wa!
Ogo ni fun Ọlọrun.

verses.english:
Parents, teachers, old and young,
All unite to swell the song;
Higher and yet higher rise,
Till hosannas reach the skies.
verses.yoruba:
K'olukọ, t'agba t'ewe,
Jumọ gbe orin na ga,
Loke-loke, k'o ma ho,
Ki Hosana de ọrun.

chorus.english:
Hark, hark, hark, while infant voices sing,
Loud hosannas, loud hosannas,
Loud hosannas to our king.
chorus.yoruba:
Gbọ, b'awọn ewe ti nkọ
Hosana si Ọba wa.

title.english: Ride On, Ride On In Majesty

verses.english:
Ride on, ride on in majesty!
Hark! All the tribes Hosanna!cry;
O Saviour meek, purse thy road,
With palms and scattered garments strow'd.
verses.yoruba:
Ma g'ẹsin lọ l'ọlanla Rẹ,
Gbọ! Gbogb'aye nke, 'Hosana'
Olugbala, Ma lọ pẹlẹ,
Lori im'ọpẹ at 'asọ.

verses.english:
Ride on, ride on in majesty!
In lowly pomp ride on to die;
O Christ, Thy triumphs now begin,
O'er captive death and conquer'd sin.
verses.yoruba:
Ma g'ẹsin lọ l'ọlanla Rẹ,
Ma f'irẹlẹ g'ẹsin lọ ku;
Kristi, 'sẹgun Rẹ bẹrẹ na,
Lori ẹsẹ ati iku.

verses.english:
Ride on, ride on in majesty!
The winged squadrons of the sky
Look down with sad and wondering eyes,
To see the approaching sacrifice.
verses.yoruba:
Ma g'ẹsin lọ l'ọlanla Rẹ,
Ogun angẹli lat'ọrun,
Nf'iyanu pẹlu ikanu,
Wo ẹbọ to sunmọle yi.

verses.english:
Ride on, ride on in majesty!
Thy last and fiercest strife is nigh;
The Father on His sapphire throne,
Expects His own anointed Son.
verses.yoruba:
Ma g'ẹsin lọ l'ọlanla Rẹ,
Ija ikẹhin na de tan,
Baba lor'itẹ Rẹ lọrun,
Nreti ayanfẹ Ọmọ Rẹ.

verses.english:
Ride on, ride on in majesty!
In lowly pomp ride on to die!
Bow Thy meek head to mortal pain,
Then take, O God, Thy power, and reign.
verses.yoruba:
Ma g'ẹsin lọ l'ọlanla Rẹ,
Ma f'irẹlẹ g'ẹsin lọ ku,
F'ara da irora f'ẹda,
Lẹyin na nde, k'O ma jọba.

title.english: Grace! 'Tis A Charming Sound

verses.english:
Grace! 'tis a charming sound,
Harmonious to the ear,
Heaven with the echo shall resound,
And all the earth shall hear.
verses.yoruba:
Ore-ọfẹ, ohun
Adun ni l'eti wa;
Gbohun-gbohun rẹ y'o gba ọrun kan
Aye y'o gbọ pẹlu.

verses.english:
'Twas grace that wrote my name
In Thy eternal book;
'Twas grace that gave me to the
Lamb, Who all my sorrows took.
verses.yoruba:
Ore-ọfẹ l'o kọ,
Orukọ mi l'ọrun
L'o fi mi fun Od'agutan,
T'O gba iya mi jẹ.

verses.english:
Grace taught my wand'ring feet
To tread the heav'nly road;
And new supplies-each hour I meet,
While pressing on to God.
verses.yoruba:
Ore-ọfẹ tọ mi,
S'ọna alafia,
O ntọju mi l'ojojumọ,
Ni irin ajọ mi.

verses.english:
Grace taught my soul to pray,
And made mine eyes o'er flow;
'Twas grace which kept me to this day,
And will not let me go.
verses.yoruba:
Ore-ọfẹ kọmi
Bi a ti'gbadura;
O pa mi mọ titi d'oni,
Kosi jẹ ki nsako.

verses.english:
Oh, let Thy grace inspire
My soul with strength Divine!
May all my pow'rs to Thee aspire,
And all my days be Thine.
verses.yoruba:
Jẹ k' ore-ọfẹ yi
F'agbara f'ọkan mi;
Ki nle fi gbogbo ipa mi
At'ọjọ mi fun Ọ.

chorus.english:
Saved by grace alone!
This is all my plea,
Jesus died for all mankind
And Jesus died for me.
chorus.yoruba:
Ore-ọfẹ sa,
N'igbẹkẹle mi,
Jesu ku fun araye,
O ku fun mi pẹlu.

title.english: There Is A Song In My Heart Today
title.yoruba: Orin Kan Mbẹ Lọkan Mi Loni

verses.english:
There is a song in my heart today,
Something I never had;
Jesus has taken my sins away,
Oh! Say but I'm glad.
verses.yoruba:
Orin kan mbẹ lọkan mi loni,
Orin ti nko ti kọ ri,
Jesu dari gbogbo ẹsẹ mi ji,
A! Inu mi dun.

verses.english:
Wonderful, marvelous love He brings,
Into a heart that's sad;
Thro darkness tunnels the soul just sings,
Oh! Say but I'm glad.
verses.yoruba:
Ifẹ iyanu la lo nfun ni,
Ọkan to ni banujẹ,
Ninu okunkun ni iwọ yo kọrin;
A! Inu mi dun.

verses.english:
We have a fellowship rich and sweet,
Tongue can never relate;
Abiding in Him is a real treat,
Oh! Say but I'm glad.

Won't you come to Him with all your care?
Weary and worn and sad?
You to will sing as His love you share,
Oh! Say but I'm glad.
verses.yoruba:
Tọ Jesu wa loni ọrẹ mi,
Iwọ to ni 'banujẹ wa;
Iwọ naa yo bu sorin ayọ,
A! Inu mi dun.

chorus.english:
Oh! Say but I'm glad, I'm glad,
Oh! Say but I'm glad,
Jesus has come and my cup's over run,
Oh! Say but I'm glad.
chorus.yoruba:
A! Inu mi dun pupọ,
Ayọ k'ọkan mi;
Jesu ti de si 'gbesi aye mi,
A! Inu mi dun.

title.english: Approach, My Soul, The Mercy-Seat

verses.english:
Approach, my soul, the mercy-seat,
Where Jesus answers, pray'r,
There humbly fall before His feet,
For none can perish there.
verses.yoruba:
Ọkan mi, sunmọ 'tẹ anu,
N'ibi Jesu ngb'ẹbẹ,
F'irẹlẹ wolẹ lẹsẹ Rẹ,
A ko segbe n'bẹ.

Ileri Rẹ ni ẹbẹ mi,
Eyi ni mo mu wa,
Iwọ npe ọkan t'ẹru npa,
Bi emi Oluwa.

verses.english:
Bow'd down beneath a load of sin,
By Satan surely press'd
By war without, and fears within,
I come to Thee for rest.
verses.yoruba:
Eru ẹsẹ wọ mi l'ọrun,
Esu nsẹ mi n'isẹ;
Ogun l'ode ẹru ninu,
Mo wa isimi mi.

verses.english:
Be Thou my shield and hiding place
That, shelter'd near Thy side,
I may my fierce accuser face,
And tell him, Thou hast died.
verses.yoruba:
Se apata at'asami,
Ki nfi Ọ se abo;
Ki nd'oju ti Olufisun,
Ki nsọ pe, Kristi ku?

verses.english:
Oh wondrous love, to bleed and die,
To bear the cross and shame,
That guilty sinners, such as I,
Might plead Thy gracious name.
verses.yoruba:
Ifẹ iyanu! Iwọ ku,
Iwọ ru itiju,
Ki ẹlẹsẹ b'iru emi,
Le bẹ l'orukọ Rẹ.

title.english: All That Draw Me I Have Left Behind

verses.english:
All that draw me I have left behind
Here in Canaan better joys I find;
Peace abiding, blessings unconfined,
For I'm living in Canaan now.
verses.yoruba:
Gbogb' ohun t'o nfa mi, mo fi 'lẹ,
Nihin ni Kenan' mo ri ayọ;
Alafia, 'bukun 'yebiye,
'Tori mo nabe Kenani n'siyi.

verses.english:
Sale abiding I will never fear,
For my Saviour ever will be near;
When I call Him He will always hear
For I'm living in Canaan now.
verses.yoruba:
Mo ngbe lail'ewu nko jẹ bẹru,
Olugbala mi wa nitosi,
'Gba mo ba pe, y'o gbadura mi,
'Tori mo nabe Kenani n'siyi.

verses.english:
I am drinking from a ceaseless well,
Here in Canaan where I love to dwell,
So to others I am glad to tell,
That I'm living in Canaan now.
verses.yoruba:
Mo mu omi kanga alaigbe,
Ni Kenani ibugbe ifẹ mi!
Emi o sọ fun ẹlomiran,
Pe emi ngbe n'ilẹ Kenant.

verses.english:
Praises ever I am glad to bring
Unto Jesus, my Redeemer, King,
For His mercies I will shout and sing,
For I'm living in Canaan now.
verses.yoruba:
Iyin ailopin ni mo mu wa,
Fun Jesu, Ọba Irapada;
Em'o kọrin ọpọ anu Rẹ,
'Tori mo ngbe Kenani n'sinyi.

chorus.english:
I am living in Canaan now,
Where the showers of blessing abound,
Where the riches of grace in plenty are found,
I am living in Canaan now.
chorus.yoruba:
Mo ngbe Kenani nisisiyi,
Ni b'ọwara ibukun gbe wa,
Nibi a ni ọpọ ọrọ or'ọfẹ,
Mo ngbe Kenani nisisiyi.

title.english: I Have Found His Grace

verses.english:
I have found His grace is all complete,
He supplieth every need;
While I sit and learn at Jesus' feet
I am free, yes, free indeed.
verses.yoruba:
Mo ti de ile ore-ọfẹ,
O to fun gbogb' aini mi,
Nigbati mo joko l'ẹsẹ Rẹ,
O si sọ mi d'om'nira.

verses.english:
I have found the pleasure I once craved,
It is joy and peace within;
What a wondrous blessing I am saved
From the awful gulf of sin.
verses.yoruba:
Mo ti de ile igbadun nla,
Alafia mbẹ ninu mi;
Ibukun ti o kunwọsilẹ,
Mo bọ l'ọwọ ẹsẹ mi.

verses.english:
I have found that hope so bright and clear,
Living in the realm of grace
Oh, the Saviour's presence is so near,
I can see His smiling face.
verses.yoruba:
Mo ti ni ireti t'o daju,
Ninu ore-ọfẹ Rẹ,
Olugbala mi mbẹ pẹlu mi,
O nrẹrin si ọmọ Rẹ.

verses.english:
I have found the joy no tongue can tell,
How its waves of glory roll!
It is like a great o'erflowing well,
Springing up within my soul.
verses.yoruba:
Mo l'ayọ ti ẹnu ko le sọ,
Ogo ayọ na npọ si
Bi kanga om'iye ninu mi,
'Jojumọ l'o ru soke.

chorus.english:
It is joy unspeakable and full of glory,
Full of glory, full of glory;
It is joy unspeakable and full of glory,
Oh, the half has never yet been told.
chorus.yoruba:
Ayọ nla ni, ayọ ti Jesu nfifun ni,
Ayọ ti ẹnu ko le sọ,
Ayọ nla ni, ayọ ti o kun fun ogo,
Ayọ ti a ko le royin tan.

title.english: Lord Jesus, Think On Me

verses.english:
Lord Jesus, think on me,
And purge away my sin,
From earth born passion set me free,
And make me pure within.
verses.yoruba:
Jesu, jọ ranti mi,
Ko si w'ẹsẹ mi nu,
Gba mi low'ẹsẹ 'binibi,
Si wẹ ọkan mi mọ.

verses.english:
Lord Jesus, think on me,
With many a care oppress'd,
Let me Thy loving servant be,
And taste thy promised rest.
verses.yoruba:
Jesu, jọ ranti mi,
Mo kun fun aniyan,
Ki njẹ 'ransẹ t'o nifẹ Rẹ,
Ki njogun 'simi Rẹ.

verses.english:
Lord Jesus, think on me,
Amid the battle's strife,
In all my pain and misery,
Be thou my health and life.
verses.yoruba:
Jesu, jọ ranti mi,
L'arin 'gbona ogun,
N'nu 'rora on banujẹ mi,
Jẹ 'lera, iye mi.

verses.english:
Lord Jesus, think on me,
Nor let me go astray;
Through darkness and perplexity,
Point Thou the heav'nly way.
verses.yoruba:
Jesu, jọ ranti mi,
Ma jẹ ki nsako lọ,
N'nu 'damu on okun aye,
F'ọna run han mi.

verses.english:
Lord Jesus, think on me,
That, when the flood is past,
I may the eternal brightness see,
And share thy joy at last.
verses.yoruba:
Jesu, jọ ranti mi,
Gbat'iji ru s'oke,
Gbati ọta wa nitosi,
Jesu, jọ sun mọ mi.

verses.english:
Lord Jesus, think on me,
That I may sing above,
To Father, Holy Ghost, and Thee,
The songs of praise and love.
verses.yoruba:
Jesu, jọ ranti mi,
'Gba gbogbo rẹ kọja,
Ki nle r'ogo ainipẹkun,
Kinsi le ba Ọ yọ.

title.english: Just As I Am Without One Plea
title.yoruba: Bi Mo Ti Ri Lai S'awawi

verses.english:
Just as I am, without one plea
But that Thy blood was shed for me
And that Thou bidd'st me come to Thee,
O Lamb of God, I come!
verses.yoruba:
Bi mo ti ri lai s'awawi,
Sugbọn nitori ẹjẹ Rẹ,
B'o si ti pe mi pe ki nwa;
Olugbala, mo de.

verses.english:
Just as I am, and waiting not
To rid my soul of one dark blot,
To Thee, whose blood can cleanse each spot,
O Lamb of God, I come!
verses.yoruba:
Bi mo ti ri, laiduro pẹ,
Mo fẹ k'ọkan mi mọ toto,
S'ọdọ Rẹ to le wẹ mi mọ,
Olugbala, mo de.

verses.english:
Just as I am, though tossed about
With many a conflict, many a doubt,
Fighting and fears within, without,
O Lamb of God, I come!
verses.yoruba:
Bi mo ti ri, b'o tilẹ jẹ
Ija l'ode, ija ninu
Ẹru l'ode, ẹru ninu,
Olugbala, mo de.

verses.english:
Just as I am, poor, wretched, blind;
Sight, riches, healing of the mind,
Yea, all I need, in Thee to find,
O Lamb of God, I come!
verses.yoruba:
Bi mo ti ri, osi are;
Mo si nwa imularada,
Iwọ lo le s'awotan mi,
Olugbala, mo de.

verses.english:
Just as I am, Thou wilt receive,
Wilt welcome, pardon, cleanse, relieve;
Because Thy promise I believe,
O Lamb of God, I come!

Just as I am - Thy love unknown
Has broken every barrier down
Now to be Thine, yea, Thine alone,
O Lamb of God, I come!
verses.yoruba:
Bi mo ti ri ifẹ Tirẹ,
L'o sẹtẹ mi patapata,
Mo di Tirẹ, Tirẹ nikan;
Olugbala, mo de.

verses.english:
Just as I am, of that free love
The breath, length, depth and height to prove,
Here for a season, then above,
O Lamb of God, I come!

title.english: Out Of My Bondage

verses.english:
Out of my bondage, sorrow and night,
Jesus I come, Jesus, I come;
Into Thy freedom, gladness and light,
Jesus I come to Thee,
Out of my sickness into Thy health
Out of my want and into Thy wealth
Out of my sin and into Thyself,
Jesus, I come to Thee.

Out of my shameful failure and loss
Jesus, I come, Jesus, I come,
Into the glorious gain of Thy cross,
Jesus, I come to Thee,
Out of earth's sorrows into Thy balm,
Out of life's storms and into Thy calm,
Out of distress to jubilant psalm,
Jesus, I come to Thee.
verses.yoruba:
Ninu 'tiju ati oro mi,
Jesu mo de, Jesu mo de,
Mo wa jere la n'nu iku Rẹ,
Jesu mo wa 'dọ Rẹ,
'Wọ ni itunu fun 'banujẹ;
'Wọ n'isimi fun gbogbo iji,
Orin dipo idanwo gbogbo,
Jesu, mo wa 'dọ Rẹ.

verses.english:
Out of unrest and arrogant pride,
Jesus, I come, Jesus, I come,
Into Thy blessed will to abide,
Jesus, I come to Thee;
Out of myself to dwell in Thy love,
Out of despair to raptures above,
Upward for aye on wings like a dove,
Jesus, I come to Thee.
verses.yoruba:
Ninu rudurudu aye yi,
Jesu mo de, Jesu mo de,
Mo wa s'abẹ asẹ anu Rẹ,
Jesu mo wa 'dọ Rẹ,
Mu mi kuro n'nu ifẹ ara,
Kuro ninu aye asan yi,
Ki nle wa fi iye fo g'oke,
Jesu, mo wa 'dọ Rẹ.

verses.english:
Out of the fear and dread of the tomb
Jesus, I come, Jesus, I come
Into the joy and light of my home,
Jesus, I come to Thee,
Out of the depths of ruin untold,
Into the peace of Thy sheltering fold,
Ever Thy glorious face to behold,
Jesus, I come to Thee.
verses.yoruba:
N'nu ẹru iku at'iboji
Jesu mo de, Jesu mo de,
Mo wa s'inu ayọ ile mi,
Jesu mo wa 'dọ Rẹ,
Lati 'nu iho iparun nla
Sinju alafia t'o jinle
Lati wa w'oju Rẹ; ologo,
Jesu, mo wa 'dọ Rẹ.

title.english: Jesus, The Sinner's Friend To Thee

verses.english:
Jesus, the sinner's friend,
To Thee, Lost and undone, for aid I flee,
Weary of earth, myself, and sin;
Open Thine arms, and take me in!
verses.yoruba:
Jesu 'wọ ọrẹ ẹlẹsẹ,
Mo wa 'ranwọ wa sọdọ Rẹ,
Aye ati ẹsẹ su mi,
Na apa Re k'O si gba mi!

verses.english:
The mansion for Thyself prepare,
Dispose my heart by ent'ring there;
Tis this alone can make me clean,
Tis this alone can cast out sin.
verses.yoruba:
Pese 'bugbe na fun 'ra Rẹ,
Fi ifẹ wọnu ọkan mi;
Bayi ni mo le di mimọ,
Ti ẹsẹ ki o ba mi gbe.

Mo jẹwọ pe agbara mi
Ko le mu mi ye ni Tirẹ;
Jesu, isẹ na Tirẹ ni,
Mo jẹwọ gbogbo rẹ fun Ọ.

verses.english:
What shall I say Thy grace to move?
Lord, I am sin, but Thou art love
I give up every plea beside
Lord, I am lost, but Thou hast died!
verses.yoruba:
Kini uno fi ro ore Rẹ?
Ẹsẹ ni mi, ifẹ ni Ọ;
Eyi nikan l'ẹbẹ mi pe
Mo segbe, sugbọn, 'Wọ ti ku!

title.english: I Hear The Saviour Say

verses.english:
I hear the Saviour say,
'Thy strength indeed is small,
Child of weakness, watch and pray,
Find in Me thine all in all'.
verses.yoruba:
Mo gbọ Jesu wipe
'Agbara rẹ kere
Alare, sọra, gbadua,
Pipe re mbẹ lọdọ mi'.

verses.english:
Lord, now indeed
I find Thy pow'r, and Thine alone,
Can change the leper's spots,
And melt the heart of stone.
verses.yoruba:
Oluwa, totọ mo mọ
P'agbara Rẹ nikan
Le s'adẹtẹ di mimọ,
Ole m'ọkan lile ro.

verses.english:
For nothing good have I,
Where-by Thy grace to claim,
I'll wash my garments white,
In the blood of Calvary's Lamb.
verses.yoruba:
Ko si 're 'kan ti mo ni
Lati ni ore Rẹ,
Em'o fọ asọ mi mọ
N'n'ẹjẹ Jesu Oluwa.

verses.english:
When from my dying bed,
My ransomed soul shall rise,
Then 'Jesus paid it all!'
Shall rend the vaulted skies.
verses.yoruba:
Gbati 'pe 'kẹyin ba dun,
To npe mi s'ọdọ Rẹ,
Jesu ti san gbogbo rẹ,
Em'o ba g'oke ọrun.

verses.english:
And when, before the throne,
I stand in Him complete,
I'll lay my trophies down,
All down at Jesus feet.
verses.yoruba:
N'iwaju 'tẹ uno duro
N'nu pipe ẹwa Kristi
Un o fi ade ogo ni
Lelẹ li ẹsẹ Jesu.

chorus.english:
Jesus paid it all,
All to Him I owe;
Sin had left a crimson stain,
He washed it white as snow.
chorus.yoruba:
Jesu san gbogbo
'Gbese ti mo jẹ,
Ẹsẹ to m'abawọn wa,
Lo ti fọ nu kuro.

title.english: Loving Saviour, Hear My Cry

verses.english:
Loving Saviour, hear my cry,
Hear my cry, hear my cry,
Trembling to Thine arms I fly;
O save me at the Cross!
I have sinn'd, but Thou hast died,
Thou hast died, Thou hast died,
In Thy mercy let me hide
O save me at the Cross!
verses.yoruba:
Olugbala gbo'hun mi
Gb'ohun mi, gb'ohun mi,
Mo wa sọdọ Rẹ, gba mi,
N'ibi agbelebu,
Èmi sẹ sugbọn O ku;
Iwọ ki, Iwọ ku,
Fi anu Rẹ pa mi mọ,
N'ibi agbelebu.

verses.english:
Tho' I perish I will pray,
I will pray, I will pray;
Thou of life the Living Way
O save me at the cross!
Thou hast said Thy grace is free,
Grace is free, grace is free,
Have compassion, Lord on me;
O save me at the Cross!
verses.yoruba:
Ẹse mi pọ lapọju,
Uno bẹbẹ! Uno bẹbẹ!
Iwọ ni ọna iye,
N'ibi agbelebu,
Ore-ọfẹ Rẹ t'a gba,
L'ọfẹ ni! L'ọfẹ ni!
F'oju anu Rẹ wo mi,
N'ibi agbelebu.

verses.english:
Wash me in Thy cleansing blood
Cleansing blood, cleansing blood;
Plunge me now beneath the flood
O save me at the Cross!
Only faith will pardon bring,
Pardon bring, pardon bring
In that faith to Thee I cling;
O save me at the Cross!
verses.yoruba:
F'ẹjẹ mimọ Rẹ wẹ mí,
Fi wẹ mí, fi wẹ mí!
Ri mi sinu ibu Rẹ,
N'ibi agbelebu,
'Gbagbọ l'o le fún wa ni
'Dariji! Dariji!
Mo f'igbagbọ rọ mọ Ọ
N'ibi agbelebu.

chorus.english:
Lord Jesus, receive me,
No more would I grieve Thee,
Now, blessed Redeemer,
O save me at the Cross!
chorus.yoruba:
Oluwa, jọ gba mi,
Nki 'yo bi Ọ ninu mọ!
Alabukun, gba mi,
N'ibi agbelebu.

title.english: I Am Not Bought With Riches
title.yoruba: A Ko Fi Ọrọ Ra Mi

verses.english:
I am not bought with riches
Neither silver nor gold,
But Christ hath redeemed me
I am safe in His fold,
In the book of His kingdom
With its pages so fair,
Through Jesus my Saviour
My name's written there?
verses.yoruba:
A ko fi ọrọ ra mi,
Fadaka on wura,
Sugbọn kristi ti ra mi,
Uno si wọ 'nu agbo;
N'nu iwe Ijọba Rẹ
Ti o lẹwa pupọ,
Sọ fun mi Oluwa mi
Okọ mi ha wa nbẹ?

verses.english:
My sins, they were many
Like the sands of the sea,
But the blood of my Saviour
Is sufficient for me,
For His promise is written
In bright letter that glow,
Tho' your sins be as scarlet
I will make them like snow.
verses.yoruba:
Oluwa, ẹsẹ mi pọ,
Bi iyanrin okun,
Sugbọn ẹjẹ Rẹ, Jesu
Tito fun gbogbo rẹ,
'Tori 'Wọ ti se 'leri
Ninu ọrọ Rẹ pe;
'B'ẹsẹ rẹ pọn b'ododo,
Uno fọ wọn fun bi owu'.

verses.english:
Oh that beautiful city
With its mansions of light,
With its glorified beings
In pure garments of white,
Where no evil thing cometh
To despoil what is fair,
Where the angels are watching
My name's written there.
verses.yoruba:
N'ilu daradara ni
At' ọpọ 'bugbe Rẹ,
Nibit' awọn mimọ wa
Nin'asọ funfun wọn,
T'ohun eri ko le de
Lati b'ẹwa rẹ jẹ,
'Bi t'awọn angeli nsọ,
Okọ mi ha wa nbẹ?

chorus.english:
My name's written there?
On the page white and fair
In the book of God's kingdom,
My name's written there?
chorus.yoruba:
Okọ mi ha wa nbẹ?
Ninu iwe la ni,
Iwe ti Ijọba Rẹ,
Okọ mi ha wa nbẹ?

title.english: No, Not Despairingly

verses.english:
No not despairingly,
Come I to Thee,
No, not distrustingly
Bend I the knee,
Sin hath gone over me,
Yet is this still my plea,
Yet is this still my plea,
Jesus hath died.
verses.yoruba:
Ki 'se l'aini 'reti,
Ni mo tọ 'wa,
Ki 'se laini 'gbagbọ,
Ni mo kunlẹ,
Ẹsẹ ti g'ori mi,
Ẹyi sa l'ẹbẹ mi
Ẹyi sa l'ẹbẹ mi,
Jesu ti ku.

verses.english:
Ah! Mine iniquity,
Crimson has been,
Infinite, infinite,
Sin upon sin,
Sin of not loving Thee,
Sin of not trusting Thee,
Sin of not trusting Thee,
Infinite sin.
verses.yoruba:
A! Ẹsẹ mi pọ ju,
O pọn kọkọ,
Ada le, ada le,
Ni mo nd'ẹsẹ;
Ẹsẹ aifẹran Rẹ,
Ẹsẹ aigba Ọ gbọ,
Ẹsẹ aigba Ọ gbọ,
Ẹsẹ nlanla.

verses.english:
Lord, I confess to Thee,
Sadly my sin,
All I am tell I Thee,
All I have been,
Purge Thou my sin away,
Wash Thou my soul this day,
Wash Thou my soul this day,
Lord, make me clean.
verses.yoruba:
Oluwa, mo jẹwọ,
Ẹsẹ nla mi,
'O mo bi mo ti ri,
Bi mo ti wa;
Jọ, wẹ ẹsẹ mi nu,
K'ọkan mi mọ loni,
K'ọkan mi mọ loni
Kindi mimọ.

verses.english:
Faithful and just art Thou,
Forgiving all;
Low at Thy pierced feet,
Saviour I fall.
Lord, let the cleansing blood,
Blood of the Lamb of God,
Blood of the Lamb of God,
Pass o'er my soul.
verses.yoruba:
Olododo ni Ọ,
O ndariji,
L'ẹsẹ agbelebu,
Ni mo wole;
Je k'ẹjẹ iwẹnu,
Ẹjẹ Od'agutan,
Ẹjẹ Od'agutan,
Wẹ ọkan mi.

verses.english:
Then all is peace and light,
This soul within;
Thus shall I walk with Thee,
The loved Unseen;
Leaning on Thee, my God,
Guided along the road,
Guided along the road,
Nothing between.
verses.yoruba:
'Gbana Alafia,
Y'o d'okan mi,
'Gbana uno ba Ọ rin,
Ọrẹ airi;
Em'o f'ara ti Ọ;
Jọ ma tọ mi s'ọna,
Jọ ma tọ mi s'ọna,
Titi aye.

title.english: Once I Was Far'way From The Lord

verses.english:
Once I was far'way from the Lord,
I frustrate Him with my manners,
But now Jesus hath sav'd me.
verses.yoruba:
Lẹkan mo jina s'Oluwa,
Mo nfi'wa mi bi ninu,
Sugbọn Jesu ti gba mi.

verses.english:
Now indignation and anger,
Satan now bound me with its chain
Jesus had now cut the chain.
verses.yoruba:
Ibinu ati irunu,
Ni ẹwọn t'esu fi de mi,
Jesu ti ja ide na.

verses.english:
Lusts of the world now fill'd my hearts,
And all sorts of arrogancy,
Now all burnt by spirit's fire.
verses.yoruba:
Ifẹkufẹ kun' ọkan mi,
Ati igberaga gbogbo,
Ina Ẹmi ti jo wọn.

verses.english:
Now I am free from depression,
From all sorts of lukewarmness,
Oh praise Jehovah with me.
verses.yoruba:
Mo bọ lọwọ irẹwẹsi
Lọwọ 'ko gbona ko tutu,
Ẹ ba mi yin Oluwa.

verses.english:
I am singing just everyday,
In happiness I jump and dance,
It's by the Spiritual pow'r.
verses.yoruba:
Mo nkọrin sa lojojumọ,
Mo njo, mo si tun no soke,
Nipa agbara Ẹmi.

verses.english:
Thy precious blood now cleanseth me,
The water of life in me flow,
My salvation now is full.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹjẹ 'yebiye wẹ mi mọ,
Omi iye nsan ninu mi,
Igbala mi di kikun.

verses.english:
All ye my brothers and my friends,
Who dare this deliverance neglect?
To Him salvation is free.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹyin ara at'ọrẹ mi,
Tani ko fẹ igbala yi,
Ọfẹ ni lọdọ Jesu.

chorus.english:
Oh, how sweet shall it be,
Sweet oh sweet it shall be,
Oh, how sweet shall it be,
For Jesus to dwell within me.
chorus.yoruba:
A! Bi yo ti dun to,
Dun to, dun to, dun to,
A! Bi yo ti dun to,
Ki Jesu ma gbe inu mi.

title.english: O Lord, Have Mercy And Forgive

verses.english:
O Lord, have mercy and forgive,
Spare the soul that to Thee renew,
Great is Thy mercy upon us,
Sinner cannot cling unto Thee.

My sins are many, but they can't
Exceed the pow'r of Thy goodness,
Your greatness is unlimited,
So, likewise let us see Thy love.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹsẹ mi pọ, sugbọn ko le
Ju agbara ore Rẹ lọ,
Titobi Rẹ ko ni opin,
Bẹ gẹ ni k'a ri ifẹ Rẹ.

verses.english:
Wash the sin in my heart away,
And my guilt soul, wash it away,
The fear is just within my heart,
My sin now displease me O Lord.
verses.yoruba:
Wẹ ẹsẹ kuro l'ọkan mi,
Si mu ọkan ẹbi mi mọ,
Lọkan mi ni ẹru na wa,
Ẹsẹ ẹhin ro mi l'oju.

verses.english:
With shame I now confess my sins,
Sins to Thy commands and goodness,
If Thy judgment to me is giv'n,
I am guilty, and Thou art right.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹsẹ mi f'itiju jẹwọ,
Ẹsẹ s'ofin at'ore Rẹ,
Bi idajọ Rẹ yoo ba le,
Mo j'ẹbi, aare ni Tirẹ.

verses.english:
If judgment quickly take my life,
I'll justify Thee at death's point,
If I am sent to be destroyed,
It is right in Thy face, o Lord.
verses.yoruba:
B'idajọ kankan gb'ẹmi mi,
L'oju 'ku uno da Ọ l'arẹ,
B'a si ran mi lo s'iparun
Titọ ni l'oju ofin Rẹ.

verses.english:
The trembling sinners, O Lord save,
Whose hope flutter and live in fear,
If thou shalt see sweet promises,
To descend on Him in His word.
verses.yoruba:
Sibẹ, gba ẹlẹsẹ t'o ngbọn,
Ti ireti rẹ nra baba,
Bi ole r'ileri didun,
Lati ba le n'nu ọrọ Rẹ.

title.english: I Have A Song I Love To Sing
title.yoruba: Mo Ni Orin Kan Ti Mo Fẹ

verses.english:
I have a song I love to sing,
Since I have been redeemed,
Of my redeemer Saviour King,
Since I have been redeemed.
verses.yoruba:
Mo ni orin kan ti mo fẹ,
'Gbat' O ra mi pada,
T'Olurapada, Ọba mi,
Gbat' O ra mi pada.

verses.english:
I have a Christ that satisfies,
Since I have been redeemed,
To do His will is my highest,
Since I have been redeemed.
verses.yoruba:
Mo ni Kristi t'O to fun mi,
Gbat' O ra mi pada;
Sisẹ 'fẹ Re, 'yebiye ni,
Gbat' O ra mi pada.

verses.english:
I have a witness bright and clear,
Since I have been redeemed,
Dispelling ev'ry doubt and fear,
Since I have been redeemed.
verses.yoruba:
Mo ni ẹri nin' okan mi,
Gbat' O ra mi pada;
Ole 'yemeji, ẹru lọ,
Gbat' O ra 'mi pada.

verses.english:
I have a joy unspeakable,
Since I have been redeemed,
By cleansing blood of my Lord
Since I have been redeemed.
verses.yoruba:
Mo ni ayo ti nko le sọ,
Gbat' O rami pada,
Nipa ẹjẹ to nwẹ mimọ,
Gbat' O ra mi pada.

verses.english:
I have a home prepared for me,
Since I have been redeemed
Where I shall dwell eternally
Since I have been redeemed.
verses.yoruba:
O pese 'bugbe kan fun mi,
Gbat' O ra mi p'ada,
Nibi uno gbe tit'aye,
Gbat' O ra mi pada.

chorus.english:
Since I have been redeemed,
Since I have been redeemed,
I will glory in His name,
Since I have been redeemed,
I will glory in my Saviour's name.
chorus.yoruba:
Gbat' O ra mi pada,
Gbat' O ra mi pada,
Uno s'ogo n'nu okọ Rẹ,
Gbat' O ra mi pada;
Uno s'ogo n'n' okọ Olugbala.

title.english: Sinful, sighing to be blest

verses.yoruba:
Ẹlẹsẹ, mo nfẹ 'bukun,
Onde, mo nfẹ ominira,
Alarẹ, mo nfẹ 'simi;
'Ọlọrun, sanu fun mi'.

verses.english:
Goodness I have none to plead;
Sinfulness in all I see,
I can only bring my need,
God be merciful to me.
verses.yoruba:
Ire kan, emi ko ni,
Ẹsẹ sa l'o yi mi ka,
Eyi nikan l'ẹbẹ mi,
'Ọlọrun, sanu fun mi'.

verses.english:
Broken heart and downcast eyes,
There not lift themselves to Thee,
Yet Thou canst interpret sighs;
God be merciful to me.

verses.yoruba:
Ọkan ẹsẹ mi yi nfẹ,
Sa wa simi laya Rẹ,
Lat'oni, mo di ti Rẹ,
'Ọlọrun, sanu fun mi'.

verses.english:
There is One beside the Throne,
And my only hope and plea,
Are in Him, and Him alone,
God be merciful to me.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹnikan mbẹ lor' itẹ,
Ninu Rẹ nikansoso,
N'ireti at' ẹbẹ mi,
'Ọlọrun, sanu fun mi'.
