verses.english:
He my cause will undertake,
My interpreter will be,
He's my all, and for His sake,
God be merciful to me.
verses.yoruba:
On o gba pran mi ro,
On ni alagbawi mi,
Nitori Tirẹ nikan,
'Ọlọrun, sanu fun mi'.

title.english: There Is A Fountain Filled With Blood
title.yoruba: Isun Kan Wa T'o Kun F'ẹjẹ

verses.english:
There is a fountain filled with blood,
Drawn from Immanuel's veins;
And sinners, plunged beneath that flood,
Lose all their guilty strains.
verses.yoruba:
Isun kan wa t'o kun f'ẹjẹ,
T'o ti 'ha Jesu yọ;
Ẹlẹsẹ mokun ninu rẹ,
O bọ ninu ẹbi.

verses.english:
E'er since, by faith, I saw the stream
Thy flowing wounds supply,
Redeeming love has been my theme
And shall be till I die.
verses.yoruba:
'Gbamo fìgbàgbọ́ r'isun na,
Ti nsan fun ẹjẹ Rẹ,
Irapada d'orin fun mi,
Ti ùn o ma kọ titi.

verses.english:
Then in a nobler, sweeter song,
I'll sing Thy power to save,
When this poor lisping, stammering tongue,
Lies silent in the grave.
verses.yoruba:
Orin t'odun ju eyi lọ,
Li emi o ma kọ,
'Gbat' ore-ọfẹ Rẹ ba,
Mu mi de ọdọ Rẹ.

verses.english:
Lord, I believe Thou hast prepared
Unworthy though I be,
For me a blood- bought free reward,
A golden harp for me.
verses.yoruba:
Mo gbagbo p' O pese fun mi
Bi mo tilẹ s'aiye,
Ẹbùn ọfẹ t'a fẹjẹ ra,
Ati duru wura.

verses.english:
'Tis strung and tuned for endless years,
And tuna a by a né Father's ears,
No other name but Thine.
verses.yoruba:
Duru t'a t'ọw' Ọlọrun ṣe,
Ti ko ni bajẹ lai;
Ti ao ma fi yin Baba wa,
Orúkọ Rẹ nikan.

title.english: The World Is Full Of Singing

verses.english:
The world is full of singing
I hear it everywhere
The flow's their bells are ringing
But on the scented air
And up above around me
The silent anthems roll
The glorious Lord has found me
There's music in my soul.
verses.yoruba:
Gbogb' aye kun fun orin,
Mo ngbọ nibi gbogbo;
Awọn 'tanna papa ndun
Layọ n'nu afẹfẹ,
Loke, li ayika mi,
Orin jẹjẹ nyin lọ
Ọba ogo wa mi ri,
Orin wa n'n' ọkan mi!

verses.english:
My heart was fund of sighing
With just some breaks of song
As self was ever trying
To make its weakness strong
But now in Him confiding
His word has made me whole
And e're in Christ abiding
There's music in my soul.
verses.yoruba:
Tẹlẹri, imi edun
Li ọkan mi ma nfẹ;
Nitori ailera mi
Ni o se fi ri bẹ,
Nigba mo f'ọkan mi fun
Ọrọ Rẹ wo mi san,
Lae mo wa lọdọ Kristi
Orin wa n'n' ọkan mi!

verses.english:
My life was full of sadness
Of ever weighing care
But now the oil of gladness
Has turn'd to praise the prayer
And so I keep pursuing
And pressing t'ward the goal
But praying waiting doing
There's music in my soul.
verses.yoruba:
Gbogb' aye mi ti kun fun,
'Banuje at'aro;
Sugbọn lat' isiyi lọ
Ororo ayọ de;
Adura d'orin iyin
Mo si wa nlepa nso
Ni adura at'isẹ
Orin wa n'n' ọkan mi!

verses.english:
And so my heart keeps clinging
To this dear master's word
And it is always singing
Jesus like a spring time bird
I know not what the harps be
Where heavenly anthem roll
I know that heaven is near me
There's music in my soul.
verses.yoruba:
Bẹni ọkan mi si nyọ
Si ọrọ Oluwa;
Gbogbo 'gba lo si nkọrin
Gẹgẹ b'awọn ẹyẹ;
Emi ko mọ ibiti
Orin harp na ti ndun,
Mo mọ p'ọrun sunmọ mi
Orin wa n'n' ọkan mi!

chorus.english:
The blood of Christ is flowing
Its weaves around me roll
My heart with love is glowing
There's music in my soul.
chorus.yoruba:
Ẹjẹ Jesu Kristi nsan,
Igbi Rẹ yi mi ka;
Ifẹ mọlẹ lokan mi,
Orin wa n'n' ọkan mi!

title.english: Alas, And Did My Saviour Bleed

verses.english:
Alas, and did my Saviour bleed?
And did my Sovereign die?
Would He devoted that sacred head
For such a worm as I?
verses.yoruba:
O se! Olugbala mi ta
'Jẹ Rẹ silẹ O ku,
Njẹ O jẹ fori mimọ na
Fun kokoro b'emi.

verses.english:
Was it for crimes that I have done,
He groaned upon the tree?
Amazing pity! Grace unknown!
And love beyond degree!
verses.yoruba:
Njẹ tor' ẹsẹ ti mo ti da,
'O se jiya oro,
Anu at'ore ọfẹ yi
Ko se diwọn rara.

verses.english:
Well might the sun in darkness hide,
And shut his glories in,
When Christ, the mighty Maker, died
For man the creature's sin.
verses.yoruba:
O tọ k'ọrun ko s'kunkun,
Ko f'ogo rẹ pamọ;
Nigba Kristi Ẹlẹda la ku
Fẹsẹ awa ẹda.

verses.english:
But drops of grief can ne'er repay
The debt of love I owe,
Here, Lord, I give myself away
'Tis all that I can do.
verses.yoruba:
Sugbọn 'banujẹ ko le san
'Gbese 'fẹ ti mo jẹ,
Kristi mo f'ara mi fun Ọ,
Eyi ni mo le se.

chorus.english:
At the cross, at the cross where I first saw the light,
And the burden of my heart rolled away,
It was there by faith I received my sight,
And now I am happy all the day!
chorus.yoruba:
Nibi agbelebu ni mo kọ ri 'mọlẹ,
Nibẹ, ẹru ọkan mi si fo lọ;
Nibẹ, nipa igbagbọ mo riran,
N'siyi, mo wa l'alafia titi.

title.english: And Can It Be, That I Should Gain
title.yoruba: O Ha Le Jẹ Pe Mo N'ipin

verses.english:
And can it be, that I should gain
And Interest In the Saviour's blood?
Died He for me, who caused His pain,
For me, who him to death pursued?
Amazing love! How can it be
That thou, my God, shouldst die for me?
verses.yoruba:
O ha le jẹ pe mo n'ipin
Ninu ẹjẹ Olugbala?
P'O ku f'emi t'o da loro,
T'o lepa Rẹ doju iku?
Ifẹ 'yanu! e ha ti se
Ti 'Wọ Ọlọrun ku fun mi?

verses.english:
'Tis mystery all! The immortal dies!
Who can explore His strange design?
In vain the first born seraph tries
To sound the depth of love divine!
'Tis mercy all! Let earth adore
Let angel-minds inquire on more.
verses.yoruba:
Ohun 'jinlẹ! Ọlọrun ku!
Tani mọ idi ete Rẹ?
Lasan l'angẹli ta kọda
Nfẹ mọ, 'jinlẹ ifẹ mimọ!
Anu sa ni! K'aye juba,
Ki angẹli ma wadi mọ.

verses.english:
He left His Father's throne above
So free, so infinite His grace
Emptied Himself of all but love
And bled for Adam's helpless race
'Tis mercy all, immense and free
For, O, my God, it found out me!
verses.yoruba:
O f'ite Baba Rẹ silẹ,
Ore-ọfẹ Rẹ ko lopin!
O bọ gbogb' ogo Rẹ silẹ,
O ku fun 'ran ọmọ Adam,
Anu sa ni, laini iwọn;
L'O wa mi ri, Ọlọrun mi.

verses.english:
Long my imprisoned spirit lay
Fast bound in sin and nature's night
Thine eye diffused a quickening ray
I woke, the dungeon flamed with light
My chains fell off my heart was free
I rose, went forth, and followed Thee.

No condemnation now I dread
Jesus, and all in Him, is mine,
Alive in Him, my living head
And clothed in righteousness divine
Bold I approach the 'ternal throne
And claim the crown, through Christ my own.
verses.yoruba:
Emi ko jaya ẹbi mọ;
Temi ni Krist, patapata!
Mo ye ninu Olori mi,
A f'ododo ọrun wọ mi,
N'igboya, mo sunmọ itẹ,
Mo gb'ade, lagbara Kristi.

title.english: Glory Be To Jesus

verses.english:
Glory be to Jesus,
Who, on bitter pains,
Poor's for me the Life-blood
From His sacred veins.
verses.yoruba:
Ogo ni fun Jesu
T'O fi 'rora nla
Ta ẹjẹ Rẹ fun mi,
Lati iha Rẹ.

verses.english:
Grace and life eternal
In that Blood I find;
Blest be His compassion
Infinitely kind.
verses.yoruba:
Mo r'iye ailopin
Ninu ẹjẹ na;
Iyọnu Rẹ sa pọ,
Ore Rẹ ki tan!

verses.english:
Blest through endless ages
Be the precious stream,
Which from- endless torment
Did the world redeem.
verses.yoruba:
Ọpẹ ni titi lae
F'ẹjẹ 'yebiye
T'O ra aye pada
Kuro n'nu egbe.

verses.english:
Abel's blood for vengeance
Pleaded to the skies;
But the Blood of Jesus
For our pardon cries.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹjẹ Abẹl' nkigbe
Si ọrun f'ẹsan;
Sugbọn ẹjẹ Jesu nke
Fun 'dariji wa.

verses.english:
Oft as it is sprinkled
On our guilty hearts,
Satan in confusion
Terror-stuck departs.
verses.yoruba:
Nigbati a bu wọn
Ọkan ẹsẹ wa,
Satan, n'nu 'damu rẹ
F'ẹru sa jade.

verses.english:
Oft as earth exulting
Wafts its praise on high,
Angel-host rejoicing
Make their glad reply.
verses.yoruba:
Nigbat' aye ba nyọ,
T'o ngbe 'yin Rẹ ga;
Awọn ogun angẹl'
A ma f'ayọ gbe.

Njẹ ẹ gb'ohun yin ga,
Ki iro na dun!
Kikan l'ohun goro
Yin Ọd'agutan.

title.english: When I Survey The Wondrous Cross

verses.english:
When I survey the wondrous Cross
On which the prince of Glory died,
My richest gain I count but loss,
And pour contempt on all my pride.
verses.yoruba:
'Gbati mo ri agbelebu
Ti a kan Ọba Ogo mọ,
Mo ka gbogbo ọrọ s'ofo,
Mo kẹgan gbogbo ogo mi.

verses.english:
Forbid it, Lord, that I should boast,
Save in the death of Christ, my God
All the vain things that charm me most,
Sacrifice them to His blood.
verses.yoruba:
K'a masẹ gbo pe mọ nhalẹ,
B'o yẹ n'iku Oluwa mi,
Gbogbo nkan asan ti mo fẹ,
Mo da sile fun ẹjẹ Rẹ.

verses.english:
See from His head, His hands, His Feet,
Sorrow and love flow mingled down;
Did e'er such love and sorrow meet,
Or thorns compose so rich a crow?
verses.yoruba:
Wo, lat'ori, ọwọ, ẹsẹ,
B'ikanu at'ifẹ ti nsan;
'Banuje at'ifẹ papọ,
A fẹgun se ade ogo.

verses.english:
Where the whole realm of nature mine,
That were an offering far too small;
Love so amazing, so divine,
Demands my soul, my life, my all.
verses.yoruba:
Gbogbo aye 'bajẹ t'emi,
Ẹbun abẹrẹ ni fun mi;
Ifẹ la ti nyanilẹnu,
Gba qbogbo ọkan, ẹmi mi.

title.english: Have You Read The Story

verses.english:
Have you read the story of the Cross,
Where Jesus bled and died;
Where your debt was paid by His precious blood,
That flowed from His wounded side?
verses.yoruba:
O ti ka itan agbelebu,
Nibiti Jesu ku;
Nibiti ẹjẹ Rẹ iyebiye
Ti san gbogbo gbese rẹ?

verses.english:
Have you read how they placed the crown of thorn,
Upon His brow for you,
When He prayed, 'Forgive them oh, forgive;
They know not what they do?'

Have you read how He saved the dying thief,
When hanging on the tree,
When He looked with pleading eyes and said,
'Dear Lord, remember Me?'
verses.yoruba:
O ti ka b'O ti gb'ole ni la
T'o n ku lo lor' igi;
Nigbati o fi ikanu wipe,
'Oluwa, jọ ranti mi'.

verses.english:
Have you read that He looked to heaven and said,
'Tis finished 'Twas for thee!
Have you ever said, 'I thank Thee, Lord,
For giving Thy life for me?'
verses.yoruba:
O ti ka b'O ti gb'oju soke
T'O wipe, 'O pari'
O ti sọ pe, 'Mo dupe Oluwa,
Nitori O ku fun mi'.

chorus.english:
He died of a broken heart for you,
He died of a broken heart;
Upon a tree, for you for me,
He died of a broken heart
chorus.yoruba:
O ku iku 'banujẹ fun ọ,
O ku iku 'banujẹ;
A! ifẹ iyanu fun ọ,
O ku iku 'banujẹ.

title.english: I Am Singing Of The One Who Sav'd
title.yoruba: Mo nkọ'rin Ti Ẹni T'o Gb'ẹmi Mi La

verses.english:
I am singing of the One who sav'd my soul,
I am clinging to the Friend who keeps me whole,
With assurance that when I have reached the goal,
I shall meet Him face to face.
verses.yoruba:
Mo nkọ'rin ti Ẹni t'o gb'ẹmi mi la,
Mo rọ m'Ọrẹ na to sọ mi di pipe,
Ni 'daniloju pe nigba mba dele,
Lojukoju ni uno ri.

verses.english:
I am dwelling with the One that I
I am telling of His goodness evermore,
With assurance that when trials here are o'er,
I shall see Him face to face.
verses.yoruba:
Mo ngbe 'nu Ẹni kanna ti mo njuba,
Lọjọjọ ni mo si rohin ore Re,
Pe lẹhin gbogbo idanwo aye yi,
Lojukoju ni uno ri.

verses.english:
I am dwelling in Sunshine of His love,
I am reaping for the harvest deep above,
With assurance that if here I faithful prove,
I shall see Him face to face.
verses.yoruba:
Mo ngbe ninu 'mọlẹ orun ifẹ Rẹ,
Mo si nka fun ọjọ 'kore ti oke,
Ti mo ba si jẹ olotitọ nihin,
Lojukoju ni uno ri.

verses.english:
In His presence I am finding Peace sublime,
With His story cheering others all the time,
With assurance that in younder happy clime,
I shall see Him face to face.
verses.yoruba:
Niwaju Rẹ, mo nri alafia pipe,
Itan Rẹ mu 'nu qbogbo eniyan dun,
Ni 'daniloju pe nile wa loke,
Lojukoju ni uno ri.

chorus.english:
I shall meet Him face to face,
I am trusting in His grace
At the end of life's short race,
I shall meet Him face to face.
chorus.yoruba:
Lojukoju ni un o ri,
Mo gbẹkẹl' or' ọfẹ Rẹ,
Nipari 'rin ajo mi,
Lojukoju ni uno ri.

title.english: 'Tis Finished!' So The Saviour Cried

verses.english:
'Tis Finish'd!' So the Saviour cried,
And meekly owed His head and died;
'Tis finished!' Yes, the race is run,
The battle fought, the vict'ry won.
verses.yoruba:
'O pari' l'Olugbala ke,
O tẹ ori ba, O si ku,
'O pari' ire ije pin
O ti jagun! O si sẹgun.

verses.english:
'Tis Finished!' Was His death cry
That makes atonement for all sins
Many souls will find salvation
Cause He poured out His soul in death.
verses.yoruba:
'O pari' gbogb'asẹ ọrun
Ati asọtẹlẹ 'gbani
L'a mu sẹ b'a ti sọ tẹlẹ
N'nu Krist' Olugbala aye.

verses.english:
'Tis Finished!' Heaven is reconciled
And all the powers of darkness spoiled;
Peace, love and happiness again
Return, and dwell with sinful men.
verses.yoruba:
'O pari' igbe iku yi
Y'o s'etutu f'ẹsẹ gbogbo,
Ọpọ y'o si ri igbala
Nipa ẹmi 'kẹhin Jesu.

verses.english:
'Tis Finished!' Let the joyful sound
Be heard through all the nation round;
'Tis finished!' Let the echo fly
Through heaven and hell, through earth and sky.
verses.yoruba:
'O pari' k'iro ayọ yi
Ka gbogbo orilẹ-ede;
'O pari' k'isẹgun na de,
K'o dapọ mọ orin t'oke.

title.english: O Perfect Life Of Love

verses.english:
O perfect life of love!
All, all is finished now,
All that He left His throne above
To do for us below.
verses.yoruba:
Ifẹ l'o to bayi!
Ohun gbogbo pari,
O ti pari gbogbo isẹ
T'O tori rẹ w'aye.

verses.english:
No work is left undone
Of all the Father willed
His toils and sorrows, one by one,
The Scriptures have fulfilled.
verses.yoruba:
Ohun ti Baba fẹ
Ni Jesu ti se tan;
Wahala ati iya Rẹ,
Mu iwe mimọ sẹ.

verses.english:
No pain that we can share
But He has felt its smart;
All forms of human grief and care,
Have pierced that tender heart.
verses.yoruba:
Ko s'irora wa kan
Ti Jesu ko jẹ ri;
Gbogbo ẹdun at'aniyan
L'ọkan Rẹ si ti mọ.

verses.english:
And on His thorn-crowned head,
And on His sinless soul,
Our sins in all their guilt were laid,
That He might make us whole.
verses.yoruba:
L'ori t'a f'egun de,
At'ọkan Rẹ mimọ
L'a ko gbogbo ẹsẹ wa le
K'O ba le wo wa san.

verses.english:
In perfect love He dies
For me He dies, for me!
O all-atoning Sacrifice,
I cling by faith to Thee.
verses.yoruba:
Ifẹ l'o mu k'O ku
Fun emi otosi,
'Wọ etutu f'ẹsẹ gbogbo,
Mo f'igbagbọ rọ mọ.

verses.english:
In every time of need,
Before the judgment throne,
Thy work, O Lamb of God, I'll plead,
Thy merits, not my own.
verses.yoruba:
Nigba aini gbogbo,
Ati n'itẹ 'dajọ
Jesu, ododo Rẹ nikan
Ni igbẹkẹle mi.

verses.english:
Yet work, O Lord, in me,
As Thou for me hast wrought;
And let my love the answer be
To grace Thy love has brought.
verses.yoruba:
Jọ, sisẹ ninu mi,
Bi O ti se fun mi,
Si jẹ ki ifẹ mi si ọ
Ma fi ore Rẹ han.

title.english: Jesus In Thy Dying Woes

verses.english:
Jesus in thy dying woes,
Even while Thy life-blood flows,
Craving pardon for Thy foes,
Hear us, Holy Jesus.
verses.yoruba:
'Wọ to mbẹbẹ f'ọta Rẹ,
L'ori 'gi agbelebu;
Wipe, 'Fiji wọn, Baba'
Jesu, sanu fun wa.

verses.english:
Saviour, for our pardon sue,
When our sins Thy pangs renew,
For we know not what we do,
Hear us, Holy Jesus.
verses.yoruba:
Jesu jọ bẹbẹ fun wa,
Fun ẹsẹ wa 'gba gbogbo,
A ko mọ ọhun t'a se;
Jesu, sanu fun wa.

verses.english:
Oh may we who mercy need,
Be like Thee in heart and deed,
When with wrong our spirits bleed,
Hear us, Holy Jesus.
verses.yoruba:
Jẹ k'awa ti nwa anu,
Dabi Rẹ l'ọkan n'iwa,
Gbat' a ba se wa n'ibi;
Jesu, sanu fun wa.

verses.english:
Jesus, pitying the sighs
Of the thief who near Thee dies,
Promising him Paradise,
Hear us, Holy Jesus.
verses.yoruba:
Jesu, 'Wọ t'O gbọ aro,
Ole t'o ku l'ẹgbẹ Rẹ;
T'O si mu d'ọrun rere,
Jesu, sanu fun wa.

verses.english:
May we in our guilt an shame
Still Thy love and mercy claim,
Calling humbly on Thy name,
Hear us, Holy Jesus.
verses.yoruba:
Ninu ẹbi ẹsẹ wa,
Jẹ k'a tọrọ anu Rẹ;
K'a ma pe orukọ Rẹ,
Jesu, sanu fun wa.

verses.english:
Oh remember us who pine,
Looking from our cross to Thine;
Cheer our souls with hope divine
Hear us, Holy Jesus.
verses.yoruba:
Ranti awa t'o rahun,
T'a nwo agbelebu Rẹ,
F'ireti mimọ fun wa,
Jesu, sanu fun wa.

title.english: Wrestling In Agony, Wrestling Alone

verses.english:
Wrestling in agony, wrestling alone,
Weary for human love, finding none.
verses.yoruba:
Ni 'waya 'Jakadi, On nikan nja.
O nfẹ iranlọwọ sugbọn ko ri.

verses.english:
While over Olive sleeps the moonlight,
Whose is that broken prayer troubling night.
verses.yoruba:
B'osupa ti nwọ l'or'oke Olifi
Adura tani ngoke l'oru yi?

verses.english:
What are those drops of blood falling like rain,
Wrung from that heart of Thine, Man of pain.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹjẹ wo l'eyi ti nrọ bi ojo,
Lat'ọkan Rẹ wa, 'Eni 'banujẹ'

verses.english:
Anguish unspeakable writ on Thy brow
Suppliant Sufferer, who art Thou?
verses.yoruba:
Irora aileso mbẹ l'oju Rẹ,
Ojiya ti mbẹbẹ, tan' Iwọ?

title.english: Must Jesus Bear The Cross Alone

verses.english:
Must Jesus bear the cross alone,
And all the world go free?
No, there's a cross for ev'ry one,
And there's a cross for me.
verses.yoruba:
Ki jesu ha nikan jiya,
K'araye lọ 'lofo?
Iya mbẹ f'olukulu,
Iya si mbẹ fun mi.

verses.english:
How happy are the saints above
Who once went sorr'wing here!
But now they taste unmingled love
And joy without a tear.
verses.yoruba:
Ayọ awọn mimọ tito
Twon banujẹ l'aye,
Nisiyi wọn ngbe 'nu ifẹ,
Ati ayọ pipe.

verses.english:
The consecrated cross I'll bear,
Till death shall set me free;
And then go home my crown to wear
For there's a crown for me.
verses.yoruba:
Em'o ru agbelebu mi
Tit'iku y'o gba mi,
'Gbana uno lọ 'le lọ d'ade
Tor'ade mbẹ fun mi.

title.english: 'Man Of Sorrow', What A Name

verses.english:
'Man Of Sorrow', what a name
For the Son of God who came
Ruined sinners to reclaim
Hallelujah! When a Saviour!
verses.yoruba:
Ẹni 'kanu! - Orukọ
T'a npe Ọmọ Ọlọrun;
T'O wa gba ẹlẹsẹ la!
Aleluya! Olugbala!

verses.english:
Bearing shame and scoffing rude
In my place condemned He stood,
Sealed my pardon with His blood,
Hallelujah! When a Saviour!
verses.yoruba:
O farada ẹlẹya,
A da lẹbi nipo mi!
Ẹjẹ Rẹ setu fun mi,
Aleluya! Olugbala!

verses.english:
Guilty, vile, and helpless we,
Spotless Lamb of God was He;
'Full atonement', can it be?
Hallelujah! When a Saviour!
verses.yoruba:
Otos' ẹlẹsẹ ni wa;
Alailabawọn li On,
Njẹ lotọ l'O setutu?
Aleluya! Olugbala!

verses.english:
Lifted up was He to die,
'It is finished', was He cry,
Now in heaven exalted high;
Hallelujah! When a Saviour!
verses.yoruba:
A gbe kọ sori igi,
O ke, o ti pari,
A gbe ga lọrun n'isisiyi
Aleluya! Olugbala!

'Gbat'Ọba Ogo ba de,
'Lati m'ẹni Rẹ re 'le,
A o kọ orin yi lọtun,
Aleluya! Olugbala!

title.english: O God Of Love, What Do I See

verses.english:
O God of love, what do I see
The 'mmortal One has died for me
Son of the everlasting God
Bore all my sins, there on the tree
The 'mmortal One has died for me
My Lord was nailed to the cross tree.

Ye that pass by, behold and see
As the blood flows from His body
Sinner, see the Creator die
There's no sorrow to be compared
Come let us reap the benefit
Of His being nailed to the cross.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹyin ti nkọja lọ, ẹ wo
B'ẹjẹ ti nan lara Jesu!
Ẹlẹsẹ wo, Ẹlẹda ku,
'Banujẹ kan ri bayi ri?
Wa, k'a j'anfani ẹjẹ Rẹ;
Oluwa mi l'a kan mọ 'gi.

verses.english:
Nailed to the tree, that you and I
Might return and come to our God
Believed the true testimony
The blood of Jesus has bought you
In Him we can find forgiveness
My Lord was nailed to the cross tree.

Let us sit down under the cross
Under the flowing, healing stream
Let us count everything but loss
And surrender our hearts to Him
Let us think of this only, that
My Lord was nailed to the cross tree.
verses.yoruba:
Jẹ k'a joko t'agbelebu,
Labẹ isun iwosan na,
K'a ka hun gbogbo s'ofo
K'a fi gbogbo ọkan wa fun,
K'a ma ro eyi nikan pe,
Oluwa mi l'a kan mọ 'gi.

title.english: Thy Life Was Given For Me

verses.english:
Thy life was given for me,
Thy blood, O Lord, was shed,
That I might ransomed be,
And quickened from the dead;
Thy life was giv'n for Thee?
What have I giv'n for Thee?
verses.yoruba:
O F'ara Rẹ fun mi,
O ku nitori mi
K'O le ra mi pada,
Ki nle jinde n'n' oku,
O fara Rẹ fun mi,
Ki l'emi se fun Ọ?

verses.english:
Long years were spent for me
In weariness and woe,
That through eternity
Thy glory I might know;
Long years were spent for me
Have I spent one for Thee?
verses.yoruba:
O f'ọjọ aye Rẹ,
Se wahala fun mi;
Ki emi ba le mọ
Adun ayeraye,
O l'ọpọ dun fun mi
Mo lo kan fun Ọ bi?

verses.english:
Thy Father's home of light,
Thy rainbow-circled throne,
Where left for earthly night,
For wand'rings sad and lone,
Yea, all was left for me;
Have I left for aught for Thee?
verses.yoruba:
Ile ti Baba Rẹ
At'itẹ ogo Rẹ
O fi silẹ w'aye
O d'alarinkiri
O fi'lẹ 'tori mi,
Mo fi nan fun Ọ bi?

verses.english:
Thou, Lord, hast borne for me
More than my tongue can tell
Of bitt'rest agony,
To rescue me from hell
Thou suffer'dst all for me;
What have I borne for Thee?
verses.yoruba:
O jiya pọ fun mi,
Ti ẹnu ko le sọ
O jijakadi nla
'Tori igbala mi,
O jiya pọ fun mi,
Mo jiya fun Ọ bi?

verses.english:
And Thou hast brought to me
Down from Thy home above
Salvation full and free,
Thy pardon and Thy love
Great gifts Thou broughtest me;
What have I brought to Thee?
verses.yoruba:
O mu igbalab nla
Lat' ile Baba Rẹ
Wa lati fifun mi,
O si dariji mi.
0 m'ẹbun wa fun mi
Kin' mo mu wa fun Ọ?

verses.english:
O let my life be giv'n,
My years for Thee be spent,
World-fetters all be giv'n
And joy with suffering blunt:
Thou gav'st thyself for me;
I give myself to Thee.
verses.yoruba:
Uno f'ara mi fun Ọ,
Uno f'aye mi sin Ọ,
Uno d'iju si aye,
Uno wo hun t'ọrun,
Mo f'ohun gbogbo mi
F'Oluwa, Ọba mi.

title.english: Christ Our Redeemer Died

verses.english:
Christ our Redeemer died on the cross,
Died for the sinner, paid all His due,
Sprinkle your soul with the blood of the Lamb,
And I will pass, will pass over you.
verses.yoruba:
Kristi ku l'ori agbelebu
O ku fun igbese ẹlẹsẹ
F'ẹj' Ọdagutan wẹ ọkan rẹ,
On yoo si re yin kọja lọ.

verses.english:
Chiefest of sinners, Jesus will save,
All He has promised, that will He do
Wash in the fountain opened for sin,
And I will pass, will pass over you.
verses.yoruba:
Jesu y'O gbẹni to buru ju,
Yio mu gbogbo ileri sẹ,
Wẹ n'nu orisun iwẹnumọ,
On yio si re yin kọja lọ.

verses.english:
Judgement is coming, all will be there,
Each one receiving justly Hi due,
Hide in saving, sin- cleansing blood,
And I will pass, will pass over you.
verses.yoruba:
Idajọ mbọ fun gbogbo aye,
Olukuluku y'o gba ere,
F'ẹjẹ 'wẹnumọ se abo rẹ,
On yio si re yin kọja lọ.

verses.english:
Oh, great compassion! O boundless Love!
O loving kindness, faithful and true!
Find peace and shelter under the blood,
And I will pass, will pass over you.
verses.yoruba:
A! Anu at'ifẹ ailopin,
A! Inu rere at'otitọ,
Wa alafia n'nu ẹjẹ, na,
On yio si re yin kọja lọ.

chorus.english:
When I...see the blood,
When I... see the blood,
When I... see the blood,
I will pass, I will pass over you.
chorus.yoruba:
'Gba to ba ri ẹjẹ,
'Gba to ba ri ẹjẹ,
'Gba to ba ri ẹjẹ,
Oun yo re yin kọja lọ.

title.english: Amazing Grace! How Sweet

verses.yoruba:
Ore-ọfẹ! B'o ti dun to!
T'o gba em' abosi;
Mo ti sọnu, O wa mi ri,
O si si mi loju.

verses.english:
'Twas grace that taught my heart to fear
And grace my fears relieved;
How precious did that grace appear
The hour I first believed!
verses.yoruba:
Or'ọfẹ ko mi ki m'bẹru,
O si l'ẹru mi lọ
B'ore-ofẹ na ti han to
Nigba mo kọ gbagbọ!

verses.english:
Through many dangers, toils, and snares
I have already come
Tis grace that brought me safe this far,
And grace will lead me home.
verses.yoruba:
Ọpọ ewu at' idẹkun
Ni mo ti la kọja;
Or'-ọfẹ pa mi mọ doni
Y'o si sin mi dele.

verses.english:
When we've been there thousand years,
Bright shining as the sun
We've no less days to sing God's praise,
Than when we first begun.
verses.yoruba:
Lẹyin aimọye ọdun n'bẹ
T'a si ran bi orun,
Gbogb' ọjọ tao fi'yin Rẹ
Y'o ju 'gba 'saju lọ.

title.english: Arise, My Soul, Arise

verses.english:
Arise, my soul, arise,
Shake off thy guilty fears,
The bleeding sacrifice
In my behalf appears;
Before the throne my surety stands
My name is written on His hands.
verses.yoruba:
Dide, ẹmi mi, nde
Gbọn ẹru ẹbi rẹ,
Ẹni t'a pa fun mi,
F'arahan n'tori mi,
Mo l'Onigbọwọ n'idi 'tẹ,
A ko 'rukọ mi s'ọwọ Rẹ.

O mbẹ l'oke laelae
Lati bẹbẹ fun mi,
On nf'ifẹ 'rapada
At'ẹjẹ Rẹ bẹbẹ
Ẹjẹ Rẹ se 'tu abogb' aye
O mbu wọn itẹ or'ọfẹ.

verses.english:
Five bleeding wounds He bears
Receive'd on Calvary,
They pour effectual pray'r
They strongly plead for me;
'Forgive him, oh, forgive',they cry,
'Nor let that ransom'd sinner die'.
verses.yoruba:
Ọgbẹ marun l'o gba
Li oke Kalfari;
Wọn gbadura aitase,
Wọn mbẹbẹ 'tori mi,
Wọn nke, 'Dariji, dariji'
Ma jẹ k'ẹlẹsẹ na ko ku!

verses.english:
The Father hears Him pray,
His dear Anointed One,
He cannot turn away
The presence of His Son,
His Spirit answers to the blood,
And tells me I am born of God.
verses.yoruba:
Baba gb'ẹbẹ ẹni
Ami ororo Rẹ,
Ko le kọ adura
Ti ọmọ rẹ ọwọn,
Ẹmi Rẹ ndahun ẹbẹ na
Pe, 'Mo d'atunbi, Ọlọrun'.

verses.english:
My God is reconciled
His pard'ning voice I hear,
He owns me for His child,
I can no longer fear,
With confidence I now draw nigh,
And 'Father, Abba, Father', cry.
verses.yoruba:
Mo b'Ọlọrun laja,
Mo gb'ohun 'fiji Rẹ,
O so mi d'ọmọ Rẹ,
Emi ko bẹru mọ
Mo fi 'gboya sunmọ 'dọ Rẹ,
Mo si nke pe, 'Abba Baba'.

title.english: I Am Thine, O Lord, I Have Heard
title.yoruba: Oluwa, Emi Sa Ti Gb'ohun Rẹ

verses.english:
I am Thine, O Lord, I have heard Thy voice,
And it told Thy love to me;
But I long to rise in the arms of faith
And be closer drawn to Thee.
verses.yoruba:
Oluwa, emi sa ti gb'ohun Rẹ,
O nso ifẹ Rẹ simi,
Sugbon mo fẹ nde l'apa igbagbọ
Ki nle tubọ sun mọ Ọ.

verses.english:
Consecrate me now to Thy service Lord,
By the pow'r of grace divine;
Let my soul look up with a stead fast hope.
And my will be lost in Thine.
verses.yoruba:
Ya mi si mimọ fun ise
Tirẹ, Nipa ore-ọfẹ Rẹ,
Jẹ ki nfi ọkan igbagbo w'oke
K'ifẹ mi si jẹ Tirẹ.

verses.english:
O the pure delight of a single hour,
That before Thy throne I spend,
When I kneel in pray' and with Thee, my God
I commune as friend with friend.
verses.yoruba:
A! Ayọ mimọ ti wakati kan
Ti mo lo nib' itẹ Rẹ;
'Gba mo ngb'adura si Ọ, Ọlọrun
Ti a sọrọ bi ọrẹ.

verses.english:
There are depths of love that I cannot know,
Till I cross the narrow sea;
There are heights of joy that I may not reach,
Till I rest in peace with Thee.
verses.yoruba:
Ijinlẹ ifẹ mbẹ ti nko le mọ
'Titi uno kọja odo
Ayọ giga ti emi ko le sọ,
Titi uno fi de 'simi.

chorus.english:
Draw me nearer, nearer,blessed Lord,
To the Cross where Thou hast died;
Draw me nearer, nearer,nearer, blessed Lord,
To Thy precious, bleeding side.
chorus.yoruba:
Fa mi mọra, mọra, Oluwa
Sib' agbelebu t'O ku,
Fa mi mọra, mọra, mọra Oluwa
Sib'ẹjẹ Rẹ t'o n'iye.

title.english: Days Are Filled With Sorrow And Care

verses.english:
Days are filled with sorrow and care
Hearts are lonely and drear,
Burdens are lifted at Calvary,
Jesus is very near.
verses.yoruba:
Aye kun f'ọpọ 'banujẹ,
Ọkan pupọ gb'ọgbẹ,
Idariji mbẹ ni Kalfari,
Jesu sunmọ 'tosi.

verses.english:
Cast your care on Jesus today,
Leave your worry and fear,
Burdens are lifted at Calvary,
Jesus is very near.
verses.yoruba:
Ko aniyan rẹ le Jesu,
Fẹru rẹ fafẹfẹ,
Idariji mbẹ ni Kalfari,
Jesu sunmọ 'tosi.

verses.english:
Troubled soul my Saviour can see,
Every heartache and tear,
Burdens are lifted at Calvary,
Jesus is very near.
verses.yoruba:
Ọkan to kun fun aniyan
Olugbala npe ọ,
Idariji mbẹ ni Kalfari,
Jesu sunmọ 'tosi.

chorus.english:
Burdens are lifted at Calvary,
Calvary, Calvary,
Burdens are lifted at Calvary,
Jesus is very near.
chorus.yoruba:
Idariji mbẹ ni Kalfari,
Kalfari, Kalfari,
Jesu ti san gbogbo gbese rẹ,
Wa gba isimi rẹ.

title.english: On A Hill Far Away Stood An Old

verses.english:
On a hill far away stood an old rugged cross,
The emblem of suffering and shame,
And I love that old cross where the Dearest and Blest,
For a world of lost sinners was slain.
verses.yoruba:
Lor'oke lẹhin 'lu, l'agbelebu kan wa,
Apẹrẹ iya at'egan,
Ọkan mi fa sibe, s'Olufẹ mi ọwọn
T'a pa f'ẹsẹ gbogbo aye.

verses.english:
Oh the old rugged cross so despised by the world,
Has a great attraction for me,
For the dear Lamb of God left His glory above,
To bear it to dark Calvary.
verses.yoruba:
Lor'agbelebu yi, ti araiye kẹgàn,
O lẹwa mo si fẹran rẹ,
Nitori' Ọm'Ọlọrun, bọ ogo Rẹ silẹ,
O ru 'tiju ni Kalfari.

verses.english:
In the old rugged cross, stained with blood so divine,
A wondrous beauty I see,
For 'twas on that old cross Jesus suffered and died,
To pardon and sanctify me.
verses.yoruba:
Lor' agbelebu yi l'eje mimo san si,
O lewa pupo l'oju mi,
Toripe lori rẹ Jesu jiya fun mi,
O f'ẹsẹ ji mi mo d'ọmọ.

verses.english:
To that old rugged cross I will ever be true,
Its shame and reproach gladly bear,
Then He'll call me some day to my home far away,
Where his glory forever I'll bear.
verses.yoruba:
S'Ẹnit'o ku fun mi Emi yo j'olootọ,
Uno fayọ gba itiju rẹ,
Nigbooṣe yo pe mi lọ 'le ayeraye,
Ki nsi le pin nin' ogo Rẹ.

chorus.english:
So I'll cherish the old rugged cross,
Till my trophies at last I lay down,
I will cling to the old rugged cross,
And exchange it some day for a crown.
chorus.yoruba:
Mo gbe agbelebu Rẹ na ru,
Titi uno fi ko ere mi jọ,
Em'o rọ mọ agbelebu yi,
K'emi le de ade nikẹhin.

title.english: Christ The Lord Is Risen To-day

verses.english:
Christ the Lord is risen to-day;
Hallelujah!
Sons of men, and, angels, say,
Hallelujah!
Raise your joys and triumphs high;
Hallelujah!
Sing, ye heav'ns; thou earth, reply,
Hallelujah!

Love's redeeming work is done;
Hallelujah!
Fought the fight, the battle won;
Hallelujah!
Lo! our sun's eclipse is o'er,
Hallelujah!
Lo! He sets in blood no more,
Hallelujah!
verses.yoruba:
Isẹ ti idande tan;
Aleluya!
O jija, O ti sẹgun;
Aleluya!
Wo sisu orun kọja,
Aleluya!
Ko wo sinu ẹjẹ mọ,
Aleluya!

verses.english:
Vain the stone, the watch, the seal;
Hallelujah
Christ hath burst the gates of hell;
Hallelujah!
Death in vain forbids His rise!
Hallelujah!
Christ hath open'd paradise,
Hallelujah!
verses.yoruba:
Lasan n'iso at'ami;
Aleluya!
Krist' wo ọrun apadi;
Aleluya!
Lasan l'agbara iku,
Aleluya!
Kristi si Paradise,
Aleluya!

verses.english:
Lives again our glorious King;
Hallelujah!
Where, O death, is now thy sting?
Hallelujah!
Once He died our souls to save,
Hallelujah!
Where thy victory, O grave?
Hallelujah!
verses.yoruba:
O tun wa, Ọba Ogo;
Aleluya!
'Iku, itani rẹ da?'
Aleluya!
L'ẹkan l'O ku, k'O gba wa,
Aleluya!
'Boji isẹgun Rẹ da?'
Aleluya!

verses.english:
Soar we now where Christ hath led,
Hallelujah!
Following our exalted Head,
Hallelujah!
Made like Him, like Him we rise,
Hallelujah!
Ours the cross, the grave the skies,
Hallelujah!
verses.yoruba:
Ẹ jẹ kawa goke lọ,
Aleluya!
Sọdọ Kristi, Ori wa,
Aleluya!
A sa jinde pẹlu Rẹ,
Aleluya!
Bi a ti ku pẹlu Rẹ,
Aleluya!

verses.english:
Hail the Lord of earth and heaven,
Hallelujah!
Praise to Thee by both be given;
Hallelujah!
Thee we greet triumphant now,
Hallelujah!
Hail the Resurrection Thou!
Hallelujah!
verses.yoruba:
Oluwa t'aye t'ọrun,
Aleluya!
Tirẹ ni gbogbo iyin;
Aleluya!
A wọlẹ niwaju Rẹ,
Aleluya!
Wọ ajinde at' iye!
Aleluya!

title.english: On The Resurrection Morning

verses.english:
On the resurrection morning,
Soul and body meet again;
No more sorrow, no more weeping,
No more pain!
verses.yoruba:
L'owuro Ọjọ Ajinde
T'ara t'ọkan y'o pade,
Ẹkùn, 'kanu on irora
Y'o dopin.

verses.english:
Here awhile they must be parted,
And the flesh its sabbath keep,
Waiting in a holy stillness,
Wrapt in sleep.
verses.yoruba:
Nihin nwon ko le sai pinya,
Ki ara ba le simi,
K'o si fi idakẹrọrọ
Sun fọnfọn.

verses.english:
For a space that tired body
Lies with feet toward the dawn,
Till there breaks the last and brightest
Easter morn.
verses.yoruba:
Fun 'gba diẹ ara arẹ yi
L'a gbe sibi 'simi rẹ;
Titi di imọlẹ ọrọ
Ajinde.

verses.english:
But the soul in contemplation
Utters earnest pray'r and strong,
Breaking at the resurrection
Into song.
verses.yoruba:
Sugbọn ọkan to nṣ'aṣaro
To si ngbadura kikan
Y'o bu s'orin ayọ l'ọjọ
Ajinde.

verses.english:
Soul and body reunited
Thenceforth nothing will divide,
Waking up in Christ's own likeness,
Satisfied.
verses.yoruba:
Ara at'ọkan y'o dapo,
Ipinya ko ni si mo;
Wọn o ji l'aworan Kristi, ni
'Tẹlọrun.

verses.english:
Oh! the beauty, oh! The gladness
Of that resurrection-day,
Which shall not through endless ages,
Pass away!
verses.yoruba:
A! Ẹwa na at'ayọ na
Y'o ti pọ to l'Ajinde!
Y'o duro, b'ọrun at'aiye
Ba fo lọ.

verses.english:
On that happy Easter morning
All the graves their dead restore;
Father, sister, child and mother,
Meet once more.
verses.yoruba:
L'ọrọ ọjọ ajinde wa,
'Boji yo m'oku rẹ wa;
Baba, iya, omo, ara
Y'o pade.

verses.english:
To that brightest of all meetings
Bring us, Jesus Christ, at last;
To Thy cross, through death and Judgment,
Holding fast.
verses.yoruba:
Si 'dapọ ti o dun bayi,
Jesu masai ka wa ye;
N'nu 'ku, 'dajọ, 'a le rọ m'a
'Gbelebu.

title.english: God Is Here And That To Bless

verses.english:
God is here and that to bless us,
With the spirit's quick'ning pow'r,
See, the cloud already bending,
Waits to drop the grateful shower.
verses.yoruba:
Ọlọrun wa mbẹ larin wa,
Lati bukun gbogbo wa,
Wo oju ọrun b'o ti su,
Yo rọ ojo ibukun.

verses.english:
God is here! We feel His presence
In this consecrated place;
But we need the soul refreshing
Of His free, unbounded grace.
verses.yoruba:
Ọlọrun wa mbẹ larin wa
Ninu ile mimọ yi,
Sugbọn a nfẹ 'tura ọkan
At'ọpọ or' ọfẹ Rẹ.

verses.english:
God is here! Oh, then believing,
Bring to Him our one desire,
That His love may now be kindled,
Till is flame each heart inspire.
verses.yoruba:
Ọlọrun wa mbẹ larin wa,
K'a mu ẹbẹ wa t'O wa,
Ki ifẹ Rẹ ba le gberan
Lati m'ọkan wa gbona.

verses.english:
Saviour, grant the pray'r we offer,
While in simple faith we bow;
From the windows of Thy mercy
Pour us out a blessing now.
verses.yoruba:
Jesu fi 'bere wa fun wa,
B'a ti f'igbagbọ kunlẹ,
Jọ si ferese anu Rẹ,
K'o tu 'bukun sori wa.

chorus.yoruba:
K'o de Oluwa, a be Ọ,
Jẹ k'ojo ibukun de;
Awa nduro, awa nduro,
M'ọkan gbogbo wa sọji.

title.english: The Rugged Cross Is All My Gain

verses.english:
The rugged cross is all my gain,
There the great sacrifice was made,
There the Saviour was crucified,
And there He bled and died for me.
verses.yoruba:
Agbelebu ni ere mi,
Nibẹ ni a rubọ fun mi;
Nibẹ l'a kan Oluwa mọ,
Nibẹ l'Olugbala mi ku.

verses.english:
What could have moved His heart to bear,
And to suffer for all my sins?
Not knowing why, is the reason
My heart is so cold towards Thee.
verses.yoruba:
Kini o le fa okan Rẹ
Lati tẹri gba iya mi?
Aimọhun na daju l'o se
T'ọkan mi tutu bẹ si Ọ.

verses.english:
Silently, there I grew ashamed
Before my Holy Saviour, Lord
Who shed His life blood for my sake,
His love to me, beyond compare.
verses.yoruba:
Aifohun na oju ti mi,
Niwaju Jesu mimọ mi,
T'O tajẹ Rẹ sile fun mi,
Tori o fẹ mi l'afẹju.

title.english: Proclaim The Good Tidings
title.yoruba: Lọ kede Ayọ Na Fun Gbogbo Aye

verses.english:
Proclaim the good tidings to the whole world,
The Son of God hath vanquished death,
With great joy and gladness proclaim the good news,
The Holy one on the throne.
verses.yoruba:
Lọ kede ayọ na fun gbogbo aye,
P'ọmọ Ọlọrun sẹgun iku,
Fi iyin-iyin pẹl'ayọ rohin na,
Ẹmi Mimọ lo gunwa.

verses.english:
The Angles on high sing Jesus praises,
Who the Saviour of mankind is,
The One land the only mighty
Jesus Christ,
Shakes the whole world and the heavens.
verses.yoruba:
Iyin Jesu, f'awọn Angẹli nke,
T'o wa ra raiye pada,
Ọkansoso ajanaku ni Jesu,
To m'aye pẹlu ọrun.

verses.english:
Almighty King to Thee we pay homage,
The Trinity Omnipotent,
Incomprehensible is Thine own nature,
Who mighty works do perform.
verses.yoruba:
Kabiyesi Ọba Alayeluwa,
Mẹtalọkan Alagbara,
Awamaridi, Olodumare
T'o nse isẹ iyanu.

verses.english:
Great shame is the lot of detractors,
Who nailed our Saviour to the Cross
All intrigues and plans of the enemies failed,
Our Christ the Saviour hath risen.
verses.yoruba:
Itiju nla da bo awọn ika,
To kan Oluwa wa mọ gi,
Rikisi ikọkọ ọta ti d'asan,
Olugbala ji dide.

verses.english:
As members of the black race on this earth,
We are looked at as mean and mere things,
But that great Father in the most High is ours.
He knows that we are His son.
verses.yoruba:
Bi orilẹ-ede enia dudu,
Ati ka wa si eweko,
Sugbọn awa ni Baba kan loke,
To mọ pe 'sẹ Rẹ ri wa.

chorus.english:
My king is come,
My conqueror is come,
So pin, honour and power given
The Lamb of God on the Throne.
chorus.yoruba:
Ọba mi de!
Asẹgun mi de,
Ogo, Ọla at'agbara ati 'pa,
F'Ọdaguntan to gun wa.

title.english: Hail The Day That Sees Him Rise

verses.english:
Hail the day that sees Him rise,
Alleluia
Ravished from our wistful eyes!
Alleluia
Christ, a while to mortals given,
Alleluia
Reascends His native heaven,
Alleluia.
verses.yoruba:
Alafia f'ọjọ na,
Aleluya
T'o pada s'itẹ lọrun,
Aleluya
Krist' t'a ti fifun ẹda,
Aleluya
Tun pada soke ọrun,
Aleluya.

verses.english:
There the glorious triumph waits,
Alleluia
Lift your heads, eternal gates;
Alleluia
Wide unfold the radiant scene;
Alleluia
Take the king of Glory in!
Alleluia.
verses.yoruba:
Iyin duro de nibẹ,
Aleluya
Gb' ori s'oke, ilẹkun,
Aleluya
Si ogo ọrun paya,
Aleluya
Jẹ k'Ọba ogo wọlẹ,
Aleluya.

verses.english:
Him though highest heaven receives
Alleluia
Still He loves the earth He leaves;
Alleluia
Though returning to His throne,
Alleluia
Still He calls mankind His own,
Alleluia.
verses.yoruba:
Ọrun, gba Oluwa rẹ,
Aleluya
Sibẹ On fẹran aye,
Aleluya
Bo ti pada s'itẹ Rẹ,
Aleluya
Sibẹ O pe wa n'Tirẹ,
Aleluya.

verses.english:
See! He lifts His hands above;
Alleluia
See! He shows the prints of love;
Alleluia
Hark! His gracious lips bestow,
Alleluia
Blessings on His church below,
Alleluia.
verses.yoruba:
Wo! O gbọwọ Rẹ soke,
Aleluya
Wo! O f'apa ifẹ han,
Aleluya
Gbọ, bi O ti nsure fun,
Aleluya
Ijọ Rẹ l'aye nihin,
Aleluya

verses.english:
Still for us His death He pleads;
Alleluia
Prevalent He intercedes;
Alleluia
Near Himself prepares our place,
Alleluia.
Harbinger of human race,
Alleluia.
verses.yoruba:
Sibẹ O mbẹbẹ fun wa,
Aleluya
Ẹbẹ Rẹ yo si bori,
Aleluya
O npese aye fun wa,
Aleluya
On l'akọbi iran wa,
Aleluya.

verses.english:
Master, will we ever say,
Alleluia
Taken from our head to-day,
Alleluia
See Thy faithful servants, see,
Alleluia
Ever gazing up to Thee,
Alleluia.
verses.yoruba:
Oluwa lae lao ma ke,
Aleluya
S'Iwọ ti a gba soke,
Aleluya
Pe, wo awa 'ransẹ Rẹ,
Aleluya
Ba ti tẹ'ju wa mọ Ọ,
Aleluya.

verses.english:
Grant, though parted from our sight
Alleluia
High above you azure height,
Alleluia
Grant our hearts may thither rise,
Alleluia
Follow Thee beyond the skies,
Alleluia.
verses.yoruba:
Bo ti jẹ pe a gba Ọ,
Aleluya
Soke kuro lọdọ wa,
Aleluya
Jọ, jẹ k'ọkan wa dide,
Aleluya
Ba Ọ lọ soke ọrun,
Aleluya.

verses.english:
There we shall with Thee remain,
Alleluia
Partners of Thy endless reign,
Alleluia
There Thy face unclouded see,
Alleluia
Find our heav'n of heav'ns in Thee,
Alleluia.
verses.yoruba:
Nibẹ lao wa pẹlu Rẹ,
Aleluya
N'ijọba ayeraye,
Aleluya
Nibẹ l'ao ri oju Rẹ,
Aleluya
Li ọrun awọn ọrun,
Aleluya.

title.english: Hallelujah, Hallelujah

verses.english:
Hallelujah, Hallelujah!
Hearts to heav'n and voices raise;
Sing to God a hymn of gladness,
Sing to God a hymn of praise!
He who on the cross a victim
For the world' salvation bled,
Jesus Christ, the king of Glory,
Now is risen from the dead.
verses.yoruba:
Aleluya, Aleluya,
Ẹ gbe ohun ayọ ga,
Ẹ kọ orin inu didun
K'ẹ si yin Ọlọrun wa;
Enit'a kan m'agbelebu,
T'o jiya fun ẹsẹ wa,
Jesu Kristi Ọba ogo
Jinde kuro n'nu oku.

verses.english:
Now the iron bars are broken,
Christ from death to life is born,
Glorious life, and life immortal,
On this holy Easter morn:
Christ has triumph'd, and we conquer,
By His mighty enterprise,
We with Him to life eternal
By His resurrection rise.
verses.yoruba:
Irin idabu sẹ kuro,
Kristi ku, O si tun ye,
O mu iye ati aiku
Wa l'orọ ajinde Rẹ;
Kristi ti ṣẹgun, awa ṣẹgun
Nipa agbara nla Rẹ,
Awa o jinde pelu Re,
A o ba wọ 'nu Ogo.

verses.english:
Christ is risen, Christ the first-fruits,
Of the holy harvest-field
Which will all its full abundance
At His second coming yield:
Then the golden ears of harvest
Will their heads before Him wave,
Ripen'd by His glorious sunshine,
From the furrows of the grave.
verses.yoruba:
Kristi jinde, akọbi ni
Ninu awọn t'o ti sun;
Awon yi ni y'o ji dide,
Ni abọ Rẹ ekeji;
Ikore ti wọn ti pọn tan,
Nwon nreti Olukore,
Eniti y'o mu wọn kuro,
Ninu isa oku wọn.

verses.english:
Christ is risen; we are risen;
Shed upon us heav'nly grace,
Rain and dew and gleams of glory
From the brightness of Thy face That we,
Lord, with hearts in heaven
Here on earth may fruitful be,
And by angel-hands be gather'd,
And be ever safe with Thee.
verses.yoruba:
Awa jinde pẹlu Kristi,
To nfun wa l'ohun gbogbo,
Ojo, iri, ati ogo
To ntan jade loju Rẹ,
Oluwa, b'a ti wa l'aiye,
Fa ọkan wa s'ọdọ Rẹ,
K'awọn angẹli sa wa jọ,
Kin wọn ko wa d'ọdọ Rẹ.

verses.english:
Hallelujah, Hallelujah,
Glory be to God on high;
Hallelujah to the Saviour,
Who has gain'd the victory,
Hallelujah to the Spirit,
Fount of love and sanctity;
Hallelujah, hallelujah,
To the Triune Majesty.

title.english: Hail King Of Glory Lift Ye

verses.english:
Hail king of glory lift ye up the gates
Lo! At your door the King of glory waits,
Umbar the heart draw back the bolts of sin,
Rise up and let the king of glory in.
verses.yoruba:
Ke Kabiyesi! Gbe ilẹkun soke;
Lẹnu ona rẹ Ọba go nduro!
Si ọkan rẹ, si le ẹsẹ jade,
Dide jẹki Ọba go wolẹ.

verses.english:
Down from the mansions of Celestial day,
See Him descend and robe Himself in clay,
Suff'ring and grief for us He meekly bears,
For us His toils, His agony, and tears.
verses.yoruba:
Lati agbala ọrun lọjọ na,
O sọkalẹ ni ara erupẹ;
Fun wa n'ijiya, ibanujẹ Rẹ,
Isẹ irora ati ẹkun Rẹ.

verses.english:
Nailed to the cross of cruelty and shame,
'Twas thus to bleed the Lord of glory came,
Hear from His lips the agonizing cry,
For us forsaken, see the Saviour die.
verses.yoruba:
A kan mọ 'gi ika ati 'tiju
F'ẹjẹ Rẹ ta ta 'lẹ lo se w'aye;
Gbo lat'ẹnu rẹ igbe irora,
Nitori wa l'Olugbala se ku.

verses.english:
Death could not hold Him in its Icy gloom,
Lo! in the morn He burst the silent tomb,
Rising, He reigns exalted in the sky,
Praise ye the Lord let all earth reply.
verses.yoruba:
Iku ko le bori Rẹ niboji,
Lowurọ lo jade kuro nibẹ,
O ji dide, O njọba ni oke,
Ki gbogb'aye f'iyin fun Oluwa.

chorus.english:
Who is He? The king of glory who?
Jesus our Lord to Him the honour due,
Hail to our King, let all before Him fall
And crown Him, crown Him,Crown Him, Lord of all.
chorus.yoruba:
Tali On? Tal'Ọba Ogo yi?
Jesu Oluwa li ọla yẹ fun,
Ke Kabiyesi wole n'waju Rẹ
Se l'Ọba, l'Ọba,
Ọba gbogb'ẹda.

title.english: Jesus Lives! Thy Terrors Now

verses.english:
Jesus lives! Thy terrors now,
Can, o death, no more appal us,
Jesus lives! By this we know,
Thou, o grave, canst not enthral us,
Hallelujah!
verses.yoruba:
Jesu ye, titi aye,
Ẹru iku ko ba ni mọ;
Jesu ye; Nitorina,
Isa oku ko n'ipa mọ,
Aleluya!

verses.english:
Jesus lives! Henceforth is death
Entrance-gate of life immortal;
This shall calm our trembling breath
When we pass its gloomy portal,
Hallelujah!
verses.yoruba:
Jesu ye, lat' oni lọ,
Iku jẹ ọna si iye;
Eyi y'o jẹ 'tunu wa,
'Gbat' akoko iku ba de,
Aleluya!

verses.english:
Jesus lives! For us He died;
Hence may we, to Jesus living,
Pure in heart and act abide,
Praise to Him and glory giving,
Hallelujah!
verses.yoruba:
Jesu ye, fun wa lo ku,
Njẹ Tirẹ, ni a o ma se;
A o f'ọkan funfun sin,
A o f'ogo f'Olugbala,
Aleluya!

verses.english:
Jesus lives! Our heart know well
Nothing from us His love shall sever,
Life, nor death, nor pow'rs of hell,
Part us now from Christ forever,
Hallelujah!
verses.yoruba:
Jesu ye, eyi daju,
Iku at'ipa okunkun,
Ki yo le ya ni kuro,
Ninu ifẹ nla ti Jesu,
Aleluya!

verses.english:
Jesus lives! To Him the throne,
High o'er heaven and earth is given,
We may go where He is gone,
Live and reign with Him in heaven,
Hallelujah.
verses.yoruba:
Jesu ye; gbogbo 'jọba
L'ọrun, li aye, di Tirẹ;
Ẹ jẹ ki a ma tẹle,
Ki a le jọba pẹlu Rẹ.
Aleluya!

title.english: I know that my Redeemer lives

verses.yoruba:
Mo mọ p'Oludande mi mbẹ,
Itunu la l'eyi fun mi!
O mbẹ, Ẹni t'O ku lẹkan;
O mbẹ, ori iye mi lae.

verses.english:
He lives, to bless me with His love,
And still He pleads for me above,
He lives to raise me from the grave,
And me eternally to save.
verses.yoruba:
O mbẹ lati ma bukun mi,
O si mbẹbẹ fun mi loke,
O mbẹ lati ji mi n'boji,
Lati gba mi la titi lae.

O mbẹ, ọrẹ kori-kosun
Ti y'o pa mi mọ de opin,
O mbẹ, emi o ma kọrin,
Woli, Alufa, Ọba mi.

verses.english:
He lives, my mansion to prepare;
And He will bring me safely there
He lives, all glory to His Name!
Jesus, unchangeably the same!

verses.yoruba:
O mbẹ, ogo f'orukọ Rẹ,
Olugbala kanna titi,
A! Ayọ l'ọrọ yi fun mi,
'Mo mọ p'Oludande mi mbẹ'.

title.english: Thine Be The Glory, Risen Conquering
title.yoruba: Tirẹ Ni Ogo, Ọmọ Nla Baba

verses.english:
Thine be the glory, risen conquering Son
Endless is the victory Thou o'er, death hast won,
Angels in bright raiment roll'd the stone away,
Kept the folded grace-clothes where Thy body lay.
verses.yoruba:
Tirẹ ni ogo, Ọmọ la Baba,
Titi ni 'sẹgun na t'O ni lori 'ku,
Awọn angẹli to y'okuta na kuro,
F'asọ ọgbọ na lele niboji Rẹ.

verses.english:
Lo! Jesus meet us risen from the tomb;
Loving He greets us, scatters fear and gloom,
Let the church with gladness hymns of triumph sing,
For her Lord now liveth, death hath lost its sting.
verses.yoruba:
Wo! Jesu ji dide ninu oku,
O si fi 'fẹ tu ẹru ọkan wa ka,
K'ijo Ọlọrun f'ayọ kọrin 'sẹgun,
Oluwa mbẹ, iku sọ oro rẹ nu.

verses.english:
No more we doubt Thee, Glorious Prince of life;
Life is nought without Thee aid us in our strife,
Make us more than conquerors through Thy deathless love,
Bring us safe through Jordan to thy home above.
verses.yoruba:
Aigba Ọ gbọ bila, Kristi Jesu,
Laisi Rẹ ko s'iye, ran aini wa lọwọ,
Mu wa j'asẹgun lo nipa ifẹ Rẹ,
Tit' ao kọja Jordan sile wa ọrun.

chorus.english:
Thine be the glory, risen, conquering son,
Endless is the victory Thou o'er death hast won.
chorus.yoruba:
Tirẹ ni ogo Ọmọ nla Baba,
Titi ni 'sẹgun na t'O ni lori' ku.

title.english: Pleasant Are Thy Courts Above

verses.english:
Pleasant are Thy courts above,
In the land of light and love;
Pleasant are Thy courts below,
In this land of sin and woe,
O my spirit longs and faints;
For the converse of Thy saints
For thy brightness of Thy face,
For Thy fullness, God of grace!
verses.yoruba:
Bugbe Rẹ ti l'ẹwa to
N'ile 'mọlẹ at'ifẹ!
'Bugbe Rẹ ti l'ẹwa to
L'aye ẹsẹ at'osi!
Ọkan mi nfa ni totọ
Fun idapọ eeyan Rẹ,
Fun imọlẹ oju Rẹ
Fun ekun Rẹ Ọlọrun.

verses.english:
Happy birds that sing and fly
Round Thy altars, O most High,
Happier souls that find a rest,
In a heavenly Father's breast!
Like wandering dove that found
No repose on earth around,
They can to their ark repair,
And enjoy it ever there.
verses.yoruba:
Ayọ ba awọn ẹyẹ
Ti nfo yi pẹpẹ Rẹ ka,
Ayọ ọkan t'o nsimi
L'aya Baba l'o pọju,
Gẹgẹ b'adaba Noa
Ti ko r'ibi simi le,
Wọn pada s'ọdọ Baba
Wọn si nyọ titi aye.

verses.english:
Happy souls! Their praises flow
In this vale of sin and woe;
Waters in the desert rise,
Manna feeds them from the skies,
On they go from strength to strength,
Till they reach Thy throne at length;
At Thy feet adoring fall
Who hast led them safe through all.
verses.yoruba:
Wọn ko simi yin wọn
Ninu aye osi yi;
Omi sun ni aginju
Manna nt'ọrun wa fun wọn,
Wọn nlọ lat' ipa de 'pa
Titi wọn fi yo si Ọ;
Wọn si wolẹ l'ẹsẹ Rẹ
To mu wọn la ewu ja.

title.english: This Is The Day The Lord Has Made

verses.english:
This is the day the Lord hath made,
He calls the hours His own;
Let Heav'n rejoice, let earth be glad,
And praise surround His Throne.
verses.yoruba:
Eyi l'ọjọ t'Oluwa da,
O pe 'gba na n'ti Rẹ;
K'ọrun 'o yọ, k'aye ko yọ,
K'iyin yi 'tẹ na ka.

verses.english:
Today He rose and left the dead,
And Satan's empire fell;
Today the saints His triumphs spread
And all His wonders tell.
verses.yoruba:
Loni O jinde n'nu oku,
Ijọba Satan 'tu
'Wọn mimọ tan 'sẹgun Rẹ ka,
Wọn ns'ọrọ yanu Rẹ.

verses.english:
Hosanna to the anointed King,
To David's Holy Son!
Help us, O Lord! Descend and bring,
Salvation from Thy Throne.
verses.yoruba:
Hosana si Ọba t'a yan,
S'ọmọ mimọ Dafid',
Oluwa, jọ sọkalẹ wa
T'Iwọ t'igbala Rẹ.

verses.english:
Bless'd be the Lord, who comes to men,
With messages of grace;
Who comes, in God His Father's name,
To save our sinful race.
verses.yoruba:
Ibukun ni f'Ẹni to wa
J'isẹ ore-ọfẹ,
T'o wa l'orukọ Baba Rẹ,
Lati gba 'ran wa la.

verses.english:
Hosanna in the highest strains,
The Church on earth can raise;
The highest Heav'ns, in which He reigns,
Shall give Him nobler praise.
verses.yoruba:
Hosana li ohun goro,
L'orin ijọ t'aye,
Orin toke ọrun l'ọhun,
Yi o dun ju bẹ lọ.

title.english: The Lord Is Risen Indeed

verses.english:
'The Lord is risen indeed',
Now is his work performed?
Now is the might Captive freed,
And Death's strong castle stormed.
verses.yoruba:
'Oluwa ji lotọ'
Isẹ 'gbala pari,
A tu awọn onde silẹ,
A si s'ẹtẹ iku.

'Oluwa ji lotọ'
Esu sọ tirẹ nu,
Awọn t'ara ji pelu Rẹ
Lati jọba laelae.

verses.english:
The Lord is risen indeed
He lives to die no more,
He lives, the sinner's cause to plead
Whose curse and shame he bore.
verses.yoruba:
'Oluwa ji lotọ'
O mbẹ, Ko ni ku mọ,
O mbẹ, lati bẹ f'ẹlẹsẹ
Ti O ru egun wọn.

verses.english:
The Lord is risen indeed
Attending angels hear,
Up to the courts of heaven with speed,
The joyful tidings bear.
verses.yoruba:
'Oluwa ji lotọ'
Ẹyin Angẹli gbọ
S'agbala ọrun, ẹ sare,
Mu 'hin ayọ na lọ.

verses.english:
Then angels tune your lyres,
And strike each cheerful chord;
Join, all ye bright celestial choirs,
To sing our risen Lord!
verses.yoruba:
Ẹ mu duru wura
K'ẹ si tẹ'rin didun!
Ẹyin egbẹ ọrun dapọ
Lati k'ajinde Rẹ.

title.english: Welcome Happy Morning

verses.english:
'Welcome happy morning' age to age shall say,
Hell today is vanquished heaven is won today!
Lo! The dead is living, God forevermore!
Him, there true Creator, all His works adore.
verses.yoruba:
'Kabọ ọjọ rere' l'ao ma wi titi
Asẹtẹ ku loni ọrun di tiwa,
'Wọ oku d'alaye, Ọba tit'aye,
'Gbogb' ẹda Rẹ, Jesu, ni nwọn Rẹ.

verses.english:
Maker and Redeemer, life and health of all,
Thou from heaven beholding human nature's fall,
Of the Father's Godhead true and only Son,
Manhood to deliver, manhood didst put on.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹlẹda, Oluwa, Ẹmi alaye!
Lat' ọrun l'O ti b'ojuwo 'sina wa;
Ọm'Ọlọrun papa ni 'Wọ tilẹ se,
K'O ba le gba wa la; O di eniyan.

verses.english:
Thou of life the Author, death didst undergo,
Tread the path of darkness, saving strength to show;
Come, then, True and Faithful, now fulfil Thy word
'Tis Thine own third morning rise,
O buried Lord!

verses.yoruba:
Tu igbekun silẹ, t'esu de l'ẹwọn,
Awọn to si subu, jọ gbe wọn dide.
F'oju rere Rẹ han, jẹ k'aye riran,
Tun mu 'mọlẹ wa de, 'Wọ sa ni 'Mọlẹ.

chorus.english:
'Welcome, happy morning!' age to age shall say,
Hell today is vanquished;heaven is won today.
chorus.yoruba:
'Kabọ ọjọ rere' lao ma wi titi,
A sẹgun ku loni, ọrun di ti wa.

title.english: The Strife Is O'er The Battle Done

verses.yoruba:
Ija d'opin, ogun si tan,
Olugbala jagun molu,
Orin ayọ lao ma ko;
Aleluya!

verses.english:
The pow'rs of death have done their worst,
But Christ their legions hath dispersed,
Let shout of holy joy outburst;
Alleluia!

The three sad days have quickly sped,
He rises glorious from the dead;
All glory to our risen Head!
Alleluia!
verses.yoruba:
Ọjọ mẹta na ti kọja;
O jinde kuro nin' oku:
Ẹ f'ogo fun Oluwa wa.
Aleluya!

verses.english:
He brake the age-bound chains of hell;
The bars from heav'ns high portals fell,
Let hymns of praise His triumph tell,
Alleluia!
verses.yoruba:
O d'ẹwọn ọrun apadi,
O ṣilẹkun ọrun silẹ,
Ẹ kọrin iyin sẹgun Rẹ,
Aleluya!

verses.english:
Lord, by the stripes which wounded Thee,
From death's dread sting Thy servants free,
That we may live, and sing to Thee,
Alleluia!
verses.yoruba:
Jesu, nipa iya t'O jẹ,
Gba wa lọwọ ọrọ iku,
K'a le ye, k'a si ma yin Ọ.
Aleluya!

chorus.english: ALLELUIA! ALLELUIA! ALLELUIA!
chorus.yoruba: ALELUYA! ALELUYA! ALELUYA!

title.english: Sinners Jesus Will

verses.english:
Sinners Jesus will receive;
Sound this word of grace to all,
Who the heavenly pathway leave,
All who linger, all who fall!
verses.yoruba:
Jesu y'o gba ẹlẹsẹ,
Kede rẹ fun gbogb'ẹda;
Awọn ti wọn sako lọ,
Awọn ti wọn ti subu.

Wa, y'o fun ọ ni 'simi;
Gbagbọ, ọrọ Rẹ daju,
Y'o gba ẹni buru ju,
Kristi ngb' awọn ẹlẹsẹ.

verses.english:
Now my heart condemns me not,
Pure before the law I stand;
He who cleansed me from all spot,
Satisfied its last demand.
verses.yoruba:
Ọkan mi da mi lare,
Mo mọ niwaju ofin;
Ẹni t'O ti we mi mọ,
Ti san gbogbo 'gbese mi.

verses.english:
Christ receiveth sinful men,
Even me with all my sin;
Purged from every spot and stain,
Heaven with Him I enter in.
verses.yoruba:
Kristi ngb' awọn ẹlẹsẹ,
An' emi to kun f'ẹsẹ,
O ti sọ mi di mimọ;
Mo ba wọ 'jọba ọrun.

chorus.english:
Sing it o'er and o'er again;
Christ receiveth sinful men,
Make the message clear and plain,
Christ receiveth sinful men.
chorus.yoruba:
Kọ l'orin, ko si tun kọ,
Kristi ngb' awọn ẹlẹsẹ,
Fi otọ na ye wọn pe,
Kristi ngb' awọn ẹlẹsẹ.

title.english: O Word, Of Words The Sweetest

verses.english:
O word, of words the sweetest,
O word, in which there lie
All promise, all fulfilment
And end of mystery!
Lamenting, or rejoicing
With doubt or terror nigh,
I hear the 'Come!' of Jesus
And to His cross I fly.
verses.yoruba:
'Wọ ọrọ to dun julọ,
To kun fun ileri
Ati imusẹ pẹlu
Opin ohun 'jinlẹ.
Nigba ẹkun at'ayọ,
'Yemeji at'ẹru,
Mo gbọ Jesu wipe, 'Wa'
Mo si lọ s'ọdọ Rẹ.

verses.english:
O soul! Why shouldst thou wander
From such a loving Friend,
Cling closer, closer to Him
Stay with Him to the end,
Alas! I am so helpless
So very full of sin,
For I am ever wandering
And coming back again.

Oh, each time draw me nearer
That soon the 'Come' may be
Naught but a gentle whisper
To one close, close to Thee,
The, over sea and mountain
Far from or near my home,
I'll take Thy hand and follow
At that sweet whisper,'Come!'
verses.yoruba:
Ma mu mi sunmọ 'dọ Rẹ
Ki 'Wa' na ba 'le jẹ
Ohun ti a fọ jẹjẹ
F'ẹnit' o sunmọ Ọ;
Mo mbẹ l'oke tab' odo,
L'okere nitosi,
Emi o ma tele Ọ,
'Gba mo ba gbọ pe, 'Wa'.

chorus.english:
'Come!……oh, come to Me!
Come!……oh, come to Me!
Weary, heavy-laden
Come! oh, come to Me!'

title.english: What A Wonderful Change In My Life

verses.english:
What a wonderful change in my life has been wrought,
Since Jesus came into my heart!,
I have light in my soul which so long I had sought,
Since Jesus came into my heart!
verses.yoruba:
Iyipada 'yanu l'aye mi lati se,
'Gba Jesu wọnu ọkan mi;
Imọlẹ la ti de ti mo ti nwa kiri,
'Gba Jesu wọnu ọkan mi.

verses.english:
I have ceased from my wand ring and going astray,
Since Jesus came into my heart,
And my sins which were many are all washed away,
Since Jesus came into my heart!
verses.yoruba:
Mo ti f'opin si 'rinkiri ati 'sina,
'Gba Jesu wọnu ọkan mi;
Ẹsẹ mi to si po lati fọnu kuro,
'Gba Jesu wọnu ọkan mi.

verses.english:
I'm possessed of a hope that is steadfast stand sure,
Since Jesus came into my heart!
And no dark clouds of doubt now my pathway obscure,
Since Jesus came into my heart!
verses.yoruba:
Mo ni 'reti to f'ẹsẹ mulẹ to daju,
'Gba Jesu wọnu ọkan mi;
Ko si kuku iyemeji l'ọkan mi,
'Gba Jesu wọnu ọkan mi.

verses.english:
There's a light in the valley of death now for me,
Since Jesus came into my heart!
And the gate of the city beyond I can see,
Since Jesus came into my heart!
verses.yoruba:
'Mọlẹ wa fun mi l'afonifoji iku,
'Gba Jesu wọnu ọkan mi;
Emi si le ri bode ilu nla ni,
'Gba Jesu wọnu ọkan mi.

chorus.english:
Since Jesus came into my heart,
Since Jesus came into my heart,
Floods of joy o'er my soul like the sea billows roll,
Since Jesus came into my heart.
chorus.yoruba:
Gba Jesu wọnu (wọnu) ọkan mi,
'Gba Jesu wọnu (wọnu) ọkan mi,
Odo ayọ nsan l'ọkan mi b'igbi okun,
'Gba jesu wọnu ọkan mi.

title.english: Art Thou Weary
title.yoruba: Arẹ Mu Ọ, Aye Su Ọ

verses.english:
Art thou weary, art thou languid,
Art thou sore distressed?
'Come to Me, saith One, and coming
Be at rest!'
verses.yoruba:
Arẹ mu ọ, aye su ọ,
Lala pọ fun ọ?
Jesu ni 'Wa si ọdọ Mi,
Ko simi!'.

verses.english:
Hath He marks to lead me to Him,
If He be my guide?
In His feet and hands are wound prints,
And His side.
verses.yoruba:
Ami wo l'emi o fi mọ Pe
On l'O npe mi?
Am'iso wa low ati
Ẹsẹ Rẹ.

verses.english:
Hath He diadem as Monarch
That His brow adorns?
Yea, a crown in very surety,
But of thorns.
verses.yoruba:
O ha ni ade bi Ọba
Ti mo le fi mọ?
Totọ ade wa l'ori Rẹ,
T'ẹgun ni.

verses.english:
If I find Him, if I follow,
What His guerdon here?
Many a sorrow, many a labour,
Many a tear.
verses.yoruba:
Bi mo ba ri, bi mo tẹle,
Kini ere mi?
Ọpọlọpọ iya ati
'Banujẹ.

verses.english:
If I still hold closely to Him,
What hath He at last?
Sorrow vanquished, labour ended,
Jordan past.
verses.yoruba:
Bi mo tẹle tit'aye mi
Kini uno ri gba?
Ẹkun a d'opin uno simi
Tit'aye.

verses.english:
If I ask Him to receive me,
Will He say me nay?
Not till earth and not till heaven
Pass away.
verses.yoruba:
Bi mo bere pe k'O gba mi
Y'O kọ fun mi bi?
B'ọrun at'aye nkọja lọ
Ko jẹ kọ.

verses.english:
Finding, foll'wing, keeping, struggling
Is He sure to bless?
Saints, apostles, prophets, martyrs,
Answer, Yes!
verses.yoruba:
Bi mo ba ri bi mo tẹle,
Y'O ha bukun mi?
Awọn ogun ọrun wipe,
'Yio se'.

title.english: Whoever Receiveth The Crucified One
title.yoruba: Ẹnikẹni Ti O Ba Gba Jesu Gbọ

verses.english:
Whoever receiveth the Crucified One
Whoever believeth on God's only son
A free and a perfect salvation shall have,
For He is abundantly able to save.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹnikẹni ti o ba gba Jesu gbọ;
To si gba ise ori agbelebu,
Yio ri igbala kikun gba l'ọfẹ,
'Tori Kristi lagbara lati gbala.

verses.english:
Whoever receiveth the message of God,
And trusts in the power of the soul cleansing blood,
A full and eternal redemption shall have
For He is both able and willing to save.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹnikẹni to ba gba ihinrere,
To si gbẹkẹle ẹjẹ Rẹ fun 'wẹnu,
Yo ri irapada ti ayeraye,
'Tori O ni agbara lati gbala.

verses.english:
Whoever receiveth the message of God,
And trusts in the power of the soul cleansing blood,
A full and eternal redemption shall have
For He is both able and willing to save.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹni to ba kọ gbogb' ẹsẹ rẹ silẹ,
Ti o si s'ọkan rẹ paya f'Oluwa,
Yo ni igbala pipe nisisiyi;
'Tori Oun ti mura tan lati gbala.

chorus.english:
My brother, the Master is calling for thee;
His grace and His mercy are wondrously free!
His blood as a ransom for sinners He gave, 
And He is abundantly able to save.
chorus.yoruba:
Ẹyin ayanfẹ, Olugbala mpe yin,
Or'-ọfẹ ati anu Rẹ jẹ'yanu,
O ta ẹjẹ Rẹ Silẹ fun 'rapada,
Oun si ni agbara lati gba ni la.

title.english: O brother, Have You Told How The
title.yoruba: Sọ Fun Wa B'o Ti Se Gba Idariji

verses.english:
O brother, have you told how the Lord forgave?
Let us hear you tell it over once again,
Thy coming to the cross where He died to save,
Let us hear you tell it over once again,
Are you walking now in His blessed light?
Are you cleansed from every guilty stain?
He your joy by day and your song by night?
Let us hear you tell it over once again.
verses.yoruba:
Sọ fun wa b'o ti se gba idariji?
Awa tun nfẹ gbọ itan na lẹkan si,
Bo se wa sib' agbelebu fun 'gbala,
Awa tun nfẹ gbọ itan na lẹkan si,
O ha nrin n'nu 'mọlẹ ibukun Rẹ?
O ha bọ ninu ẹbi gbogbo?
Krist' ha jẹ ayọ, orin rẹ n'gbagbogbo?
Awa tun nfẹ gbọ itan na lẹkan si.

verses.english:
When toiling up the way was the Saviour there?
Let us hear you tell it over once again,
Did Jesus bear you up in His tender care?
Let us hear you tell it over once again,
Never have you found such a friend as He,
Who can help you 'midst the toil and pain,
Oh, all the world should hear what He's done for thee,
Let us hear you tell it over once again.
verses.yoruba:
Sọ fun wa: Jesu ha mba o sisẹ bi?
Awa tun nfẹ gbọ itan na lẹkan si
So fun wa: O ha ngbe ọ li apa Re?
Awa tun nfẹ gbọ itan na lẹkan si,
Ko tun si ọrẹ, ti o dabi Rẹ,
To le mu o la isoro ja;
Jẹk' araye gbọ ohun t'O se fun ọ,
Awa tun nfẹ gbọ itan na lẹkan si.

verses.english:
Was ever on your tongue such a blessed theme?
Let us hear you tell it over once again
Tis ever sweeter far than the sweetest dream,
Let us hear you tell it over once again
There are aching hearts in the worlds great throng,
Who have sought for rest and all in vain,
Hold Jesus up to them by your word and song,
Let us hear you tell it over once again.
verses.yoruba:
O ha ti kọrin 'bukun bi eyi ri?
Awa tun nfẹ gbọ itan na lẹkan si,
Orin ti o dun ju ala didun lọ,
Awa tun nfẹ gbọ itan na lẹkan si,
Ọpọ lo ti nwa isimi kiri,
T'ibanujẹ gori ọkan wọn,
Kede Jesu fun wọn l'ọrọ tab'orin;
Awa tun nfẹ gbọ itan na lẹkan si.

verses.english:
The battles you have fought and the victories won,
Let us hear you tell it over once again,
'Twill help them on the way who have just begun,
Let us hear you tell it over once again,
We are striving now with the hosts of sins,
Soon with Christ our Saviour we shall reign,
Ye ransomed of the Lord try a soul to win,
Let us hear you tell it over once again.
verses.yoruba:
So t'ijakadi re at' isegun re,
Awa tun nfe gbo itan na lekan si,
Yo ran awon to sese gbagbo lowo,
Awa tun nfe gbo itan na lekan si,
Ogun run apadi la mba ja,
Laipe a o ba Jesu joba,
Eyin ta ra pada, e mu eso wa,
Awa tun nfe gbo itan na lekan si.

chorus.english:
Let us hear……you tell it o…ver,..tell it o.ver once again,
Tell the sweet and blessed story,
It will help you on to glory,
Let us hear you tell it over once again.
chorus.yoruba:
Jọ, tun itan na sọ fun wa,
(Jọ, tun itan na sọ fun wa lẹkan si)
Tun itan na sọ fun wa,
(Jo, tun itan na sọ fun wa lẹkan si)
Itan didun ti ibukun,
Yio ran ọ lọwọ de ogo;
Awa tun nfẹ gbọ itan na lẹkan si.

title.english: They Were Gathered In An Upper
title.yoruba: Bi Wọn Ti Pejọ Si Yara Oke

verses.english:
They were gather'd in an upper chamber
As commanded by the risen Lord
And the promise of the father,
There they sought with one accord,
When the Holy ghost from heaven descended,
Like a rushing wind and tongues of fire,
So dear Lord, we seek Thy blessing,
Come with glory now our hearts inspire.
verses.yoruba:
Bi wọn ti pejọ si yara oke,
B'Ọlọrun ti palase fun wọn,
Fun ileri ti Baba se,
Wọn pejọ ni ọkan kan,
Ẹmi Mimọ lat'oke sọkalẹ,
B'efufu lile at' ẹla'họn,
Oluwa a nfẹ ibukun,
Ran Ẹmi Mimọ Rẹ s'ọkan wa.

verses.english:
As Elijah we would raise the altar,
For our testimony clear and true,
Christ the savior, loving Healer,
Coming Lord, Baptizer too,
Ever flowing grace and full salvation
For a ruined race Thy love has plann'd,
For this blessed revelation,
For thy written word we dare to stand.
verses.yoruba:
Bi Elijah la o gbe pẹpẹ ro,
Fun ẹri otitọ Rẹ to ga,
Krist'Oluwa, Oluwosan,
Oluwa bartisi wa,
Fun ore ọfẹ ati igbala,
Fun awa ẹda to nsako lọ,
Fun ifihan Rẹ ti o logo,
Gbe wa ro ninu ọrọ Re.

verses.english:
Tis the covenanted promise given,
To as many as the Lord shall call,
To the father and their children,
To thy people one and all,
So rejoicing in Thy word unfailing,
We draw nigh in faith Thy power to know
Come, O come, Thou burning spirit,
Set our hears with heav'nly fire aglow.
verses.yoruba:
Fun ileri t'a kọ n'nu ọrọ Rẹ,
Fun ọpọ ti Oluwa yo pe,
F'awọn baba at'ọmọ wọn,
Fun gbogbo eniyan Re,
Fun ayọ to wa ninu ọrọ Rẹ,
Pẹlu 'gbagbọ a nwo ọrọ Rẹ,
Wa ina Ẹmi Mimọ wa ko
Si sọ gbogbo ọkan wa ji.

verses.english:
With a living coal from off Thy altar,
Touch our lips to swell Thy wondrous Praise,
To extol Thee, bless adore Thee,
And our songs of worship raise,
Let the clouds of glory now descending,
Fill our hearts with holy ecstasy,
Come in all Thy glorious fullness,
Blessed Holy Spirit have Thy way.
verses.yoruba:
Fun ina ọrun lat'ori pẹpẹ,
Kun ẹnu wa pẹlu orin 'yin,
A gbe Ọ ga, a juba Rẹ,
A gbe orin 'yin soke,
Jẹ ki ikuku ogo rẹ kun wa,
Fi Ẹmi Mimọ Rẹ k'ọkan wa,
Wa Ẹmi Mimọ jare wa,
Kun okan wa pẹlu ogo Rẹ.

chorus.english:
Let the fire fall, Let the fire fall,
Let the fire fall from heaven fall,
We are waiting and expecting,
Now in faith dear Lord, we call,
Let the fire fall, Let the fire fall,
On thy promise we depend,
From the glory of thy presence,
Let the Pentecostal fire descend.
chorus.yoruba:
Ran agbara, ina Ẹmi,
Ọlọrun lat'oke wa,
Àwa nduro, Awa nreti,
N'nu gbagbọ n'nu ọrọ Rẹ,
Ran agbara ina Ẹmi,
A gbẹkẹ le 'leri Rẹ,
Lati 'nu ogo iwaju Rẹ,
Ran agbara la pẹntikọsti.

title.english: Once More, My Soul, Thy Saviour
title.yoruba: Ọkan Mi, A Tun Fi Jesu lọ Ọ

verses.english:
Once more, my Soul, thy Saviour,
Thro' the Word,
Is offer'd full and free;
And now, O Lord, I must, I must decide,
Shall I accept of Thee?
verses.yoruba:
Ọkan mi, a tun fi Jesu lọ ọ
L'ẹkan si n'n'ọrọ Rẹ,
Nisisiyi, Oluwa, uno pinnu,
Nki o ha gba Tirẹ?

verses.english:
By grace I will Thy mercy now receive,
Thy love my heart hath won;
On Thee, O Christ, I will, I will believe,
And trust in Thee alone!
verses.yoruba:
Nipa or'-ọfẹ l'em'o r'anu gba,
Mo jere ifẹ Rẹ.
Kristi Iwọ li emi o gbagbọ,
Uno si gbẹkẹle Ọ.

verses.english:
Thou knowest, Lord, how very weak I am,
And how I fear to stray;
For strength to serve I look to Thee alone,
The strength Thou must supply!
verses.yoruba:
Oluwa, Iwọ mọ ailera mi,
Bi nko ti fẹ sako,
'Wọ nikan lo le fun mi l'agbara
Lati jọsin fun Ọ.

Oluwa f'or'ọfẹ fun wa loni,
Kale jumọ 'kọrin;
Ki gbogbo wa sọ tọkantọkan
Emi yo jẹ ti Krist'.

verses.english:
To all who came, when Thou was there Below,
And said, 'O Lord, wilt Thou?'
To them, 'I will!' was ever Thy reply
We rest upon it now.
verses.yoruba:
Awọn to t'o Ọ wa nigba aye Rẹ,
Lati toro 'bukun,
'Mo fẹ' ni idahun ti wọn ri gba;
On na la gbọkan le.

chorus.english:
I will! I will!
I will, God helping me,
I will O Lord be thine,
Thy precious blood was shed to purchase me,
I will be wholly Thine!
chorus.yoruba:
Mo fẹ, mo fẹ,
B'Ọlọrun se 'ranwọ,
Emi fẹ jẹ Tirẹ,
Ẹjẹ Rẹ 'yebiye lo fi ra mi,
Emi yo jẹ Tirẹ.

title.english: Come Every Soul By Sin Oppressed

verses.english:
Come every soul by sin oppressed,
There's mercy with the Lord,
And He will surely give you rest,
By trusting in His Word.

For Jesus shed His precious blood,
Rich blessings to bestow,
Plunge now into the crimson flood,
That washes white as snow.
verses.yoruba:
N'tori Jesu ta ẹjẹ Rẹ,
Lati fun ọ l'ayọ,
Wa m'okun ninu ẹjẹ na,
Ti nsọ ni di mimọ.

verses.english:
Yes, Jesus is the Truth, the Way,
That leads you into rest,
Believe in Him without delay,
And you are fully blest.

Come then, and join this holy band,
And on to glory go,
To dwell in that celestial land,
Where joys immortal flow.
verses.yoruba:
Wa, wọ 'nu ẹgbẹ mimọ yi,
Ka lo sinu ogo,
Lati gbe ilu mimọ na,
Nibit' ayọ ki tan.

chorus.english:
Only trust Him! Only trust Him,
Only trust Him now!
He will save you!
He will save you!
He will save you now!
chorus.yoruba:
Sa gbẹkẹle! Sa gbẹkẹle,
Gbẹkẹ le loni!
Yo gba ọ la!
Yo gba ọ la!
Yo gba ọ loni.

title.english: Jesus, My Lord To Thee I Cry
title.yoruba: Oluwa Mi, Mo Ke Pe Ọ

verses.yoruba:
Oluwa mi, mo ke pe Ọ;
Uno ku, b'O ko ran mi lọwọ
Mu igbala Rẹ to mi wa,
Gba mi bi mo ti ri.

verses.english:
Helpless I am, and full of guilt;
But yet for me Thy blood was split,
And Thou canst make me what Thou wilt,
And take me as I am.

No preparation can I make,
My best resolves I only break
Yet save me for Thine own name's sake,
And take me as I am!

Behold me, Saviour, at Thy feet
Deal with me as Thou seest meet;
Thy work begin, Thy work complete,
But take me as I am!

chorus.english:
And take me as I am!
And take me as I am!
My only plea-Christ died for me!
Oh, take me as I am!
chorus.yoruba:
Gba mi bi mo ti ri!
Gba mi bi mo ti ri!
Kristi ku fun mi l'ẹbẹ mi
Gba mi bi mo ti ri.

title.english: Sing Them Over Again To Me
title.yoruba: Ẹ Tun Wọn Kọ Fun Mi, Ki Ngbọ

verses.english:
Sing them over again to me,
Wonderful words of life;
Let me more of their beauty see,
Wonderful words of life,
Words of life and beauty,
Teach me faith and duty.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹ tun wọn kọ fun mi, ki ngbọ
Ọrọ 'yanu t'iye;
Jẹ ki ntubọ gbadun wọ si
Ọrọ 'yanu tiye,
Ọrọ iye didun,
Ti nkọni ni 'gbagbọ.

verses.english:
Christ, the blessed One, gives to all,
Wonderful words of life;
Sinner, list to the loving call,
Wonderful words of life,
All so freely given,
Wooing us to Heaven.

Sweetly echo the gospel call,
Wonderful words of life;
Offer pardon and peace to all,
Wonderful words of Life,
Jesus, only Saviour,
Sanctify for ever.
verses.yoruba:
Gbe ohun ihinrere na,
Ọrọ 'yanu t'iye,
Fi 'dariji lọ gbogb' ẹda
Ọrọ 'yanu t'iye
Jesu Olugbala
So wa di mimọ lae.

chorus.english:
Beautiful words, wonderful words,
Wonderful words of Life,
Beautiful words, wonderful words,
Wonderful words of Life.
chorus.yoruba:
Ọrọ didun, Ọrọ 'yanu,
Ọrọ 'yanu t'iye,
Ọrọ didun, Ọrọ 'yanu,
Ọrọ 'yanu t'iye.

title.english: I Am The Way, The Saviour Said

verses.english:
'I am the way', the Saviour said,
And I would follow on,
Content to know that after night
Shall break a glorious dawn.
verses.yoruba:
Jesu wipe Oun li ọna,
Emi o si tẹle;
Mo mọ pe lẹhin okunkun
Imọlẹ yo si de.

verses.english:
'I am the Truth', then Truth shall be,
A beacon light to guide,
My bark across the stormy sea,
To where still waters glide.
verses.yoruba:
Oun li Otọ, Otọ yo si
Je 'mọlẹ ti ntọ mi
Ọkọ mi yo kọja okun
Sile alafia.

verses.english:
'I am the Life', there is no death,
For me to fear, nor dead,
Since by His all atoning blood,
My life to His is wed.
verses.yoruba:
Oun ni Iye ko si iku,
Ti yo fo mi l'aya,
Nitori nipa ẹjẹ Rẹ,
Mo ngbe 'nu Re titi.

chorus.english:
I am the Way, the Truth and the Life,
No man cometh unto the Father but by me,
I am the Way, the Truth and the Life,
No man cometh unto the Father but by me.
chorus.yoruba:
Oun li Ọna, Otọ ati Iye,
Ko s'ọna mi s'ọdọ Baba af'ọdọ Rẹ,
Oun li Ọna, Otọ ati Iye,
Ko s'ọna mi s'ọdọ Baba af'odo Rẹ.

title.english: Once I Fought To Conquer Sin

verses.yoruba:
L'ẹkan mo ba ẹsẹ ja,
'Gba t'o njoba l'ọkan mi;
Ti t'Olugbala fi de
O si sẹgun gbogbo wọn
Nigbat' O gbọ ẹbẹ mi
O si ko ẹsẹ mi lọ.

verses.english:
O the wonder working pow'r,
In that happy, blessed hour
When my Saviour spoke to me,
And I heard the precious word
From this wonder working Lord,
When from sin He set me free.
verses.yoruba:
Agbara isẹ 'yanu
Ni wakati didun na
Ti Jesu ba mi sọrọ,
Mo gb'ọrọ 'yebiye na
Lat'ẹnu Oluwa mi
'Gbati O da mi ni'de.

Iwọ nja fun rere bi?
Jesu ni gbogbo ipa,
Y'O sẹgun ẹsẹ fun ọ,
On y'O gba agbara rẹ,
On y'O si ma ba Ọ gbe,
YO si fun ọ ni 'simi.

chorus.english:
He took my sins away,
Took them all away,
Christ the Saviour took my sins away,
Contentment fills my soul,
His spirit has control,
Since Jesus took my sins away.
chorus.yoruba:
O ko ẹsẹ mi lọ,
O ko gbogbo rẹ,
Kristi Jesu ko ẹsẹ mi lọ,
Itẹlorun ti de,
Ẹmi Rẹ ti bori,
Bi Jesu ti k'ẹsẹ mi lọ.

title.english: When Jesus Comes To Reward
title.yoruba: Gba Jesu De Lati F'ere Fun Wa

verses.english:
When Jesus comes to reward His servants,
Whether it be noon or night,
Faithful to Him, will He find us watching,
With our lamps all trimmed and bright?
verses.yoruba:
Gba Jesu de lati f'ere fun wa,
Yala ọsan tab' alẹ,
Y'o ha ba wa, ka ma f'otọ sọna,
K'atupa wa si ma jo?

verses.english:
If, at the dawn of the early morning,
He shall call us one by one,
When to the Lord we restore our talents,
Will He answer thee-Well done?
verses.yoruba:
Njẹ bo ba jẹ orọ kutukutu,
T'O ba pe wa ni kọkan,
'Gbat' a ba da talẹnti wa pada,
Y'O ha wi fun ọ, 'o seun?'

verses.english:
Have we been true to the trust He left us?
Do we seek to do our best?
If in our hearts there is naught condemns us,
We shall have a glorious rest.
verses.yoruba:
A ha sotọ s'eyi t'O fi fun wa?
Gbogbo ipa wa la nsa?
Ti ko ba si 'dalẹbi l'ọkan wa,
'Simi ologo lao ni.

verses.english:
Blessed are those whom the Lord finds watching,
In His glory they shall share;
If He shall come at the dawn or midnight,
Will He find us watching there?
verses.yoruba:
'Bukun l'awọn ti Krist' ri to nsọna,
Wọn o pin nin' ogo Rẹ;
Bi l'arọ tabi ọganjọ oru,
Y'O ha ba wa bẹ nsọna?

chorus.english:
O can we say we are ready, brother,
Ready for the soul's bright home?
Say, will He find you and me still watching,
Waiting, waiting when the Lord shall come?
chorus.yoruba:
A ha le wipe, a se tan, ara,
Fun 'le wa didan l'oke?
Wi, y'O ha ba'wọ at'emi nsọna?
Nsọna, nsọna n'gb'Oluwa o de?

title.english: Standing By A True Purpose

verses.english:
Standing by a purpose true,
Heeding God's command,
Honour them, the faithful few!
All hail to Daniel's Band!
verses.yoruba:
Duro pẹlu ọkan kan,
Se 'fẹ Ọlọrun;
Yin awọn olotitọ
Awọn ẹgbẹ Daniẹl.

verses.english:
Many mighty men are lost,
Daring not to stand,
Who for God had been a host,
By joining Daniel's Band!
verses.yoruba:
Ọpọ akin lo nsegbe,
Wọn ko to duro;
Bi wọn wọ ẹgbẹ Daniẹl,
Wọn ba ja f'Ọlọrun.

verses.english:
Many giants, great and tall,
Stalking through the land,
Headlong to the earth would fall,
If met by Daniel's Band!
verses.yoruba:
Ọpọlọpọ omiran,
Ti nhalẹ kiri,
Ni iba subu lulẹ,
B'ẹgbẹ Daniẹl kọ wọn.

verses.english:
Hold the gospel banner high,
On to victory grand!
Satan and his host defy,
And shout for Daniel's Band!

chorus.english:
Dare to be a Daniel!
Dare to stand alone!
Dare to have a purpose firm!
Dare to make it known!

title.english: Wonderful Story Of Love

verses.english:
Wonderful story of love,
Tell it to me again,
Wonderful story of love,
Wake the immortal strain,
Angels with rapture announce it
Shepherd with wonder receive it,
Sinner, o won't you believe it?
Wonderful story of love.
verses.yoruba:
Itan iyanu t'ifẹ!
Sọ fún mi l'ẹkan sí,
Itan iyanu t'ifẹ
Ẹ gbe orin na ga!
Awọn angẹli nròyin Rẹ,
Awọn Olùṣọ sí gbagbọ;
Ẹlẹsẹ, iwọ ki yo gbọ,
Itan iyanu t'ifẹ.

verses.english:
Wonderful story of love,
Though you are far away,
Wonderful story of love,
Still He doth call today,
Calling from Calvary's mountain,
Down from the crystal bright fountain,
E'en from the dawn of creation,
Wonderful story of love.
verses.yoruba:
Itan iyanu t'ifẹ!
B'iwo tilẹ sako;
Itan iyanu t'ifẹ!
Sibẹ o npe loni;
Lat'ori oke Kalfari,
Lati orisun didun ni,
Lati iṣẹdalẹ aye,
Itan iyanu t'ifẹ.

verses.english:
Wonderful story of love,
Jesus provides a rest,
Wonderful story of love,
For all the pure and bless,
Rest in those mansions above us,
With those who've gone on before us,
Singing the rapturous chorus,
Wonderful story of love.
verses.yoruba:
Itan iyanu t'ifẹ!
Jesu ni isinmi;
Itan iyanu t'ifẹ!
Fún àwọn Olóòtọ,
To sun ni ile nla ọrùn,
Pẹl' awọn to ṣaju wa lọ;
Wọn nkọ orin ayọ ọrun,
Itan iyanu t'ifẹ.

chorus.english:
Wonderful! Wonderful!
Wonderful!
Wonderful story of love.
chorus.yoruba:
Iyanu! Iyanu!
Iyanu!
Itan iyanu t'ifẹ.

title.english: The Holy Spirit Came At Pentecost

verses.english:
The Holy Spirit came at Pentecost,
He came in mighty fullness there,
His witness through believers won and lost,
And multitudes were born again,
The early Christians scattered o'er the world,
They preached the gospel fearlessly,
Though some were martyred and to lions hurled,
They marched along in victory.
verses.yoruba:
Ẹmi Mimọ de l'ọjọ Pẹntikọst,
Pẹlu ọwọ agbara nla,
Ifihan Rẹ n'nu awọn to gbagbọ,
Ọpọlọpọ si d'atunbi,
Ijọ Kristi tan ka gbogbo aye,
Wọn sọ ọrọ na nigboya,
Ninu wọn si ku bi ajeriku,
Wọn fi gbagbọ lọ si 'sẹgun.

verses.english:
Then in an age when darkness gripped he earth,
The just shall live by faith was learned,
The Holy Spirit gave the church new birth,
As reformation fires burned,
In later years the revivals came,
When the saints would seek the Lord and pray,
O once again we need that Holy flame,
To meet the challenge of today.
verses.yoruba:
'Gbat' okun ẹsẹ bori aye,
Ẹmi Mimọ tan 'mọlẹ Rẹ,
Ẹmi Mimọ sọ ijọ d'atunbi,
Ina isọdọtun si njo,
Ọlọrun si ran ọpọ isọji,
Ina adura njọ gere,
A nfẹ iru isọji bi eyi,
Lati sọ aye ẹsẹ jì.

chorus.english:
Come Holy Spirit, dark is the hour,
We need your filling,
Your love and your mighty power
Move now among us, stir us, we pray,
Come Holy Spirit,
Revive the church today.
chorus.yoruba:
Wa Emi Mimọ, okunkun su,
Mu wa sọji,
Fi agbara nla rẹ kun wa,
Rin li arin wa, ru wa soke,
Wa Ẹmi Mimọ,
Jọ sọ ijọ rẹ ji.

title.english: Breathe On Me, Breath Of God

verses.english:
Breathe on me, Breath of God;
Fill me with life a new
That I may love what Thou dost love
And do what Thou wouldst do.
verses.yoruba:
Mi si mi, Ọlọrun,
F'ẹmi titun fun mi,
Ki 'nle fẹ ohun ti O fe,
Kins'eyi t'O fẹ se.

verses.english:
Breathe on me, Breath of God,
Until my heart is pure,
Until with Thee I will one will,
To do and to endure.
verses.yoruba:
Mi si mi, Ọlọrun,
S'ọkan mi di mimọ,
K'ifẹ mi on Tirẹ j'ọkan
L'ero ati n'ise.

verses.english:
Breathe on me, Breath of God,
Till I am wholly Thine,
Until this earthly part of me
Glows with Thy fire divine.
verses.yoruba:
Mi si mi, Ọlọrun,
Titi un o di Tirẹ,
Tiara erupẹ mi yi
Yo tan 'mọlẹ ọrun.

verses.english:
Breathe on me, Breath of God,
So shall I never die,
But live with Thee the perfect life
Of Thee eternity.
verses.yoruba:
Mi si mi, Ọlọrun,
Emi ki yo ku lae,
Uno ba Ọ gbe n'iwa pipe
Titi ayeraye.

title.english: Give Me Your Holy Spirit

verses.english:
Give me your Holy Spirit,
Your Holy Spirit, Father
This is what I'm requesting,
Give me your Holy Spirit,
That I can use in your fold,
Till the coming of Jesus.
verses.yoruba:
Fun mi ni Ẹmi Mimọ,
Ẹmi Mimọ Baba,
Eyi ni mo ntọrọ Oluwa,
Fun mi ni Ẹmi Mimọ,
Kin ma lo nin'agbo Rẹ,
Titi, Jesu yio fi de.

verses.english:
Give me your Spiritual might,
Your spiritual might, Father
This is what I'm requesting,
Give me your spirit might,
That I can use in your fold,
Till the coming of Jesus.
verses.yoruba:
Fun mi ni agbara,
Ni agbara, Baba
Eyi ni mo ntọrọ Oluwa,
Fun mi ni agbara,
Kin ma lo nin'agbo Rẹ,
Titi Jesu yio fi de.

verses.english:
Give me oil in my Lamp,
Oil in my lamp, Father
This is what I'm requesting,
Give me your spiritual might,
That I can use in your fold,
Till the coming of Jesus.
verses.yoruba:
F'epo s'atupa mi,
S'atupa mi, Baba
Eyi ni mo ntọrọ Oluwa,
Fun mi ni agbara,
Kin ma lo nin'agbo Rẹ,
Titi Jesu yio fi de.

title.english: I Will Not Leave You Comfortless
title.yoruba: Emi Ki Y'o Fi Yin Silẹ

verses.english:
'I will not leave you comfortless'
But if I go away,
Will send the Holy Comforter,
Your royal Guest for evermore,
Abiding day by day.
verses.yoruba:
Emi ki y'o fi yin silẹ?
Laini Olutunu,
Emi yo ran Olutunu
Ti yo ma bayin gbe titi,
Lọsan ati l'oru.

verses.english:
Church of the Living God arise,
The fullness to receive,
Until the lost in every place,
Shall feel the need of saving grace,
And shall on Christ believe.
verses.yoruba:
Ijọ Kristi ẹ dide gba,
Ẹkun agbara yi,
Titi ao mu gbogb' asako,
Wa sabẹ ore-ọfẹ Rẹ,
Nipa gbigba Jesu.

verses.english:
God's skies are full of Pentecost,
For you, for me, for all,
Then let us humbly, boldly press,
Our heritage in Christ possess,
That pow'r from heaven may fall.
verses.yoruba:
Ọrun kun fun Pẹntikọsti,
Fun gbogbo eniyan,
Jẹ ka fi irẹlẹ bere,
Ileri wa ninu Kristi,
Agbara lat'ọrun.

verses.english:
Then quickly 'back to Pentecost',
That blessed upper room,
And pray the mighty Lord of Hosts,
To send on us the holy Ghost,
And tarry till He come.
verses.yoruba:
Ka tun pada si Pẹntikọst'
Si iyara oke,
Ka gbadura s'Oluwa wa,
K'O ran Ẹmi Mimọ si wa,
Ka fi suru duro.

chorus.english:
Has He come to you, to you, to you?
Has the comforter come to you?
The Lord will reprove the world of sin
When the comforter comes to you.
chorus.yoruba:
Ẹmi na ti de sọdọ rẹ bi?
Olutunu na ha ti de?
Yo fi oye ẹsẹ ye aye
Gbati Olutunu ba de.

title.english: My Heart Is Open To Thee

verses.english:
My heart is open to Thee, dear Lord,
Come in, Come in,
My faith is clinging to Thy dear word
Come in, Come in.
verses.yoruba:
Ọkan mi sipaya, Oluwa,
Wọle, Wọle,
Igbagbọ mi rọ mọ ọrọ Rẹ,
Wọle, Wọle.

verses.english:
Yes, there is room in my heart, dear Lord,
Come in, Come in;
Thy presence makes Heaven real to me,
Come in, Come in.
verses.yoruba:
Bẹni aye mbẹ fun Oluwa,
Wọle, Wọle,
Dide Rẹ mu mi sun mọ Ọ si
Wọle, Wọle.

verses.english:
I kept Thee standing outside so long
Come in, Come in,
I pray Thee pardon this shameful wrong,
